title: Spa Day at Hotel California
description:
- Signature Facial: 20 minutes of pure bliss! After removing Playa dust with a gentle hypoallergenic cleaning solution, we will apply our refreshing House Made Rose Oil & Aloe Vera Mask to dehydrated faces and place cold cucumber slices on tired eyes. The facial will end with an acupressure massage and sunscreen application
- Signature Back Massage: 20 minutes of heaven featuring our House Lavender Infused Coconut Oil massaged on shoulders, neck and upper back
- Shamanic Tattoo Parlor: We will explore your aura, find what animal guides are walking with you in your life and what kind of wisdom they can bring to you. We will end the session by drawing a beautiful mandala of your spirit animal on your body, using an all organic ink for a temporary tattoo that will last for up to two weeks.
- Deep Relaxation: Guests will lay down comfortably in a quiet space and listen to relaxing guided meditation tracks available in multiple languages - service includes a face massage.
print_description: Bliss out! Pick a spa service: signature facial, back massage, shamanic tattoo parlor, or deep relaxation.

title: The Dusty Beavers’ Maple Taffy Stickeasy
description: Come all ye playa dappers, dames and ragamuffins and indulge in our beloved Quebecois spring ritual: the sugaring-off party. The Dusty Beavers will recreate the jovial, old-time Cabane à Sucre (Sugar Shack) tradition on the Playa. Maple syrup will be boiled to amber-hued perfection, drizzled on snow (crafted in secrecy, but with love), then artistically twirled into a sticky sweet gem-like glob. Don your dustiest glad rags to chill out in our maple-icious speakeasy and indulge your sweet tooth with nature’s sweetest sap. No beaver pelt trade expected or required in return. Come and experience this unique, sugar fueled ‘joie de vivre’.
print_description: For you, The Dusty Beavers will recreate the Quebec Sugar Shack tradition. Come and experience the unique taste of Maple Toffee on Snow!.

title: Physics of Kink
description: Eureka! Ever wanted to nerd out on all the cool physics involved in the kink and fetish world? Well here is your chance. In this class we will explore the thermodynamics of wax play, the tension forces of bondage, and the connection between Isaac Newton and spanking. With multiple live demonstrations of the equations in action, your instructor will even explain how being kinky is actually a lot like being a nuclear engineer. An open discussion on other physics aspects of the world of kink will help us round out an epic hour of naughty nerdiness. Lecture & Demos. 18+, ID required.
print_description: Ever wanted to nerd out on all the cool physics involved in the kink world? This class explores the science behind various kink activities 18+, ID req.

title: Ladies: Eros Tangeré Erotic 1on1 Sensation Perform
description: Do you want to try something completely new? We’re all looking for ways to have experiences that really rock our world and awaken our senses! Here’s your chance to experience something we guarantee you’ve never felt before! Eros Tangeré is a one-on-one “tactile performance” that can only be described as a sensation experience that is created as your very body is played as if it were an ever changing organic musical instrument. Your body becomes the surface upon which amazing erotic sensations will cascade with the undulations of an amazing music track and scent. Imagine that you can FEEL the expression of music with your body. Shed of your clothes, you lay prone and robbed of your sense of sight, one of our artists will perform upon your body with the music in ways that you have never experienced. This is a unique and creative custom designed sensory performance. Not for the faint of heart. Eros Tangeré is a one on one, sensual adult event. Space is very limited so signing up for a session prior to start time is highly recommended. Check in at the Camp for Sensual Pleasures inside Spanky’s Wine Bar for more info and times. 18+, Ladies Only. This has become a hit-favorite at Burning Man, do not miss it. Appointments are limited.

title: Being Sovereign in Intimate Relationship
description:
"Sort out desire from co-dependence. Meet your edge. Breathe out obsolete limits. Affirm new decisions. Includes 1 hour Sovereign Breath session. Open to singles and couples. Breathing together is a great way to deepen and bond, so bring your beloved if you choose.

Please be sober -- you will not need any additional substance and it can get in the way of your optimal experience. Sovereign Breath creates an altered state in which many experiences are possible facilitated by your higher self. Bring what you most want to release, shift, gain insight about, step into, affirm and create. Be ready for change. This form of breathwork grows out of rebirthing and is a more feminine, gentle and allowing practice than other more aggressive and cathartic forms. This approach makes more effective the integration of your insights and transformation into ordinary reality, and is easier on the nervous system. Deep states of bliss and bonding among participants are common.
".
print_description: Sort out desire from co-dependence. Meet your edge. Breathe out obsolete limits. Affirm new decisions. Includes 1 hour Sovereign Breath session.

title: RaiderCon IV Tabletop RPG Convention
description:
RaiderCon returns to the playa for its fourth consecutive year!
Raidercon is the playa's only (so far as we know) Role Playing Game convention.  We'll be running 8 different game tables simultaneously.  Each game is a custom scenario written by our experienced Game Masters.  We'll be running old favorites such as Dungeons & Dragons, Paranoia, and World of Darkness, as well as newer games like Lasers and Feelings, Apocalypse World, and Lost Days of Memory and Madness!

title: Unfucking Sexuality: Intimacy as Art
description:
"Unfucking Sexuality is about decoupling the sex-craving instincts from the desire to connect intimately. Infinite openness awaits your surrender.

When we can separate our desire for sex from our desire to connect intimately, a canvas of possibility emerges in the space between two hearts where we can truly explore intimacy as art.  

Human beings need touch, comfort, safety, love, and intimacy in their lives to feel whole, welcome, complete, and content. Attaining the combination of this cocktail of bliss often is only experienced through a sexual relationship of some kind, and rarely are all of these needs met simultaneously, or by the same person. 

Often, along the path to deepening a relationship or flirtatious connection, one partner or the other begins to dabble with sexual energy through flirting, playful touch, sexy talk, innuendo, or other strategies in an effort to shift the situation into an opening for sexual connection and orgasmic release. 

Sexual energy is incredibly powerful, playful, blissful, and transformative, yet it can also be overwhelmingly tricky and even deceitful to one's self and others if not stewarded with care. 

This workshop explores the fine lines between sexuality and intimacy, between loving touch and sexual touch, and between desire to be with someone intimately and the desire to fuck. 

Through practicing clear and open communication, bringing awareness to the energy in our bodies and intention in our hearts, and by relaxing into the openness of the moment and surrendering any agenda for where it may be leading, the relational space can be transformed into a mysteriously infinite void of possibilities where literally anything can happen. 

Countless women have confided in me that they are frustrated beyond measure by their partner's (or men in general's) inability to be with them in a way that makes them feel safe, free to express their fullness, and feel loved, cherished, and comfortable in their bodies.
print_description: Unfucking Sexuality is about decoupling the sex-craving instincts from the desire to connect intimately. Infinite openness awaits your surrender.

title: French Maid Brigade Parade
description:
French Maids have become indispensable to the spiritual progress of Black Rock City, no more so than in 2017 with the unprecedented proliferation of altars, most of which have ceased to function properly. Reports have come in that these altars are of no spiritual benefit whatsoever. In fact, the consensus among the BMOrg is that the spiritual growth of Burning Man has somehow been stunted. It’s been scientifically proven that the spiritual efficacy of altars is greatly diminished by even trivial amounts of dust. Fortunately, the French Maid Brigade, summoned to task by the BMOrg, is on hand to correct this situation. No matter how much dust your radical ritual kicks up, French Maids will be there to ensure a spiritual journey unencumbered by dust.

Rendezvous with us! You too can be one of the sexiest clean freaks on the playa—please bring: feather dusters, rags, dustbusters, service carts, vacuums, white gloves, latex gloves, enema kits, lube, and any other useful cleaning equipment. Join us in uniform with your surly attitude and worst possible French accent.

On Thursday at 2:00 pm we meet at 3 O’Clock and Esplanade then dust our way through every filthy, nasty camp on our march toward that dust bucket known as Center Camp Café, liberate them from their dusty oppression, and celebrate our triumph!
print_description: However radical your ritual, make it dust-free. Join us in uniform with your feather duster, surly attitude, and your worst possible French accent.

title: Human Carcass Wash
description:
Wash and be Washed...Be part of an interactive washing experience. 

The highly regarded and much anticipated... Human Carcass Wash!!! 

Get involved with some of your closest Playa friends and some new friends in trading your old Playa Dust in for a clean body ready to be dusted once again. This event honors your stated boundaries of where you do want to be touched or washed. 

You will first participate in helping other Burning Man friends get washed by spraying them with Water, Dr. Bonners Peppermint Soap, washed with plenty of hands by your Playa neighbors, then sprayed again with water and squeeged off before you depart for more Playa fun. Bring a water donation to help the process along. 

Hair washing may be available, depending on donated water resources and available PolyParadise members or other Playa friends willing to provide Hair Washing.

Wash and be Washed...Be part of an interactive washing experience. 

The highly regarded and much anticipated... Human Carcass Wash!!!.

title: BDSM 201 - Exploring the BDSM Toy Bag
description:
Join Sunshine and Elektra as they demo (on willing class volunteers) and explain the basics of how to use of a large range of toys found in a well-stocked toy bag.
 
You've dipped your toe in the kink scene but you want to learn more. You're curious but don't know where to go or who to ask. This is your opportunity to learn more about a variety of fun to be had and maybe even experience a little bit. Sunshine and Elektra will have a variety of toys and tools on hand. We'll poll participants at the start of class to prioritize which topics to cover. We'll cover the basics of each topic and some safety pointers. We will demo techniques on volunteers from the class whenever it's feasible. 18+, ID req.

title: Ecstatic Erotic Massage (bring a partner)
description:
"High energy beats, massage, up-regulating breathwork, Taoist big draws, awakening energy and intense mind altering sober psychedelic experience.
--

Often in moments of intense experiences we find answers to solutions we could not access. Benjamin facilitates an experience through high energy beats, partner based massage, up-regulating breathwork, Taoist big draws, and awakening energy with the potential to unlock intense mind altering sober psychedelic experiences. Are you curious?

The workshop explores embodiment using one-directional partnered massage. Each set of paired individuals will explore what it means to be in their bodies and fully present while receiving one-directional touch from their chosen giver. If an individual can master blocks in their own body, search for releases, discover new methods, or find hidden gems from being present, it creates a foundation of opportunities that can be unleashed. Some benefits to receiving one-directional touch can be:
• Self awareness
• Communication skills
• Desires & goals
• Coping with insecurities
• Decision making
• Shifting mental states
• Letting go (aka release)
• Moving forward
• Opening doors

How to prepare:
This workshop is partner based or can be experienced solo. A crucial consent, boundaries, and communication section will be covered at the beginning. Individuals will have an opportunity to choose a partner. Please be open to same gender pairings. Triad groups are also encouraged, however one person will not be able to receive due to time constraints. This work can include genital or anal touch, but is not required or expected. You can be fully clothed or naked as when you were born. We mention this so you can be comfortable with others choices in a shared space and define your own boundaries.
print_description: High energy beats, massage, up-regulating breathwork, Taoist big draws, awakening energy and intense mind altering sober psychedelic experience.

title: Pralaya Yoga (Ancient Tibetan yoga + Science)
description: As the creator of Pralaya Yoga, Robert Boustany says, “The PRALAYA YOGA System is continually being optimized to help you develop maximum functional strength, reach the safe extremes of functional flexibility, discover the keys to the best alignment for your body and artfully define the areas that need the most attention.  Pralaya Yoga was developed specifically to support joint longevity as well as to prevent and speed recuperation from the common problems in sports and daily life." On Wednesday at 10:AM, we'll gather at General Portrait Studio.  Our 90 minute class will contain some lecture and some practice.  When we finish, you're encouraged to explore their amazing and welcoming camp (Get pictures of your favorite body part, ice cold beverages, great music, Sea Dragon art car, aerial rig, and warm hugs). On our journey, we'll: 1. Generate Life Energy through Ancient Tibetan breathing techniques. 2. Find ways to Challenge your Body (safely). 3. Explore a dozen different ways to Increase Flexibility in a joint.  4. Discuss the usual cause of any Joint Pain (especially lower back) and how to Avoid/Fix the pain. 5. Compare and feel the effects of these sacred Pranayamas and Asanas in your own body. 6. Understand that Pranayamas are ENERGY exercises, not just breathing exercises. 7. Leave Energized, Elevated and Equipped with new ideas to explore. If you have a mat and/or block, please bring them. All are welcome. Advanced Yogis Encouraged! I promise to challenge you.  Physically, Mentally and Spiritually. I look forward to showing you what I’ve learned from my amazing teachers. Please join us!
print_description: Pralaya Yoga combines ancient Tibetan practices (Yoga, Breathing, Meditation), Pranayama (Energy control) and Modern Science (stretching, fascia, pain.

title: Blondie Parallel Lines Singalong
description: Don't leave me hanging on the telephone - costumes & props are apropos, bring yours, and/or maybe the desert will provide. One way or another, we will sing the whole album. Picture this: We all sing along with the album from the bottom of our hearts, perhaps on top of a big bus? Fade away and radiate...your flashy blinkies. Pretty baby, please stop by & join us for one or all twelve songs. I know, but I don't know where we'll be placed, just look up VW Bus Camp. It's 11:59, and I want to stay alive. Will anything happen? Yes, Sunday girl, Y comprise un verse en Francais. Once I had a love, and it was a gas, please don't be, a pain in the ass - everyone deserves to sing! I'm gonna love you too - strangers are friends you haven't met yet. When it's over, don't go away sad, don't go pre-fab, don't go away mad, just...you know.
print_description: Once I had a love, and it was a gas...come sing along with us and celebrate one of the greatest albums of all time. No singing talent required.

title: Poly High Tea
description:
Just what is Poly High Tea? - First, it's a Tea Party. We will be serving Tea and Cookies...

All you Polyamorous, poly-curious, and poly-friendly folks out there on the playa are invited to join us for a discussion about the practical issues of loving more than one in an open, responsible multi-person relationship. There are many workable forms of Polyamorous relationship - polyamory is polymorphic! There is much wisdom in the poly community which can be helpful to people trying to make *any* relationship work, monogamous or Polyamorous. There will be a facilitated discussion in which you can get your questions addressed and some of the knowledge in our community can be shared.

If you'd like to cool off and de-dust yourself after our tea party, bring a water donation to enjoy PolyParadise's famous Human Carcass Wash.
print_description: Polyamorous, poly-curious, and poly-friendly folks join us for a discussion about the issues of loving more than one in an open relationship.

title: Partner Stretching
description:
There are several ways you can benefit from stretching. A consistent stretching program can improve performance, increase range of motion, and decrease muscle tension and soreness. Because it increases flexibility, stretching improves the function of the muscle by allowing it to perform better. Performance and range of motion go hand in hand. 

Through guided practice, you will learn partner stretches to use with your dance, workout, or training buddy to maximize your range of motion and reach your top performance.

title: Midnight Star Art Installation
description:
Join our Midnight Ritual when the Big Dipper's stars perfectly align with our art installation’s illuminated red rings, that seemingly hover in air. Take a guided meditative tour of the night sky, combining spirituality, music and physics. Led by our resident astronomer and PhD physicist (Nir Lahav), we'll journey from our galaxy to deep outer space, exploring the meaning of the universe and life in the cosmos. Relax, breathe deep, tune in. Located in deep dark Playa near Black Rock Observatory.

The ritual begins at 11:30 with drumming, vocal toning, and other healing sounds. The alignment itself takes center stage just a few minutes before and after midnight. Nir will then center our minds with conscious breathing before focusing our attention on the night sky's mysteries and wonder.  Healers bring vocal toning, singing bowls and drums into the mix, with NASA’s space-sound recordings in which the planets sing. 11:30pm to 12:30am.
print_description: Midnight ritual: the Big Dipper’s stars glide into perfect alignment with seven red rings hovering in air. Cosmic meditation guided by PHd astronomer.

Come create your own natural mask recipe with fruits, veggies, coconut water, almond milk and other yummy natural ingredients to soothe and restore your skin to its magical glowing best! We’ll provide all the ingredients, teach you recipes, and you can either indulge with us (while re-hydrating with cucumber and lemon water to groovy sounds of our Loveland DJ) or take your own freshly made mask with you to enjoy in the privacy of your tent (within 24 hours)!
print_description: Playa skin rescue! Learn to make natural facial masks. Take your homemade mask with you or indulge in a relaxing and fun detox spa session.

title: All Hail Smoothies! A Queerborhood Party!
description:
Gender Blender welcomes you to our Annual Smoothie Social! Escape all those dusty boring straight parties, and come mix it up in heart of the queerborhood!! 
 
The whole queerborhood is invited for smoothies, dancing, sexy gender blender games, toss the monkey make-out, and an all-around queer love fest! Special shout out to Glam Cocks, Comfort & Joy, Beaverton, Astropups, Stella, Suspended Animation, PolyParadise, ShamanDome, Yes Please, QueViva, POC Camp, and all the camps that were at the Queer Burner Retreat, and all you other fabulous queer camps - if we didn't mention you please show up so we can mention you next year. Our goal is to create the largest and most epic queerborhood event. So come and enjoy smoothies and shake your tails! All genders welcome always. (If you’re straight but not narrow, you are welcome too...besides by the time you leave you probably will be bent - that's right we recruit!). We will offer both alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages.

title: Healing Foot Wash
description: Come sit in our comfy chairs and relax for the best foot wash you've ever been given. We supply everything needed. Bring your dusty feet and smile. For the fifth year in a row Healing Foot Wash is coming again to Burning Man! Find us on ____ and take a load off your feet for a few minutes. We follow a simple 4 step process: 1) Diluted vinegar to neutralize the alkaline dusty pH 2) Diluted Dr. Bronner's soap to release the dust 3) Pure water rinse 4) Dry feet and apply foot lotion Sit and enjoy the attention in our open shade structure and chat for a while. We're totally family friendly and welcome participation in foot washing. Our 1 rule: You can only wash feet after you've had your feet washed. Come by and say hi! :).
print_description: Come to the Healing Foot Wash Camp for a gift of clean feet, conversation, community, & healing.  All are welcome to participate!.

description: The PlayaPops is glad to offer its fourth season of acoustic classical + programing for our 2017 season. We are 80+ string, woodwind, brass, percussion, and other musicians performing a one hour program including Sprach Zarathrustra (you know this--- 2001: A Space Odyssey), a movement from a Mozart Symphony (Jupiter), Rainbow Connection, Carmina Burana (you all know this piece lol),  Beethoven X2 (Egmont Overture and Ode to Joy), Dance of the Ghazies, Ashokan Farewell, and Radiohead! …We’ll also have premier soloists and audience participation…Come join us for something truly different for our 5 show season (with one back up performance time) for 2017!

title: Playa-style: BANAGRAM Tourney!
description: Good at Scrabble? How about Crosswords? We will teach the basics of the Banagrams game and review winner words. Once we are all on board, we will split into teams of 2-3, set up a round-robin competition, and play with oversize tiles until we can crown a champion!

title: DATA BASH! The Joint Study
description: The Joint Study is a crowd-sourced, community-based research project that allows cannabis users, former users, and caregivers to create their own patient-driven research by contributing data about their use of cannabis, submitting potential queries, and analyzing their results to come up with larger research questions. S. Megan Heller, Ph.D. is a medical anthropologist who initiated this project and invites you to join her in this new endeavor. Your responses to her survey questions are anonymous, and your participation in this discussion will create opportunities for high-impact science that accelerates research in the emerging field of cannabis science.

title: What the Heck is Leadership? A Scientific Approach
description:
Jason Gore runs an executive coaching firm for fast-growing startups.  They firm primarily work with highly-innovative companies that will reshape a given industry or domain.  

Many of their clients are young engineers who suddenly found themselves leading large teams.  They needed to learn what “good leadership” was, identify their blind spots, practice new communication skills, and improve their ability to lead.  After conducting 100s of leadership assessments, the firm has been able to scientifically define what good leadership is when it comes to building teams and innovating in the startup environment.

In this interactive presentation, Jason, the firm's cofounder, will share some of their discoveries, how leadership can be defined, and most-importantly, how what we learn by co-creating in community turns out to be the exact same skills that leaders are learning at startups.  

Festivals like Burning Man are more than just a good time—they are a training ground for leaders, community, and innovation. There’s a reason that many startup leaders go to Burning Man and other festivals. 

Together, we’ll look at what we have already learned about leadership though our community experiences and how to apply those skills to leadership in the default world.  Everyone in the audience will also receive a self-assessment (printed or online) to identify areas that they could improve.
print_description: Join Jason Gore in learning about research on startup CEOs, what makes a good leader, and how we can grow as leaders through Burning Man.

description: Do you have a deep yearning in your heart to meet the Beloved? Do you have a romantic feeling about the words Sacred Union? title: Radical Inclusion From Rituals to the Mundane
description:
Curious what it takes to actually be radically inclusive? Feeling like Burning Man and default world have too much racism, sexism,homophobia, transphobia, ableism, ageism, classism, and oppression then the magical world you want to live in? Then this workshop is for you!
 
In a fun, creative, interactive way, we are gonna get serious about our collective liberation and what it really takes to make the world a better place. Join us as we dive deep on this facilitated journey of learning tools to deconstruct the current painful and harmful system we live in and rebuild the world we want to see.  This workshop will give you tools to end oppression, pathways to personal and political liberation, and will be rooted in the theme of ritual and will have a liberation ritual component.
 
All genders and backgrounds welcome always!
print_description: Dive deep as we learn tools to deconstruct the current painful and harmful systems we live in and rebuild the magical world we want to see!.

title: Ritual Augmentation & Decoration (RAD) Services
description:
We at RAD Services are dedicated to imbuing your ritual with auditory and visual zing. RAD maintains a list of ritual augmentation providers and pairs them with ritual events.  Attend office hours or just drop on by and ring the bell for service!  And those wanting to join team RAD Services are invited to contact us!  

We at RAD Services aren't going to own/produce/design your ritual. We don't loan/gift equipment to you. What we do is show up in person, with our stuff, and augment/decorate your ritual with visual pizzazz and auditory depth!

Here is a list of some of the services that we provide (some best in low light venues):

- LED image painting: Image poi, with is a programmable sticks of LEDs, can trace out any image when moved or spun, e.g., fire, lightening, patterns, words, pictures, etc.  Also, these LED props can produce interesting visual affects even when not moved quickly, e.g., flames, fuses, torches, pulsating lights, etc., etc.

- Sound: We at RAD are able to provide a wide range of mobile audio support, e.g., music for a parade/procession or clear dialog for weddings or other ceremonies. Our electric trike moves the audio with your moving ritual/parade.

- Fire: Torches, staff, fire ropes, orbs, poi spinning, etc.

- Video: Front or back lit video projection can help add a new layer of interest to your ritual. You provide the projection surface (e.g., EasyUp side wall) and we bring the equipment.

- Blinky: Many props to decorate any low light ritual, including: LED poi (dynamic color changes), LED staff (two image poi brought together), LED image poi (see above), fiber optic whips (think swarm of fire flies).

- Music: Airy Native American flute background music and parade drum cadence music services are available.

So, you come up with the ritual and we at RAD help make it even more awesome. Contact us soon, as our Burning Man 2017 calendar is filling fast.
print_description: Get us to enhance your ritual with LED light, fire, miked dialog, mobile music, video projection, & drone/litghtpainted pics; see BRC RAD SERVICE@FB.

title: The Path of (Open) Relating
description:
We invite you to this gathering of Spiritually Minded, Open, Fluid, LGBTQ, Polyamorous, Polysensuous, Polycurious, Monogamomish people. This is a safe, fun way to meet new people who are also participating in Open Relating and to gain some practical tools for your relationship or future relationship(s)!

To chose to live and relate in an open or polyamorous way requires a community of like-minded souls. Without community we do not have the necessary support we need as couples and individuals to love as big as our hearts desire.

Why we each consciously choose to live in alternative ways then the ones that were passed down to us from earlier generations is very personal. Some do it to increase the variety of sexual partners and others do it as a spiritual path to embrace the light and shadow of opening up.

There are many ways to make it work. Some people have stated agreements meanwhile others rely on embodied principles and some are just totally radical. Regardless of your personal preference, most of us were not raised with role models for this alternative way of relating. So we must come together to role model and mirror one another.

As the definition and practice of relating is expanding beyond what we were taught unconsciously by our parents we want to invite you to join the conversation. How do you navigate these waters? What have you found that works? Come just to listen and observe or come to participate and add your own thoughts, questions and perspectives into the conversation.

We invite you to share what is most alive in your heart and come join the conversation of open relationships where we aim to come together to create a Culture of Conscious Relating.
print_description: How to have your cake and eat it too! Let's discover the magic available in a culture of conscious open relating.

title: The Gardens of Babylon
description:
On Monday we create rather mysterious event for all those passing by. Taking motivation from this year's Burning Man theme, we thought we would tap into a the Radical Ritual and play with a fun concept...

Starting the day with spirituality, we end the day with incredible music. After leaving the first new moon of spring behind, we finalised our program and created a daytime/nighttime 12 hours program of our dreams.

12:00 - 13:00
We start the day with our community college. We are constantly attracting new roads to explore. We hear friends talk about life changing experiences. We read articles on different ways of life. It leads to so many questions. What is ayahuasca? Should I do Vipassana? Why does Sting love tantric sex? Our community college invites inspirational speakers to provide information on interesting topics. Join this talk, be inspired or just listen to the many wonders of the world.

13:00 - 14:00
As we gather in the desert for more than a week, we take the opportunity of this event to ground you, in the desert. Take a moment to step away from the outside world and connect with your home. A beautiful guided meditation accompanied by a celestial communication followed by a cleanse. Not only will this spiritual ceremony set the energy for the rest of our day, it will offer you so much light the rest of the week.

14:00 - 00:00
As we slowly move from our spiritual self into our spiritual animal, we've created a musical program to get those who are passing by stop and dance. Our camp members are completely transformed into wild performers, face painters, tantric masseuses and more.
print_description: We take you from spirituality to sin. We start this day with a group meditation and end it with a beat. Lose yourself in music, find yourself in life.

title: Heart Opening Concert with FIA
description:
"A unique, crystal clear voice sharing original songs that stirs your soul and opens your heart. Conscious, healing and empowering music. Fia is an artist and songwriter from Sweden who anchors divine wisdom and shares it in a powerful way that goes straight to the core, she reminds us of who and what we are beyond our limiting beliefs, wounds or stories. Fia's songs guide us back home to ourselves and each other. 

""She has a gift of speaking straight to the soul as she sings and play every cell into coming alive around Universal awareness; the divine wrapped in and around every note she gifts to the listener.""

Fia released her debut album 'Made of Stars' in Oktober 2016 and have since then been touring all over the world. She is currently working on her upcoming album that will be released fall 2017.

”The moment we stop running from the demons in our heads, and instead we choose to love them, when saying yes to life, both shadow and light, our suffering is done, we come alive.” - From the song ”Shedding Skins”, Fia".

title: Feed Your Head Talks. MOOP and Danger
description: MOOP and Danger.  So, you've heard of MOOP, matter out of place, but where does this concept come from? It's a whole lot more than mere litter. From dietary customs to architectural vocabularies, this important concept has had a major impact on our understanding of human social organization for the last 50 years. Come learn about the origins of MOOP, and get introduced to the work of Mary Douglas, one of the most bad-ass theorists of the 20th Century!

title: GameBar Happy Hour
description:
The rules are simple … yet can change at any time!  First we make the I.D. checking process fun by creating a three-step “fact-finding” mission.  Once visitors receive their Yes. Now. Please. stamps verifying their age, they enter the GameBar.  The GameBar games are a mash-up of twister, musical chairs, and hot lava.  Stools, tables and counters are spread out over a platform.  Each stool has a different color and colored spots are on the bar, the floor, the monkey bars overhead and even the swings on the edge.  Some stools even have numbers or symbols.  The bartender picks from a stack of overly large cards to find out what happens next (or they can just make up a new rule!).  For example, It could be that all people sitting on yellow seats have to go to a blue seat, but they can’t touch the ground, hot lava!  They must climb over and around people, keeping hold of their drinks, of course!  They may have to get a partner and find seats that add up to a certain number.  They may need to have a hand on a certain color and the butts on a different color.  They may have to sit on the bar, hang from the monkey bar, sit on the monkey bar, one foot on a swing, one hand on...the bartender themselves!  There are so many versions and iterations of different rules that the fun is endless.   The patrons will be encouraged, through the cards, to interact with each other as well as those in the street.  There are no points and not even a goal of the game other than to share in the fun and make some new friends!
Bartenders wear matching twister-themed outfits and carry super soaker water guns filled with a tasty cocktail.  There is no “bar” in our bar unless you count the monkey bar!  The bartenders roam around the platform, serving our special blend to the patrons.  
 
The GameBar will be open Monday - Saturday 5pm - 9pm for happy hour game time.
print_description: Bar meets board game at the GameBar! PLAY! Get twisty & emotionally intimate with Cards of Truth. Climb on the bar & new friends. HOT LAVA!.

title: An Algorithm for Creation
description:
Fill your emptiness by formulating a new creation story that tells you why you are here, or pick from one of the many existing creation myths that best fit you. 
 
Mankind has always had the inherent desire to explain where it all came from. An origin story to find a purpose, grounding, control, or just be entertained. We’ll examine many of the ancient to more modern myths, and the serious to the absurd. A short tour of the majestic Creation Museum. We’ll dig out the patterns of what makes a great creation story, and apply modern day methods and knowledge to build new ones. At the end, we’ll preach our own personal word of….
print_description: The how-to guide on creating your own creation myth. Explore existing myths, create new mythologies, and tour the Creation Museum.

title: Tribal Tantra Heart Opening & Devotional Puja
description:
"Devotional ceremony where we open to the possibility of falling in love with ourselves through the eyes of another

There is power in making a choice to be present. To witness. To be witnessed. A choice to see and be seen as we are and in our highest self When we gather with intention, we gather and increase in said powers. This will be such a gathering... ...and in such times and at such gatherings true magic, transformation, renewal and clarity through spaciousness are even more possible, even more accessible, for that tribal heart intention is an almost irresistible force for ourselves individually and collectively. This heart centered gathering is a simple but profound Puja (Devotional) ceremony of seeing and being seen first in silence, then with witnessing, listening and sharing, so that we may open to the possibility of falling in love with ourselves either directly or through the eyes of another. I invite you to be vulnerable. To see and be seen in this moment. To open to the beautiful reflections in each other. Come to this gathering because you are READY to step up into your full expression. Ready to be the Strong Man and a Powerful Woman who has the right to be met, and the right to love and be loved.

".

title: Heart Opening Concert with FIA
description:
"A unique, crystal clear voice sharing original songs that stirs your soul and opens your heart. Conscious, healing and empowering music. Fia is an artist and songwriter from Sweden who anchors divine wisdom and shares it in a powerful way that goes straight to the core, she reminds us of who and what we are beyond our limiting beliefs, wounds or stories. Fia's songs guide us back home to ourselves and each other. 

""She has a gift of speaking straight to the soul as she sings and play every cell into coming alive around Universal awareness; the divine wrapped in and around every note she gifts to the listener.""

Fia released her debut album 'Made of Stars' in Oktober 2016 and have since then been touring all over the world. She is currently working on her upcoming album that will be released fall 2017.

”The moment we stop running from the demons in our heads, and instead we choose to love them, when saying yes to life, both shadow and light, our suffering is done, we come alive.” - From the song ”Shedding Skins”, Fia".

title: Power Of Prayer Global Sunset Drumming Circle
description:
Join Power of Prayer with First Nations' Wisdom Keepers, Red Lightning, Mayan Warrior and Unify for a Global Synchronised Prayer Drumming Circle.

Red Lightning began with a vision to hold a sacred space on the Playa.  Now, returning from Standing Rock to Black Rock, we come together with global synchronised prayer platform Unify, and cultural force Mayan Warrior, to continue the prayer that started at Standing Rock.

For generations, Native American culture has held that the drum is the heartbeat of Mother Earth, and the water, her veins.  Indigenous tribes use drums in various ways to interact with a higher power, known to many as The Great Spirit.  Drums are the channel we use to connect to our spirit, to each other, and to the spirit of Earth. Water is sacred.  MNI WICONI!

The historic, global gathering of hundreds of tribes at Standing Rock standing together for the first time for our water has been prophesied for these times.  Now, we gather under the Medicine Wheel of all nations to carry this prayer forward.  It has been said that peace will not come to our Earth until the circle of humanity is complete; until all four colours sit in circle under the Medicine Wheel and share their teachings. 

Come and experience our unification as a human family as we dance together under the Medicine Wheel to the beat of the drum, playing out to all of Black Rock City on the Playa's best sound-system.  Pray with us on the Playa or engage with us online as we stream our prayer out to over 15 million people using Unify's platform. Join us.  Together, we pray for good health and better understanding.  Together, we pray for deep listening.  Together, we pray for unity, for peace, and for love. 

This is a historic moment you won't want to miss.

This is our Radical Ritual.
print_description: Join with a drum under the Medicine Wheel Tipi Circle w/First Nations' around sacred fire streaming a prayer into the world w/Unify and Mayan Warrior.

title: Straya Day
description: Now in it’s 4th year Straya Day is an Australian themed BBQ party with Australian food and drinks to try, fun games to play and some rocking Aussie tunes. Whether you’re one of us or just enjoy our silly accents come and enjoy some fair dinkum Australian culture, dinky-di beer and ridgy-didge food on us. Play some Goon of Fortune, give cricket a burl, hug a koala or belt out some Aussie pub anthems. This is the official meet up for Aussies on the playa but we also really want to share our culture with our American (and other) friends so everyone is welcome! title: Surrealist Automatism Nude Body Painting
description:
"Surrealist Automatism Nude Body Painting
Small groups. Eye Gaze. Ritualistic undress. Fear inventory. Be painter and canvas. Explore your artist self, vulnerable self, beautiful self. 

Form in groups of 2,3,4,5, or 6 people. Begin with a partnered eye gazing for 3 minutes. We do this twice. Switch partners, or keep the same partner. If you don't have a partner (odd groups), just sit with the energy and sensations of those around you. Form a small circle and hold hands. Take a few breaths together. Begin a ritualistic undressing and go around in the circle. For each article of clothing one removes, say any fear aloud to the group. Repeat until all clothes removed. Take a moment to reconnect with your partners through eye contact. Ask permission (consent) to paint on your partner's body. You may switch roles, paint each other and the same time, or decide to stay in one role the entire time. Paint without thinking (Automatism). Just paint. Just be. ".
print_description: Small groups. Eye Gaze. Ritualistic undress. Fear inventory. Be painter and canvas. Explore your artist self, vulnerable self, beautiful self.

title: Free to Love
description:
Are you free to love? Free to experience the fullness of love that wants to be given and received from your heart- in this moment? And the next? 

Embodied Intimacy is founded on the idea that relating is the path. All relationships, every shape and size, have the ability to lead us deeper into the mystery of who we truly are. 

Where we are the most vulnerable, we have the strongest defenses. And it just so happens, we are the most vulnerable in our intimate and romantic relationships. 

So... 
໑ How do we handle the strong instincts that kick in when we are triggered? 
໑ What to do when we are overwhelmed and projecting our past fears on the future? 
໑ Is there an alchemical relational process that makes gold out of led? 
໑ Can we transform our wounds, the most ugly aspects in us and our protective instincts, into an even deeper intimacy? 
໑ Can we unshackle biology and conditioning so that we can be truly free to love?

During this 3 intensive we will guide you through simple and effective ways to come back to love, to transform what keeps you small and to take brave steps into all that you are. We will use practices such as Belly2Belly and other Relational & Embodiment Practices.
print_description: How do we free ourselves to give and receive as much love as possible?.

title: Kinetic Intimacy: Dance Your Desires
description:
"How can we access more vulnerability in the embodiment of our dance to elevate our co-creation to extraordinary moments of presence? Using energetic attunement and listening as our common language, our intention is to explore form and craft containers with such great integrity, that our ability to request and receive consent and play from our hearts, bodies and spirit emanates in our every movement and action. 

An embodied dance of intimate energy; that which can be expressed, witnessed and co-created conSensually, with the self and others, organically, in a safe, conscious container. We will participate in some collaborative movement exercises and discussion that help us become more eloquent and connected to ourselves, to the other, and to how we feel and express about conSensual dance culture.
 ".
print_description: With movement and energetic interplay, master non-verbal conversation, cultivating safe containers to invite playful, juicier connection.

title: Slow Jam
description:
Slow Jam is a gentle and heart-felt practice of connecting with the self and with others through slow, improvised couples' dance. 

Slow Jam is a strongly held container creating a safe space for exploration of intimacy and connection.

There is no expectation of touch or contact, and each participant is given tools for finding and holding their own personal boundaries.

This is an opportunity to let go of the busyness in our lives and in our heads, and really sink deeply into our body wisdom and experience our authentic selves.

title: The Goddess Array: Tantra meets Neuroscience
description:
"What women need, that men don't need, to fully activate sexually. Informational/experiential workshop for couples with at least one female!

Inspired by Naomi Wolf's Vagina (her book, not the real thing). So if no-one's told you, or you haven't noticed yet, men and women are different! Just how different, particularly in sexual response, is only recently being discovered by western science. The famous study of sexuality in the swinging sixties by Masters and Johnson was largely about male sexuality and in a stunning failure of the scientific method they kinda assumed women were pretty much the same......""two arms, two legs, a head, yeah, I think they're pretty much going to react the same way...."" without actually finding out until 50/60 years later!

But there are and have been more enlightened cultures than ours on these matters. It turns out that some eastern cultures had got a very detailed handle on female sexuality thousands of years ago. Ancient tantric teachings turn out to be not a set of arcane practises based on spiritual mumbo jumbo but precise systems of activating the fullness of the feminine sexual response, now being verified by the latest research in neuroscience in the west.

Wolf calls this range of specific stimulations the Goddess Array, and I shall attempt to describe the steps that every woman needs that men don't need and create a container for you to experience the majority of them in one of Naked Heart's carpeted domes. 

Please bring nesting materials and a secret gift for your goddess.
print_description: What women need, that men don't need, to fully activate sexually. Informational/experiential workshop for couples with at least one female!.

title: Belly2Belly
description:
Partnered breathing meditation focused on generating intimacy, emotional openness, and physical bonding in a safe, guided, non-sexual way.

"Belly2Belly partnered breathing meditation is a deceptively simple process that rests on multiple dimensions of neurobiology, pranayama, focused sensory awareness, tantric ritual, intimate communion, witness consciousness, sound entrainment, sequenced relaxation, psychological regression, shadow work, neurolinguistic programming, wizardry and primate zoology.

The exercises are designed to dissolve the Western experience of separate self into rhythmic waves of sensation and feeling that are shared with a partner in real time.

What results is a profoundly felt sense of peace and connection, a natural biochemical high that neuro-mirrors intimate love, meditative samadhi and mystical oneness.

The Belly2Belly practices were developed by David Cates in his healing work with sexual trauma. The results were so  potent that David adapted many of the exercises to share in groups.

In groups, we focus on generating intimacy, emotional openness, and physical bonding in a safe, slow, guided non-sexual way. We reawaken our primal need for human connection, animal to animal, body to body, heart to heart, without the stress or uncertainty of sex. By trusting our bodies and each other, we reclaim our original innocence... and remember we are safe.".
print_description: Partnered breathing meditation focused on generating intimacy, emotional openness, and physical bonding in a safe, guided, non-sexual way.

title: She Rises: A New Story for a New Paradigm
description: Gather for a radical retelling of the times we are living in through a storytelling ceremony. We'll introduce a new creation myth that examine our life through the lens of Cosmology and explore how Earth's relationship between the masculine and feminine influence the evolution of the planet. We’ll keep an eye on history, connect the dots about what is happening on the planet, and hold a vision of the future. Come to participate ... or enjoy the show. What if we aren’t killing Mother Earth? But are holding the dream of who our girl Earth wants to be when she grows up?

title: Eye Gazing and Hugging with Niraj
description:
"2 of the most natural + nourishing forms of human intimacy. Experience ways to get more out of these interactions than you ever thought possible!

Most people avoid eye contact, especially prolonged, and are pretty uncomfortable in a long embrace. Is it any wonder? Did you ever take a class in either of these? Was physical and emotional intimacy part of your schooling? Has anyone ever shown you or taught you HOW to do these things? No. Our culture could care less about how we demonstrate love and affection for one another. That's for the birds, right? Well, no. Women need face to face eye contact with their mates on a daily basis to feel relaxed. They need to be seen. And everyone needs to be touched, lovingly and respectfully, with consent. It is up there with oxygen, so come and learn some tips and tricks how to be a better hugger and a more relaxed, er...looker!".

title: The Tantra Spa
description:
"Half the group get creative and offer a one-on-one experience somewhere (anywhere!) on the spectrum of erotic delight. 2nd hour, we switch.

What is it you'd like to experience? A foot massage? Orgasm? To feel completely held? Spanked? Squashed? Tickled? Tongued? Only you know in the moment what you would like to feel. Whatever it is and wherever it fits in the pantheon of carnal pleasures, there is one sure fire way of experiencing it. Offer it as a service to others! 'Cos giving is receiving, right? 

Write your offering on a piece of paper (supplied). Half the group offer, half receive. Every 8 mins I ring a bell and receivers get to wander the Spa and choose another offering. After an hour, the receivers write down a whole new set of Tantra Spa delights, now inspired by what they've seen, heard and experienced and the former givers now get chance to sample the menu as receivers.".

title: The Game
description:
The Game has a simple premise; Draw a card from the deck and the player does what is written. 
 “The Game”: the love child of truth or dare, charades, post office, twister, spin the bottle, and "American's Got talent".
 “The Game” is perfect for letting one's imagination out to play. 
Watch what happens when permission is given to create, with wanton abandon. 
“The Game” is both a game of chance and skill (if you want to believe that.)
 Remove a self-limiting perspective, gain new insights in creative problem solving. 
Come play 'The Game' at the dusty taint.

title: Tickling & Sensual Touch from sensual to sadistic
description:
Touch is a vital part of whom we are, how we interact with the world, and most importantly how you connect with a partner or loved one. Many of us have engaged in sensual touch with a lover or tickling at a young age, but are you aware of how well the two can work together to make an amazing sensory experience with someone? Whether it is tickling to tears, to moans of delight, or simply squirming Domme Kelli Lynn Sage and Bagelfather are well versed in this and will be leading this class in sensual touch and the art of tickling with a partner. We have learned the ropes over the years and want to pass our wisdom on to you. We will instruct you, with the help of audience volunteers, in the art of tickling and sensual touch. 

We will also cover consent, basic bondage, negotiation, safe words, having a positive relationship with kink, as well as touching. This event is for those 18 years old and over (please bring your ID if you look young). People of all gender identities are welcome to attend. It is best if you can come with a partner so you can practice some of what you learn, if you come alone we cannot guarantee to partner you up with someone. We recommend bringing a towel or something similar to lay on the ground to sit on. In addition we ask that you be respectful of all participants and remind you to ask before touching someone that you have not made arrangements before hand.

If you wish to volunteer ahead of time email Bagelfather@gmail.com, also feel free to let us know before we start if you are interested in demonstrating.
print_description: Learn about the sensual touch and tickling playful to "mean." Please bring something to it on and a partner if you can. Demos and hands-on learning.

Take a spin on Shot Roulette at the CaSINo or get a radical Changeover at the Chapel. Discover which of the seven deadly vices will send your soul into ruin this week!

title: Why is Conscious Uncoupling for Lovers?
description: How would life look if our partings were filled with Love & Honor? How do we evolve from old paradigms of Soul-mate to Soul-hate? Why bother?  What if all your relationships were full of compassion and honor, from rev up to wind down and into a different phase of friendship, marked by honesty and generosity for others and yourself.  How did we get here, and how do we get there from here?  What is a source fracture and how is it effecting our capacity for Love today? Are you stuck in a mire of blaming, self-loathing, or inability to trust?  With the assistance of wisdom dispensed by relationship expert Katherine Woodward Thomas, and the life changing jewels of clarity by human connection expert Dr Brene Brown, lets explore together how to make the deepest levels of Love possible!  The power is in you to begin this reality today!
print_description: How would life look if our partings were filled with Love & Honor? How do we evolve from old paradigms of Soul-mate to Soul-hate? Why bother?.

title: Intimacy through Japanese rope bondage
description: An exciting, hands-on introductory workshop on the historical and artistic world of Shibari. Explore reasons for wanting to tie or be tied up, the safety factors involved, how to choose the right ropes and lengths. We teach foundational ties, and some intriguing variations, as well as explore a dynamic use of bondage from the sensual to the artistic. No previous rope experience is necessary.
print_description: Experience the deep connection that arises when the ancient Japanese art is used to create a space of embodied listening and surrender ~.

title: The Humaniversity AUM Meditation
description:
Release your stress and reclaim the joy of being alive.
This Humaniversity AUM meditation guides you in a safe and supportive environment through 14 aspects of the human experience: personal power, forgiveness, love, stamina, life energy, chaos, dance, sadness, laughter, sensuality, chanting, silence, respect and sharing. It is a Social Meditation that combines movement, role playing, and vocal expression. By participating in the AUM Meditation you can experience a deep sense of aliveness, warmth, relaxation and acquire a taste for life again!
print_description: Release your stress and reclaim the joy of being alive.

title: "Partners in Flow  "
description:
""Partners in Flow"" is a movement based share that takes the weight sharing elements of Contact Improv and melds it with partnered dancing for dancers and those seeking to start moving. 
We will explore what I call “The Flow Loop”. TFL is what I see happening within connected partnerships when we listen, respond, allow ourselves to be inspired and share our own voice. My belief is that investigating these principals will give us the tools to create more dances in the “SWEET SPOT”, where your brain gets to shut off and you body moves with grace.
If you have never dance before, Gina will take you though exercises that will give you the confidence to move with another person. 
And, if you are an accomplished dancer from any genre consider this your cross training. Gina will be exposing  you to concepts that will take your dance to the next level. Specifically giving you some tools to enable you to have connection and conversation with all levels of dancers. 
Come play with us!
print_description: Partners in Flow is a movement based share using weight sharing elements of Contact Improv and partnered dancing.

title: A Symphony at the Temple (Weather permitting)
description: The PlayaPops is glad to offer its fourth season of acoustic classical + programing for our 2017 season. We are 80+ string, woodwind, brass, percussion, and other musicians performing a one hour program including Sprach Zarathrustra (you know this--- 2001: A Space Odyssey), a movement from a Mozart Symphony (Jupiter), Rainbow Connection, Carmina Burana (you all know this piece lol),  Beethoven X2 (Egmont Overture and Ode to Joy), Dance of the Ghazies, Ashokan Farewell, and Radiohead! …We’ll also have premier soloists and audience participation…Come join us for something truly different for our 5 show season (with one back up performance time) for 2017!
print_description: The Playapops Symphony honor all, We provide classical music to enrich.

title: Slap, Bump, Choke BRC Brazilian Jiu Jitsu Club
description:
Slap Bump and Choke. BRC BJJ Club
Camp Settle This Like Men brings you an opportunity to Slap, Bump and Choke in a non-sexual, but still mostly consensual, way. Burning Mans’ only Jiu Jitsu club, we offer almost 400 s.f. of grappling mats for you to get your Jits Fix in. We’ll have Black Belt instruction almost every day, unless they’re hung over, in which case you’ll get an inferior substitute.
Class at 11:00, Free Rolling (gi or no-gi) at 11:30. Loaner gis available.  
Sure, we’ll choke you, or bend your arms backwards, but it’s all in good fun. Think of it as involuntary yoga. Open mat free rolling begins at 11:30, and that’s when the real fun begins. 
Bring your gi! We’ll have some loaners, but only in my size, A2, or A3. Or, go no gi. Just wear something over your junk. This ain’t that kind of camp.
print_description: Camp Settle This Like Men brings you an opportunity to Slap, Bump and Choke in a non-sexual, but still mostly consensual, way. BRC's only BJJ!.

title: Live Figure Drawing! Artists and Models Needed!
description:
Center Camp Café : Live Figure Drawing! Artists and Models needed!
Daily Tuesday through Friday 3pm-4:30pm - look for the circle of seats around the platform towards the 3 o’clock side of the Spoken Word stage.  Seating is limited!
We supply sketch paper, easels and drawing materials, FC/FS or bring your own!
Want to be a model for artists? Clothing optional!  No experience necessary! Models can sign up in advance at the Volunteer booth (located at the 9 o’clock end of the coffee counter) at least 30 minutes before start time for a better shot at a slot. We get a lot last minute walk up models. 
It doesn’t matter if you are a gifted artist or a beginner who always wanted to try your hand at figure drawing or modeling- come give it a try!

title: Clothing Option Qi Gong
description:
QI: The life energy that flows through and permeates all things, according to Ancient Eastern Medicine (AEM). Their version of The Force, essentially. According to AEM, slow or weak qi is the reason we feel weak. Stagnant qi is the reason we feel PAIN.
GONG: A lifelong process for improving, enhancing and perfecting something.

QI GONG: A lifelong process for improving, enhancing and perfecting your qi.

CLOTHING OPTIONAL: If you don't know what this means, I won't be the one to tell you.

AEM teaches us that sweat is chi leaving the body, so if there's anywhere you need this, it's on the playa. Come build that nourishing life energy every morning after breakfast with your favorite Seattle burner!

DISCLAIMER: I am not, and don't claim to be, any sort of qi gong master. I'm just someone who knows a thing or two about it and would like to share it with the playa.
print_description: QI: The life energy that flows through and permeates all things, according to Ancient Eastern Medicine (AEM).

title: Bang Bang's Wild Animal Party
description:
Every year Bang Bang throws super welcoming Wild Animal Party, this year will be no different. This is our turn to get you feet dancing once again, get the neighbours over and invite all our new friends from the Playa. Got leopard print. Damn it you are invited. A human who likes to dance like an Animal, you are invited. Got a heartbeat you are invited. Well in fact our Camp is briefed to invite everyone they meet from all over The Playa, so basically YOU ARE INVITED!

We will be serving Saloon Juice and slinging Aussie slang and insults at you all night long (remember we are joking 99% of the time).  Our good friends from many other camps in the Tokyo Sector will be there as well to come and DJ while we entertain, so escape your own sector, hit the back streets and join us at this neighbourhood / suburb party, where we can just literally be silly like we are at a Wild Animal House party. 

Rated 5 stars on some app, given two thumbs up by two guys, worth every second of your time said some guy last year.
print_description: We will be serving saloon Juice and slinging Aussie slang at you all night long, great people, wild animal behaviour and amazing sounds to sway you.

title: Capoeira Workshop & Roda & Discussion
description: Join us for an intro to Capoeira class and a round table discussion about the relationship between culturally-rooted movement and cultural appropriation versus appreciation. We will discuss what it is like to be an insider/outsider in a world of a movement style with a complex history of liberation ideology.

title: Captain Scurvy’s Shanty Sing
description: Shiver me timbers! Shanties ahoy! Come have some grog and sing with us!  Lyric sheets provided.  Bring a shanty, let your vocal chords be free!   Shanties are songs that were sung by sailors, starting about in the early 18th century, as work songs, that helped tedious and difficult work get done (kind of like setting up your camp).   We will sing a variety of sea-faring songs in addition to shanties, such as fo'c's'le songs, sea ballads, and even sea porn.

title: Get Blintzed on our Blinis
description:
Blintzkrieg is a theme camp centered on the ritual of breaking fast to the core of people’s beings by nourishing their tummies and taste buds with delicious and surprising flavors. After a long night on the playa wouldn’t you like a “schmoke und a pancake? No?” Well then, how about a blintz!
 
What is a blintz?  It’s like a crepe, only tastier and more transportable, something quintessential when it comes to all the lightning-quick decisions you have to make on the playa.  A blintz is one standard-issue crepe pancake combined with a sweet, cottage cheese-like filling (or a savory potato and onion filling) that is then rolled into a small burrito-like form to fit nicely in the palm of your hand. Delicious!
 
Come groove with the camp and ask your skilled blintz chefs for the latest flavor, and hang around in our shade structures to meet other hungry travelers. Blintzes will be offered every day from 9:00 AM to 11:00 AM, or until we’re out of blintzes.
print_description: Ready to get blintzed? Blintzes (think crêpe, but better) will be offered every day from 9:00 AM to 11:00 AM, or until we’re out of blintzes.
other_location: 8:45 and C, as well as spontaneous offerings around the city

title: Brooklyn Block Party
description:
Bored with the Snooze House and Playa Tech everywhere on playa? BROOKLYN’S GOT YOU. 

Come get your groove on under the Brooklyn Bridge, Chrysler Building, and Empire State Building! Our DJs and MCs will be spinning only the hottest throwback jams, 90’s hip hop and R&B, while you strut yo stuff on our runway and get harassed by vagrants in the K Train.



We’ll be linking sound systems across all boroughs with art cars The Electric Bubble Bus, Thunderius Gumbonium Lahontanii, Art Carfunkel, the MyPlayaPonies, Sparkle and Flame + surprise car guests!



Brought to you by New York City's Kostume Kult, Thunder Gumbo, Kashyyk, Heroes & Super Villains and Magic Hour.

title: Ariadne’s Labyrinth @ PartySnail Maenads
description: Ariadne was the immortal wife of the wine-god Dionysos.  Her labyrinth, which we set up on the playa, is for you to enjoy.  Labyrinth walking in an ancient practice used by many different faiths for spiritual centering and contemplation. Entering the serpentine path of a labyrinth, the walker walks slowly while quieting their mind and focusing on a spiritual question or prayer.  Lose yourself to find yourself.  Look for the colorful fabric and multicoloted LED rope lights at night.

title: DUST-ed
description: DUST-ed is a new educational program presented by PlayaSkool, the co-founders and creators of TEDxBlackRockCity. Have you ever really fucked something up but learned a shit ton from the experience? Startups, projects, businesses, relationships . . . we all take it in the kisser sometimes. Quite often, these "interruptions" can lead to amazing breakthroughs in business, life and relationships. We want to focus on some of the biggest and most amazing stories from within the Black Rock City community where citizens overcame adversities only to thrive in the the wake of failure. Come and SHARE with us!

title: Feldenkrais Workshop w/Shara Ogin @ RhythmWave
description: At the seat of our souls, core to all of our ambition and desire lies our heart. Though gentle, relaxing movement sequences along with inspirational meditation, you will leave the class standing straighter and taller and with your shoulders falling back behind your chest. If you are experiencing any pain, you might find it improve or resolve throughout the class.  Feldenkrais helps with the realignment of our bones, muscles and joints and with the coordination of our overall movement patterns. This will help you with your late nights dancing to the beats, or with walking long distances through the desert. As we radiate more love out into the world, the world can’t help but smile back.  And with that, only magical shifts can follow.
print_description: Gentle somatic Feldenkrais exercises to help your heart to beam forth, w/Shara on the bamboo at RhythmWave. Yoga mat recommended.

title: Hechi-Ken Hamazaki / Red Tea Ceremony -YOU ARE GOD
description: Art performance by Japanese contemporary artist, Ken Hamazaki. This performance was inspired by and arranged from traditional Japanese tea ceremony. The original ceremony consists of a variety of manners to drink, but to experience this fully, please simply drink with a style you favor most. The most interesting practice would be turning your thoughts inward for a few minutes without speaking and enjoy drinking in this small silent space. I always serve this tea for whoever sits down in front of me. Red Tea Ceremony -YOU ARE GOD- is always a great tool to communicate universally without any thought of hierarchy. I'll be happy if we could find any great idea to make a brighter, better, and more enjoyable future through this tea ceremony.
print_description: Art performance by Japanese contemporary artist, Ken Hamazaki. Please simply drink with a style you favor most.

title: Poly High Juice Box
description: Think poly is complicated enough? Try adding children to the mix. Weather you're poly with children, or otherwise in an open relationship with or contemplating children, this special Poly High Tea discussion is for you. Bring the kids and lets hear from them if you like (or dare)! If all this seems overly daunting, don't worry - it is! So let's put our dusty heads and hearts together and see what we come up with. This is an open discussion facilitated by Peter & Gretchen (aka Adam & Eve) about all things poly with children. This will be their 8th Burn, and the second with their 5 year old daughter, Veronica. Don't expect us to have all the answers, instead come to both learn and teach! Juice boxes and animal crackers provided to help grease the conversation.

title: Be Master/Mistress of Stones: The Art of Fresco!
description:
We’re BAAAAACK!

By popular demand, Mr.+Ms. Mudd are again hosting our fresco classes for Burning Man 2017, this time at Black Rock City Welding and Repair!

Our greeting: Come and get PLASTERED! ;o)

We invite you all to “Becoming the Master/Mistress of Stones: The Arts of Buon Fresco!”

Our host theme camp, Black Rock City Welding & Repair (Thank You for having us! ;), welcomes you all to their location for these wonderful fresco workshops/classes.

Here’s the scoop:

Apprentices will learn the various old time techniques to create a fresco (block) from scratch to take home. Participants will learn to recreate various historical mixtures that compromise the surfaces of the block, complete with plastering, cartooning, and finally, the stages of painting the actual fresco with pigments. The result? A beautiful, yet portable and tangible, aged piece of buon fresco that becomes your momento of inspired learning at Burning Man. ;)

Upon completing your fresco block, you will receive a Playa Master of Arts certificate, authorizing you to be plastered anywhere on the playa!
All materials are provided, simply bring yourself, and enjoy this wonderful, enduring art process that is ‘old as time.’

Details:
Our location is at Black Rock Welding & Repair, where we’ll have our classes. See you there!

That’s NOT all!
We’re offering an unique community event; we invite everyone to participate w/ your hearts+energy:
@Playa Art Park+elsewhere on the playa, we offer you our rocking ‘Paper Boats,’ for creation of wonderful music+inspiration for your soul.

The Blurb:
#Land Pirates Ahoy! ‘Paper Boats’ be Rockin’ Waves; you Scalawags get to Work— HEAR Music Created by Motion and Winds that Lash About! Decks be scrubbed with Words Learned!
There be CHRISTENINGS, Mateys! Bubbly cider+water served to all #Land Pirates that attend! (Bring yer cups and while supplies last! ;)

Find us—Join us @1pm!
print_description: Let’s get PLASTERED! Apprentices will learn Art of Fresco. Upon completion of a fresco block, you’ll be CERTIFIED Plastered Master of the Playa! ;o).

title: The Divine Masculine & Feminine Healing Circle
description: 'The Divine Masculine and Feminine Healing Circle' is an event where the men of the playa are invited to step into their higher selves, and consciously hold the energy of the Divine Masculine. Josie Posie leads a ceremony where the women of the playa welcome the men lovingly at the entrance to the dome, inviting them to match the high vibration they hold. The dome becomes an Ancient temple space. The men then stand in a circle offering unconditional love and healing to the community of women who gather in the center. The women come for healing their trust of the Masculine and to receive their love. This is a hands-off workshop. There is no touching except optional hugging at the end. When men show up and become the pure presence of their Divine Masculine nature and truly witness, then women can relax into their loving Divine Feminine nature and fully become that love. As both polarities open to their Divine essence, we transmute cultural wounds in the collective feminine and masculine for all of humanity, co-creating a needed and beautiful new story of balance.
print_description: HEAL the rift between the Masculine & Feminine? Men create the outer ring, witnessing.  Women are inside, receiving. Love transforms all.

title: Free your Voice, Free your Spirit!
description: We will take a brief look at what the voice is both mechanically and spiritually. This will provide context for why it is terrifying for so many of us to speak or sing in public. title: Playa Recipe Swap Meet
description:
This is an open forum for culinary enthusiasts. Let us create a burning man gift together: a playa recipe cookbook! Join a relative newbie on a quest for radical self-reliance at her second burn; the quest for good-as-homemade food with no RV, a very long drive, and a small budget.
 
Let’s talk about food! Share in my journey from one week of nothing but military rations to setting up my first playa kitchen. Learn with me about frozen pre-made meals, dehydrated pre-planned meals, coolers, and home-made solar ovens. Teach me what you have learned about cooking on the playa, swap recipes and techniques. If I have had any success, we can also share something tasty from the solar oven!
print_description: Swap playa recipes with other food enthusiasts! Share your methods, and learn solar cooking. Together, we will create a gift: a BM cookbook!.

title: "PRIMAL REVIVAL Knowing Your Role In Tribe "
description:
"Hyarchy is a circle and getting back to our design is key to healing the worlds chaos. Who are you and what to you bring to the tribe? Alpha, Omega, Gamma, Beta, Dleta... what's your designed role? 

How can we ALL be empowered through understanding to thrive as tribe then be at war? 

How can we all take our seats at the table and go from isolation or codependency to interdependency? 

How do we heal our communal world through our human animal bodies and contributions? 

These are the questions we will visit, contemplate, and ponder together as we discover ourselves and what we are born to be. Blending and mending in order to join together and crush it! ".

title: Be a Lamplighter!
description:
Lamplighting and Sacred Ritual!

The Lamplighters are one of the longest-running moving art projects on the playa, and one of the many longstanding daily rituals of Black Rock City. Drawing from lamplighters of ancient cities, the Lamplighters gather volunteers from the city each night and maintain, light, and hang over 900 kerosene lamps in a procession that goes through the heart of Black Rock City. Come and be a part of the our sacred ritual.
print_description: Come be part of the longest art installation RITUAL on playa! Meet at our Center Camp Workspace, All are Welcome!.

We, as the empowered sexual and feminine wombyn brand new to today's world are hungry to rejoin one another in walking this Earth and here is where we can start that journey together. Honoring that our type of wombyn is the first generation of its kind, built from the efforts of our fore mothers and ancestors, we will give thanks and give way to what has to come next to keep progressing. 

Now that we are these powerful juicy GWADDESSES, what now? 

Here is a space where Muse will lead you through teachings and practices, not to mention you receiving or teaching super delicious technique, to go back into your lives not only fully liberated wombyn, but now more INTEGRATED wombyn! ".

title: Use Your Breath to Free Your Life
description:
"Release stuck emotions, stagnant energy and outdated patterns. Open inner and cosmic portals, access truth, and experience bliss w/o drugs. Please be sober --

Sovereign Breath creates an altered state in which many experiences are possible facilitated by your higher self. Bring what you most want to release, shift, gain insight about, step into, affirm and create. Be ready for change. This form of breathwork grows out of Rebirthing and is a more feminine, gentle and allowing practice than other more aggressive and cathartic forms. This approach makes more effective the integration of your insights and transformation into ordinary reality, and is easier on the nervous system, and is easier on the nervous system. Deep states of bliss and bonding among participants are common.".

title: Embodied Intimacy: Belly2Belly
description:
"The Belly2Belly practice is a relational breathing meditation, cultivating connection by relating with what is here, right now, within and in between. Utilizing the core tools of Tantra: Breath, Sound, Movement and Touch we slow way down to be together, just as we are. Drop in all the way, fully into your body. Down, in, open and relax. Feel the fullness that arises from within. Breathe deeply into your sovereign experience. Land, ground into your sense of self and feel your boundaries in relation to others.
Meeting and greeting new people in a festival environment is inherently exciting and anxiety provoking. From a survival standpoint we are testing strangers before we invite them in. So in this collective field of unlimited interactive potential, how do we honor the wisdom of our bodies while connecting with others and with what wants to happen? When animals are safe they play, so do we. ".
print_description: Belly2Belly is a relational meditation, cultivating connection with what is here, right now.

title: Evening Disco Spa
description:
On Thursday evening, Never-Land will host an Evening Disco Spa! 
Let's face it, by Thursday night, people are tired, dirty and burned out. Let us pamper and refresh you before you head back out for a night of debauchery. Relax in our cuddle puddle with aromatherapy cooling towels and face masks, refreshing drinks at our bar, or take a quick nap in our cooling hammocks.

During the Evening Disco Spa, our licensed massage therapist, Scott, will provide quick massages to refresh your weary body. (Due to the time constraint, we will ask that people sign up for a time slot in advance). Our trained barista, Kyle, will provide guests with coffee samples to give them that boost of energy for the night. Nurse Rico will be on hand to make sure you are hydrated at our hydration station. Our resident DJs will provide you with funky beats for you to begin your night with dancing under our disco ball. Our trained bartenders will be serving magical cocktails (and mocktails). The Never-Land Disco Spa will run from 8 - 10 PM on Thursday night. We can't wait to pamper you.
