title: The Path of (Open) Relating
description:
"We invite you to this gathering of Spiritually Minded, Open, Fluid, LGBTQ, Polyamorous, Polysensuous, Polycurious, Monogamomish people. This is a safe, fun way to meet new people who are also participating in Open Relating and to gain some practical tools for your relationship or future relationship(s)!

To chose to live and relate in an open or polyamorous way requires a community of like-minded souls. Without community we do not have the necessary support we need as couples and individuals to love as big as our hearts desire.

Why we each consciously choose to live in alternative ways then the ones that were passed down to us from earlier generations is very personal. Some do it to increase the variety of sexual partners and others do it as a spiritual path to embrace the light and shadow of opening up.

There are many ways to make it work. Some people have stated agreements meanwhile others rely on embodied principles and some are just totally radical. Regardless of your personal preference, most of us were not raised with role models for this alternative way of relating. So we must come together to role model and mirror one another.

As the definition and practice of relating is expanding beyond what we were taught unconsciously by our parents we want to invite you to join the conversation. How do you navigate these waters? What have you found that works? Come just to listen and observe or come to participate and add your own thoughts, questions and perspectives into the conversation.

We invite you to share what is most alive in your heart and come join the conversation of open relationships where we aim to come together to create a Culture of Conscious Relating.".
print_description: How to have your cake and eat it too! Let's discover the magic available in a culture of conscious open relating.

title: Stealing Fire: Secret Revolution in Altered States
description: Over the past decade, Silicon Valley executives like Eric Schmidt and Elon Musk, Special Operators like the Navy SEALs and the Green Berets, and maverick scientists like Sasha Shulgin and Amy Cuddy have turned everything we thought we knew about high performance upside down. Instead of grit, better habits, or 10,000 hours, these trailblazers have found a surprising short cut. They’re harnessing rare and controversial states of consciousness to solve critical challenges and outperform the competition.

title: Sailing the Dead Seas: Rockin’ the Boats!
description:
Rituals Arts Collective's 'Sailing the Dead Seas: Rockin' the Boats!' installation is anchored in our childhood; you'll see a flotilla of oversized, whimsical, origami-like colorful 'paper boats,' each floating upon its 'waves.' Each boat is actually a teeter totter, ready to be rocked by the participants. As every craft has environmental sensors installed within, you'll hear incredible, albeit low-key musical tones, as 'played' by the wind, and motion of the boats. The effect is bio-elemental, aural soothing of our minds. Participants will find the interior of the (easily accessible) boats gilded in silver and gold, filled with inspirational quotes to complete the experience. Each ship/shrine has materials to write 'notes of hope' and means of containing these utterances by attendees (Truth be told, these boats act as walk-aboard shrine(s) to inspire Burning Man attendees to leave notes for us to burn off-playa in a ceremony, so their wishes may be granted to the winds after the Burning Man event. ;) The reason for 'Dead Seas' in the title is twofold: the playa's dry lake bed, and the actual Dead Sea in Jordan-- both have high mineral content, that which nourishes souls who 'float' in it. 

That’s NOT all! ;o)

There be CHRISTENINGS, Ye Mateys! Help us christen our boats at the Playa Art Park and on the Playa itself!

Monday, 1:00 pm: 

Our lead ship will be christened, and bubbly cider and water will be served to all #Land Pirates that attend! (But of course, bring yer cups and while supplies last! ;)

Tuesday, 1:00 pm: 

Our first flotilla of ships on the playa will be christened, and bubbly cider and water will be served to all #Land Pirates that attend! (But of course, bring yer cups and while supplies last! ;)

Wednesday, 1:00 pm: 

Our second flotilla of ships on the playa will be christened, and bubbly cider and water will be served to all #Land Pirates that attend! (But of course, bring yer cups and while supplies last! ;).
print_description: #Land Pirates Ahoy! ‘Paper Boats’ Rockin’ Waves; Scalawags to Work! HEAR Music Created by Motion+Winds Lashing About! Decks scrubbed w/ WORDS LEARNED!.

title: Power of Prayer Closing Ceremony - Medicine Wheel
description:
You are invited to join Red Lightning and First Nations as we sit together under the Medicine Wheel and close our Radical Ritual with the extinguishing of the Sacred Fire.

Our life is a ceremony.  And this year, we gathered to ceremonially engage in a Radical Ritual together on the dusty Playa land. The extinguishing of this Sacred Fire marks the closing of our week-long ceremony at Burning Man. 

How have you learned to appreciate fire during our ceremony together? 
How have you learned to work with the spirit of the fire?
How will you carry this prayer forward, and back to your communities? How will you keep your own Sacred Fire lit? How will you continue to shine your light in the darkness?

Fire feeds the seeds of intention of what we seek to call forth. Fire is also a purifier. Send everything that no longer serves you into your own Sacred Fire to purify your heart, body, mind, and soul.  Keep the memory of what occurred this year during our Radical Ritual with you, and bring it back to your community.
print_description: Join us and First Nations' representatives as we extinguish the Sacred Fire and close out our Radical Ritual together under the Medicine Wheel.

title: Balance of Safety & Aliveness
description:
"How does one assess and honor their boundaries, yet still have the ability to stretch outside their comfort zone to grow beyond fears in intimate relating? 
There is a delicate balance between taking too big of a risk and acting out of integrity, versus hiding in comfort and playing it too safe. How do you balance your need for safety with your yearning for full expression? 
How do you identify your growth edge, play safe but not too safe, and keep riding that edge, take risks but not into the danger zone? Can you find the sweet spot of feeling safely embodied while growing and  expanding towards what you want? Join us for this energizing, exciting, connecting and possibly edgy exploration. Lets move through the unknown of relating into the sweet spot of living an exhilarating life while still having your own back. ".

title: Meet the Mayor
description: Be it known that the official Mayor of Burning Man resides at Camp Retrofrolic.  And each day he is scheduled to meet with any and all citizens of Black Rock City, promptly around 8:37 AM.  (Unless the Mayor sleeps in, and then he will arrive as soon as mayorly possible.)  After greeting his constituents and citizens, the Mayor will hear comments and complaints from the people of Black Rock City.  Thereafter, he will perform the sacred Airing of Grievances ritual to heal our beleaguered city.  Post ritual, the Mayor will sign autographs, pose for pictures, and give and receive gifts.  (Gifts will not be misinterpreted as bribes, officially.).
print_description: After greeting constituents and citizens of BRC, the official Mayor will hear complaints and perform the sacred Airing of Grievances ritual.

title: Ho‘oponopono Forgiveness Meditation @ RhythmWave

Together we will be clearing out preconceptions of how we view others to create new connections and rejuvenated relationships. This is a guided, easygoing embodied and joyful meditation. In true RhythmWave spirit we will use a little rhythm to align our bodies in our seats. The Hawaiian word ho‘oponopono comes from ho‘o ("to make") and pono ("right").

title: Come find out Your Natural Energy
description:
At 9 Energies Pavilion - Come find out Your Natural Energy. Understanding your Natural Energy enables you to recognize your gifts, gain a better understanding of yourself and others so that you can live a happier and more embodied life. Through a simple physical process your body reveals your great natural abilities. Once you know your Natural Energy you can consciously use this power to move yourself forward.

9 Energies is open daily 10-4pm. After 4pm the tent is open for discussion. Please come sober!

We can re-celebrate, celebrate, and pre-celebrate any of your birthdays! We'll make sure they don't suck. We have music, drinks, and cake. Please come dressed in your feline finest, or whatever! In addition to birthday spankings and celebration, there's an open bar, DJs spinning, and a bocce ball tournament as well as our birth canal interactive obstacle course experience. title: Belly2Belly: For Couples & Pairs
description: Learn simple and effective tools for how to regulate your affect, increase your somatic sense of safety and connection with your partner. Where we are the most vulnerable, we have the strongest defenses. And it just so happens, we are the most vulnerable (and reactive) in our intimate and romantic relationships. In this playful workshop we will utilize a simple map of the nervous system. Learn who shows up to our rescue when we are triggered (into primal instincts such as Fight, Flight, Freeze, Submit, and Cry for help). We drop below the thinking mind into the wisdom of the body. To a depth from where it is easy and simple to relate most intimately. Here we drop the guard and lead with the last thing we want our partner to know about us. Vulnerably revealed, 100% responsible, allowing yourself be seen as you are, unedited, undefended, raw and exposed. This is the quickest way to intimacy and how to create healing relationships that honor the intelligence of our body, emotions and intellect.
print_description: Learn simple and effective tools for how to regulate your affect, increase your somatic sense of safety and connection with your partner.

title: DingDongSingSongBeerBongPingPong World Champs!
description:
Back for 2018, the toughest game in the Playaverse.  Kegel Kommandos and the Lake Lahontan Water Ski Club present the Black Rock City, Ding Dong, Sing Song, Beer Bong, Ping Pong World Championships.
Offering you a chance to play a very serious, Championship-level game of table tennis while eating Ding Dongs, and doing Beer Bongs at every 7 points.  A win in the game can only be claimed by demonstrating your singing ability after crushing your opponent on the table.  Presented alongside the Kegel Kommandos annual Grilled Cheese and Baconstravaganza, your stomach will hate you for days!  
Qualifying and tryouts on Thursday, August 30th at High Noon.
print_description: Drink Beer Eat Junk Food Sing Karaoke all while trying to dominate at Table Tennis.  You could be the 2017 DDSSBBPP Black Rock City World Champion!.

title: Belly2Belly: Integration
description: The Belly2Belly practice is relational breathing meditation done in full body embrace, cultivating connection by relating with what is here, right now. Utilizing the core tools of Tantra: Breath, Sound, Movement and Touch we are slowing down, and we are being together just as we are. In this edition of Belly2Belly, let’s harvest! How was your festival journey? What was the quality of the peaks and valleys? Is something left unprocessed? Is there a feeling that remains, lingering on, unfelt? Come move the energy and tend to your wings before leaving the festival to gain a sense of closure. Come to celebrate yourself, bask in the love bath you’ve cultivated and go home with a deep appreciation for the roller coaster ride that could only take place at Burning Man!
print_description: Belly2Belly is a relational breathing meditation done in full body embrace, cultivating connection by relating with what is here, right now.

title: Bang Bang's Sunset Saloon Cocktail Lounge & Casino
description:
The concept is to bring a playful vibe to the Tokyo sector, its encouraged that people flowing and exploring the 9:00 Corridor, have an flowing option between the day & the night parties. Stop in for a fun casino game (dice, cards, Aussie Two up), cheeky challenge on the wheel of risk or dare to taste vegemite before they get rewarded with a tasty cocktail. Best of all enjoy it why the day sky turns dark and the sun sets on The Playa while we also play fun music to get people in the mood for the night ahead.

The idea is that people dare to RISK something, but for every RISK, there is potential REWARD.

We are not just offering drinks, we are offering for people to participate in an experiment of gifting, sharing, laughing, joking, real people connecting and making people feel good... and we love it when people feel good.
print_description: People dare to RISK something, but for every RISK, there is potential REWARD. Play at our sunset saloon casino over a cocktail. Laugh, share & joke.

title: Power of Prayer Opening Ceremony - Medicine Wheel
description: You are invited to join Red Lightning and First Nations as we sit together under the Medicine Wheel and open our Radical Ritual with the lighting of the Sacred Fire. Our life is a ceremony. And this year, we gather to ceremonially engage in a Radical Ritual together on the dusty Playa land of the Paiute people. The lighting of this Sacred Fire marks the opening of our week-long ceremony at Burning Man. Learn to appreciate fire during our ceremony together? Learn to work with the spirit of the fire? How will you carry this prayer forward through this week of ceremony and Radical Ritual and back to your communities? How will you keep your own Sacred Fire lit? How will you continue to shine your light in the darkness? Fire feeds the seeds of intention of what we seek to call forth. Fire is also a purifier. Send everything that no longer serves you into your own Sacred Fire to purify your heart, body, mind, and soul. Open this year with a Radical Ritual and hold your prayer through the burn and bring it back to your community.
print_description: Join us for the opening ceremony under the Medicine Wheel, the lighting of the Sacred Fire lead by First Nations' wisdom keepers and tribal members.

Participants choose a piece of art which speaks to them, fill out a short adoption card, and take the art home with them to keep.  Small paintings, prints, photography, and collages are the usual mediums, much is original work, it is hard to tell what you will find.  A Gifting Box is available for your perusal, and has swag, trinkets, and small useful items.
Open during daytime hours.  The Home is curated each morning, so every day there is something new.  Hours are after coffee until suppertime.  Closed in case of rain or wild stampedes.
Donations of non-MOOPY art are welcome, but please, no food or costumes or anything large which would be hard to transport.

title: Autogenic Training-heal our mind&body
description:
Autogenic Training (AT) involves repetitions of a set of visualizations that induce a state of relaxation. AT has been shown to be an effective tool in preventative medicine, stress-related disorders and panic attacks. It can relieve tension, lessen anxiety, and enhance performance. As the world's first western developed mediation technique, AT is a neurological and psycho-physiological tool or therapy for psychological and medical self-healing. 

AT takes you through a series of validated and prescriptive mental exercises that target specific physiological reactions in the brain and body that underpin optimal health and well-being. Through the power of self-suggestion you are taught how to consciously and intentionally control your Autonomic Nervous System. AT is for anyone who wants to benefit from gaining the self-help tools to manage stress in the present and to develop long term strategies to reduce stress and anxiety. It is also of benefit for qualified or trainee psychotherapists who wish to gain a deeper trust in their relationship with 'self' and for those in the caring professions who want to learn new techniques for self-care. The technique was developed by the German psychiatrist Johannes Heinrich Schultz and first published in 1932. 

Each session can be practiced in a position chosen amongst a set of recommended postures (for example, lying down, sitting meditation, sitting like a rag doll).On a micro level of regeneration, Autogenics retrains cells, glands, the brain and organs to behave as they are ‘meant to’, that is, to work in harmony and to restore the natural order. We are now coming to understand AT’s role in neuro-plasticity, gut health, epigenetic modulation and the placebo response. The future for AT world-wide in becoming a mainstream therapy for the self-regulation of body-mind healing and optimal functioning is exciting!
print_description: AT is a powerful, restorative, mind & body technique involving simple relaxation/body awareness exercises to promote stress/anxiety management.

title: Transfoamation
description:
Transfoamation is an interactive perfoamance camp which prompts citizens of BRC to ponder self-awareness and investigate the sources of their identity through the examination of perspectives on gender, sociofomo status, race and privilege.  Set in a post Refoamation environment, our theme from last year which asked people to confess their environmental sins to animals and experience life behind bars, this year’s Transfoamation involves a multi-stage process developed in conjunction with LGTBQ community which will highlight person-to-personal exercises diving into identity as participants queue up. After completing all prefoamation rituals to join our Tranfoamation they will shed their old dusty selves and clothing, enter our transfoam chamber, and ascend to the final stage of their actual Transfoamation to oneness with the universe and their fellow human in the transblastive foam experience. 

Transfoamation will take place daily starting on Wednesday and ending on Saturday at 12:00 -1:00pm for children under 13, 1:00 - 4:20pm for all people of all ages. We are usually located near 2:15/G. 

Transfoamation is also the home base of an amazing community that services the city 24 hours a day in a number of ways.  Besides the wonder of a daily personal Transfoamation we offer, the camp serves as the home base of the volunteer professionals working with the Zendo project that provides psychological harm reduction services across the BRC.  We host trainings for Zendo staff in our camp and run a 400 plate per meal kitchen connected to the Transfoamation and Zendo.  We will have a midday hydration area at the exit of our Transfoam Dome run by our camp as well. Also part of the Transfoam camp is the Abraxas Mutant vehicle team.

Our camp changes it's name every year. Previous years we have been called Refoamation, Something Freaky This Way Foams, Fauxmirage, UFOm, Faux Mitzvah, Foamo Aragato, and Foam Saves.
print_description: A transblastive perfoamance camp. We invite you to perfoam with us from Wednesday thru Saturday 1pm to 4:20pm. Families w children 12 to 1pm.
other_location: Transfoamation Camp Location TBD formerly Refoamation, Fauxmirage, Ufoam, Faux Mitzvah, etc

title: Gloving: Glove lightshow techniques and technology
description: Gloving is a form of flow art that has been active in many music scenes for decades. Fro those whom have never seen a glove light show, it’s the art of using LEDs attached to the fingers to display a variety of  displays using different colors, styles, and technology to put on an amazing show. This class will go over the basics of a glove light show, showcase a few different styles, and explain the technology behind the different chip sets.  At the end of the class there will be a giveaway to a lucky few who will receive a glove set of their own. They  will be able to there new knowledge and share the magic of gloving with the the Burning Man Community.
print_description: This class will go over the basics of a glove light show, showcase a few different styles, and explain the technology. + A Glove set giveaway!!.

title: Stoicism: Ancient Necessary Philosophy
description: Stoicism: How an Ancient Philosophy Can Turn Us All into Laughing Vulcans.  Philosophy is often thought of as the exclusive playground of philosophy students and their professors, but what about the rest of us nincompoops? Stoicism is a philosophical school that is highly misunderstood today, and the model it offers promises us a way of living that is still applicable.  It offers different perspectives, teaches acceptance of imperfections, and demonstrate an updated Vulcan model for living: to live well and prosper.

title: Beer-in-hand Soccer
description:
Come play beer-in-hand soccer at the one and only BRC Arena Camposanto Soccer Stadium. Fire Soccer a distinct possibility. 

Camposanto es territorio futbolero. In 2012 we used a glow in the dark ball and black light to stretch the futbol games into the night.  In 2013 we built the first official stadium of Black Rock City.  “El Monumental” .  In 2014 we took the world cup to playa with a little twist, no nations, no flags, just the joy for the sport… at a very fancy stadium. In 2015 and 2016 we had a professionally measured futbol 5 field.

We do take special care of the field the whole year in order to have one of the  best sport arenas of Black Rock City.  Following the radical inclusion rule,  many other sports are practiced at the stadium during the day. Tejo, track and field, bola criolla, handball/footbal, saltimbanqui are just some, to name a few.

title: Instuments & Mate Jam Session
description: At PlayaTune we are obsessed with music and sound and there is something very beautiful about connecting over music. We have spent time, energy and money collecting a variety of instruments to share with our fellow burners. We understand that many talented musicians may not feel comfortable bringing their prized instruments to the playa. Because of this we should worked hard to create a space where musicians of all types can come, jam and connect together while also bringing beautiful sounds to the playa and enjoying some curated beverages! Our goal is to combine instrumental music with cold Mate. We provide the instruments, the space and the beverages all with the hopes that musicians will come share their special and unique talents with us in a space that fosters musical innovation and cultivates creativity. Join us for an open call Instrumental session paired with a cold mate to help lubricate your creativity and foster an environment for connection.

title: Patronus Party
description:
We're throwing a Patronus Party! Come out to Champagne Campaign for an awesome day party with music, dancing and champagne! Costumes encouraged! Harry Potter nerds welcome! 

Why Patronus and not sspirit animal? Spirit animal is a culturally appropriated term which bastardized an important and significant Native American spiritual practice into white girls calling Lindsay Lohan their spirit animal as she crashes her car drunk with Coke all over her nose. Patronus is the non-offensive Harry Potter originated word that is the animal that forms at the end of your wand to protect against dementors. #themoreyouknow 

Not sure what your Patronus is? Here's an easy quiz to find out: https://tinyurl.com/lx2k7rz

For the past nine years, a Seattle-based group of friends have been traveling to Burning Man, spreading the love of Burning Man upon return, and growing larger with each burn. In 2016, Champagne Campaign was first officially placed as a registered theme camp. The universal activity enjoyed by this group of friends is meeting at 12:00 in front of the temple every sunrise for a champagne toast to the new day. This group of friends has continued the sunrise tradition at home in Seattle, and plans sunrise champagne events during the summer. At Burning Man, Champagne Campaign is an interactive camp that hosts daily debates in a campaign-esque setting. Our champagne bar is open during debate hours to encourage lively debates paired with champagne party punch. We encourage lively debates where people are free to give their opinion no matter the absurdity and engage themselves among burners of all different backgrounds and opinions. Champagne Campaign returns to Burning Man in 2017 in that hopes that it will continue to be an interactive inclusive theme camp for years to come on playa as well as in Seattle. All proceeds go to getting our camp to the playa and stocking our bar so we can gift the joy of champagne all week long!
print_description: Champagne Campaign is throwing a Patronus Party! Come dance and pop bottles with us. Animal costumes encouraged! Harry Potter lovers welcome!.

title: Laughter Yoga
description: Start your evenings with intense laughter! We laugh for no reason, other than for exercise, and health. Relieve stress and pain, promote natural healing, and create spontaneous bonds of friendship through group laughter. It’s fun! The brainchild of Dr. Madan Kataria in India and practiced by millions worldwide, Laughter Yoga combines Unconditional Laughter with Yogic Breathing (Pranayama). Anyone can Laugh for No Reason, without relying on humor, jokes or comedy. Laughter is simulated as a body exercise in a group; with eye contact and childlike playfulness, it soon turns into real and contagious laughter. The concept of Laughter Yoga is based on a scientific fact that the body cannot differentiate between fake and real laughter. One gets the same physiological and psychological benefits. Find much more info online by searching on Laughter Yoga, but come! Enjoy!
print_description: Laughter as exercise! Laugh with others in childlike playfulness; experience the health benefits of a good, long laugh with us!.

title: Rough Body Play
description:
Does the closeness and raw animal energy of rough body play excite you? Are you excited right now, after just having read that?
Then this class is for you.
This class is an intro and overview class on rough body play: punching, smacking, kicking, and all things body-on-body. We'll talk thoroughly about safety, where you can hit, where you should stay away from, and cover the basics on several techniques. We'll talk about how you can begin to explore and have fun with this visceral and raw form of play safely (and without requiring medical care later). This event is adults only: 18+.

title: Rebirth Your Burn: The Birth Canal
description:
Join us anytime in a ritual to un-fuck your burn. Planned Playahood is proud to present our new birth canal, for you to shed the sins of yesterday and be reborn unto the dust. Spend a meditative moment in our womb of a dome, then climb into the canal and be delivered! Squeeze your way through and start the rest of your new life! It won't hurt...much. Our nearby bar, The Rusty Speculum, is open from noon to midnight. Please B.Y.O.S (Bring Your Own Sins).

Participants navigate an obstacle course of contraception devices through the interior orifice and twisty turns of the birth canal, reproducing something that we all have in common: that moment we entered into this self-reliant dusty life. Swat a sperm-shaped tether ball, pass through a leaky condom, jump over a big freakin’ bible, through a coat hanger, climb a set of stairs to nowhere, chill in the womb. 
Culminates in a slide through a giant vagina where you are re-birthed near the bar and greeted with heckling encouragement and a possible spank on the bottom from a genuine playa doctor. During clinic events, our camp members will guide canal visitors: If you need lube or a slap on the ass we are there for you. But the experience stands alone at any time of day or night. The love canal loves to be explored.

title: Longevity Stick
description: The sun’s just up, but not too hot; clothing is optional here, so adults only, please. Come for a not too early hour of low-impact exercise in the Longevity Stick Art (LSA) discipline of 12 lo-impact exercises to build balance, flexibility, strength, mental focus, breathing capacity, vitality, & open your points & channels. Bring water or hydration liquid. We have sticks for U. Master Mai Bac Dao developed Longevity Stick Art discipline while he was a prisoner of the North Vietnamese Army. He helped his fellow prisoners restore and maintain health thru LSA, and vowed if he was ever freed, he’d dedicate his life to spread its benefits, with this proviso: No trainer may ever charge for it. (Like "gifting," eh?) He was freed, moved to Southern California, and taught classes of students and future teachers. Today, weekly classes abound in So Cal, around the US, & the world. See: www.longevitystick.org/Longevitystick.org/Home.html and www.filmbaby.com/films/2341 .
print_description: Sun’s up, not too hot, but clothes R optional. It’s low-impact exercise to add balance, open points, channels. Bring H2O. We have the sticks!.

title: The Significance of a Pause - Meditation
description: A simple pause allows for life to become real, awake, and at times it can be incredibly uncomfortable. title: Why the Divine Feminine Wants You to be Rich
description: They say "Diamonds are a girl's best friend" but really it's "Financial literacy is a girl's best friend." Goddesses and boss bitches only. When a woman is economically independent and wields the energy of money powerfully, she shines her light to the fullest, thereby elevating the Feminine and healing the planet. The current state of the world we live in - war, social issues, environmental destruction, financial crises - reflects the distortion & dominance of the Masculine. Nothing has been more devastating to the evolution of our collective consciousness towards a higher state of oneness, love, and cooperation. Let's stop perpetuating the repression of the feminine by settling for less and being less Goddess than we are.

Let yourself be tied by our rope masters as we teach you the basic fundamental ties in rope bondage. Learn to tie yourself and others in our interactive class. Every class will begin with a ritual sacrifice to the bondage god, our tribute will be bound to the web. Afterword anyone is invited to learn to bind a partner or yourself.
print_description: Come Drink kinky cocktails and delicious tea! Learn to Tie Shibari Rope Bondage. Lounge in our lavash Rope web and be bound or bind someone to drink.

title: Burner Culmination Ceremonies
description:
Burner Culmination Ceremonies
Join our camp for Burnt Mitzvah (13 burns) and Burn-cinera (15 burns) celebrations.  Relive foggy memories and tell creative lies about past Burning Man events and regionals you have attended.  S'mores will be served.
print_description: Celebrate Burn Mitzvahs(13 burns) and Burncineras(15 burns) with us. Relive foggy memories and tell creative lies about past events. Dessert served!.

title: What is Tantra and why do I care?
description: Tantra...a big word with a lot of misconceptions. Let us together have a conversation about classical, neo, red, white and any other modifier words we may have! Is tantra all about sex? What are some of the source texts? How can this ancient wisdom be of practical use in my modern life?
print_description: What is Tantra & how does this ancient wisdom practically apply to my modern life? Talk plus Q&A. Come let us listen and learn together.

The Cat's Meow is a bar and lounge with a relaxing vibe. Music, neon pillows, bean bag chairs, blow up couches, cuddle puddle in a glowing blacklight paradise!!

title: Greatest Mutant Arts Parade
description: The Greatest Mutant Arts Parade will launch its 4th consecutive year of parading an improvised route through Black Rock City and the Playa.  Mutant Art Vehicles will unite to celebrate the unique and diverse spectacle that is Burning Man. The goals of the Greatest Mutant Arts Parade (GMAP) is to create a future planned route event...where Black Rock City can unite together in an uncensored, magnificent Meet and Greet of Mutant Art Vehicles, Theme Camps, BORG Organizers, Art Groups, Marching bands, Bicycle Crews, Stilt Walkers, and much much more. Look for the parade on its rogue route around Noon on the Playa, through the City...where??? We cannot tell you the route. But we will start and stop the parade at Reverbia Camp (3:45 and Esplanade)  ****All interested participant vehicles and people who would like to assist...then ride in the parade...contact us via email.
print_description: Come join us for our 4th consecutive year as we parade on an improvised route through Black Rock City and the Playa.  Mutant Art Vehicles UNITE!!!.

title: Bonobo Lodge
description: Join a sensual network. Each person is a node, touch is how we connect, every exchange strengthens the social bonds. We’re inspired by our primate cousins, the Bonobo chimpanzees, who resolve the tension of conflict through intimacy rather than violence (most of the time). We've adapted grooming practices seen throughout the animal kingdom to activate good-vibe hormones, which signal feelings of safety, belonging, and well-being. This is a naked experience where you should expect to touch and be touched by someone you don't already know, within a carefully structured and monitored program. All are welcome. Space is limited.
print_description: Join a sensual network. Each person is a node, touch is how we connect, every exchange strengthens the social bonds. All are welcome. Naked+moderated.

title: College Football Tailgate and Viewing Party
description:
This event has been a blast the last few years.

We'll begin the day by watching the end of the early games...staying with potential upsets. Then the football gods have blessed the camp's favorite team with a formidable opponent and a prime middle-of-the day game time. This will be the main event of the day :-)
- 12:30 Florida Gators vs Michigan Wolverines...wear your colors & Go Blue!

The big late game will be:
- 5:00 Florida State Seminoles vs Alabama Crimson Tide
This game will end around 8:30 - 8:45...the Man Burn takes place at 9:30, so come prepared and be ready to bolt at the end of the game.

Bonus coverage:
- 6:30 BYU Cougars vs LSU Tigers
This game will end while the Man Burn is underway...responsible fans may watch and shut down the Cafe.

If you have a request for a particular early or late starting college game, the management of the Harmonic Cafe will try to accommodate. With all the Michigan fans, it's likely we won't be showing other games during the midday slot. More game times will be announced...please let us know what games you're interested in :-).
print_description: Kickoff Man Burn by watching big games on HD screens! Join us celebrate the start of the season...bring some food & drinks to share...never graduate!.

title: Vietnamese Iced Coffee Experience (VICE)
description:
Vietnamese Iced Coffee Experience (VICE) is eager to return for its 17th year; serving up a delicious hand crafted iced beverage to our dusty fellow participants. 

The VICE process requires a minimum of seven servers to boil water, brew each cup, carefully measure sweetened condensed milk in to reusable cups, supervisor participants thoroughly mixing their beverage before adding the appropriate scoop full of ice.  We then have a health department approved process for cleaning and returning our utensils to service.

As we serve our beverage in reusable cups our patrons tend to take their time consuming their beverage on premises.  We provide and manage bicycle parking to ensure traffic flow and safety. Guests enjoy live entertainment - encouraging the crowd to participate in joke telling, sing alongs, and self-expression etc.
print_description:
Come get a delicious hand crafted ICED beverage. BYO container. Vegan? No problem!
When: 2-4pm everyday
Where: TBD.

title: Planned Playahood Clinic / Office Hours
description:
A rotating roster of our finest clinicians and doctors will offer varied advice and services. Plus free condoms with every referral!

* Second Aid: There there. I'm sorry that happened. Are you feeling better?

* Bad Sex Advice: Yes, that rash does look nasty. Probably you should have it amputated.

* Playa Naming: Get a new playa name prescribed.

* Relationship Advice: You really do need some help, you know!

* “Pregnancy” tests. (“Yes, sir, you’re pregnant. Congratulations! Here’s a shot!”)

* Life Goal Broker Services: Come up and tell our '80s power brokers what you've always wanted and been having trouble making happen and we, as super-awesome power brokers, will help you make it happen. Part negotiators, part super-wingmen, we get the deal done.

title: Male to Male intimacy
description:
"BOTH genders are welcome in this gender fluid workshop!

(The terms female/women or male/men are used loosely indicating people who self identify as male or female.)

In this last year and a half I have been delving into sexuality and examining societal beliefs around intimacy. It has become clear to me that sexuality is a fast track to discovering the blind spots which hinder us from intimacy. One of the most fruitful areas of exploration for myself has been in the area of male to male intimacy and gender fluidity. Through my experiences i have found that most men are guarded in ways that protect them from experiencing doubt around their own male sovereignty. For example most of us have been taught that to be affectionate with other males is wrong and means that we are ""homosexual"" or weak. 

A recent study by Harvard shows that humans are actually gender fluid and most of our gender identity is indoctrinated into us through our family systems, society, and the media. 

The fruit which comes from exploring male to male intimacy on an energetic and physical level is that all of our male armor/guarded defense systems vanish and we develop a greater level or capacity for intimacy with all people including women. 

The structure of the workshop allows men to explore their relationships with their fathers, brothers and friends and then moves gently towards male to male affection, culminating in energetic play with sexual energy. This is not a clothing optional work shop, personal boundaries will be respected all of the time, and personal safety a priority! Participants will always be at choice and have a multitude of different opportunities with which to explore this theme. Women will hold space and at times participate in this exploration and benefit from observing what occurs in the room. 

Gratitude and blessings

Timothy".
print_description: All of our male armor/guarded defense systems vanish and we develop a greater capacity for intimacy.

Often called the windows to your soul, we believe your eyes hold special meaning and represent so much of your inner beauty. We hope to enhance your unique eyes, and allow your inner beauty to shine through!
 
While your eyes are worked on, we will also complete an Astrology reading based on both your main Astrological sign and your Rising sign. We hope this will help you reflect a little more on who you are, and open yourself up to everything the universe has in store for you at Burning Man.
 
….. and to top things off we will be pouring some amazing organic teas all the while.

All Carrots and Allies assemble in your finest green and orange attire for a pre-party from 4pm-5:30 pm at the More Carrot Camp before the Billion Bunny March. In true Carrot fashion, we’ll provide drinks, music and much entertainment before we head out to intercept the bunnies at 6pm sharp! Bring along your singing voice and your best vegetable themed cocktails to share. While pro carrot, we're certainly a vegetable-friendly group. Practice your chants, learn some Carrot songs (http://goo.gl/IpyjQ) and, most importantly, join us as our wave of orange and green goodness spreads across the playa!

title: Rock Painting: Rock Your World
description: Rock painting is a fun, relaxing, and enjoyable pastime. Come learn from a professional enjoyable skill.  Forged out of the eons of Deep Time and raw forces of Nature, a uniquely shaped and smoothed river stone awaits your unique curiosity in an ephemeral moment of creative exploration. We supply you with the stone, paint and guidance; you supply your awareness, vision, and imagination. Together on your planetary journeys, after 4.5 billion years, you and the river stone meet. Silly or profound, the colors or imagery are all a part of the play on the Playa. Will your rock become a bug, a power object, a flower, or a psychedelic paisley? Experienced art teachers can help with color mixing, brush technique, and concept execution. Create a memory to keep or offer as a gift.

title: Sunset DJ Parties w/ Atlantis
description:
Dance to deep house, enjoy tasty drinks, experience art / panoramic views from our towers, and celebrate the setting of the sun god over the playa.

------

The legendary city of Atlantis has fallen and many millennia have passed.  All that remains are ancient artifacts used by the inhabitants in radical rituals.  

We don’t understand where or when these sacred artifacts came from or what they mean.  But they have been recovered from the sands of time… and we are inexplicably drawn to these objects… we worship them. 
 
As a rite of passage, pilgrims from all over the playa flock to the Towers of Atlantis for a week once a year to worship the sun god.  The unbearable intensity of his sight will be shaded by a pleasing geometric covering that will be a gathering spot for deep house music dance rituals and the imbibing of tasty spirits.

Join us in our radical ritual!
print_description: Dance to deep house, enjoy tasty drinks, experience art / panoramic views from our towers, and celebrate the setting of the sun god over the playa.

title: Purr-catory
description: Calling all playa cats and kittens! Somewhere between heaven and hell, there is a magical space filled with nothing but cats! We like to call it Purr-catory.  So stop chasing those laser pointers and getting high on catnip -- and join us at the Purr-catory party for an all-cat wedding ritual, aka Holy Meowtrimony.  Deck yourself out in your best cat-themed finery, dress as a cat, or simply channel your inner cat.  Stay for the reception to chew on some delicious kitty treats and lap up some catrimonial punch. Co-presented by The Meownge and Stardust Lounge.

title: Bucky Dome Open House
description: Check out this new method of dome construction that sets up in under an hour. Requires no tools, special skills, or strength to assemble. Using the geometry of the truncated icosahedron, aka Bucky Ball, this dome frame features uniform pole lengths, isometric vertices, and a modified tensegrity system to stabilize and distribute loads. 15’-25’ diameter domes can be erected by 1-2 people. Welcome to drop by any time. Ask if the creators are around to give you a tour and answer your questions.

title: Burner Toastmasters Speak-A-Thon
description: Want some “stage time?” Like to speechify? Pontificate? Step up to ye olde soap box? We’ve got you covered. While there's some jargon in the notes below that our wannabe’s might not understand, we assume the Toastmasters folks will get it. And you will soon! Note:    Bring your TI Magazine and we’ll take pics over at the Man! If you’re a Toastmaster and couldn’t be in Washington, DC, for their August International Convention, then bring your CC/CL/other manuals you’d like to advance in, and join us (with friends) for a real Toastmasters meeting - and some photos! We plan to cram in speeches, evaluations, and table topics into a one hour session, or more if demand exists for it, so on time is a good thing. Prompt arrivals will have the best chances for the most fun and credit.    Looking to join in? Pepperland theme camp, Tuesday, 1-2PM.  Email: Gerflash (at) socal (dot) rr (dot) com. so we can plan ahead and count you in.    Just maybe - the pix we take might make it into the TI Magazine! You’ll actually be Toastmastering on-Playa!

title: Sudha Rani Kailas: Physician, Heal Thyself
description: We are facing a spiritual crisis of epidemic proportion in our world today.   As a first generation East Indian woman, physician, and mystic, I have battled through my own psyche to find clarity that I revere as a guide for my being in this world.  The spiritual crisis has been a fundamental struggle, as my life has been a search for identity in a new culture that clashes fiercely with that of my native heritage.  While India is vibrant with with fragrance, texture, sound, and color, a constant sensory exploration,  America has been overworked and desensitized by violence, oppression, ignorance, and suffering.  Initially a victim of this plight, Great Spirit ultimately granted the gifts of True Wisdom.  However, integration from the expansive awakening of unity consciousness to the mundane experience of ordinary life is no small task.  From the strength of humanity and the love of true friendships to miracles and the cosmic vibration found in the echoes of stillness, this is a story of that wonderful journey.
print_description: This is a story from the strength of humanity and the love of true friendships to miracles and the cosmic vibration found in the echoes of stillness.

title: Clue Bar Murder Mysteries
description:
We are Clue Bar.

We will host the bar from 3:30- 5:30 pm Monday - Friday and our murders will occur on Tuesday, Wednesday and Friday, at the same time.

Tuesday Theme: Murder under the Big Top (Circus)
Wednesday Theme:  Highschool Homecoming
Friday Theme:  Santa's Workshop

This will mark our second year on the Playa as Clue Bar and we murder people.
To date we've murdered about a dozen people.  Okay not really, but we pretend murder them at murder mystery parties.  So we thought, why not bring this kind of fun home with us?

We will host at three scheduled murders through-out the week, each being about an hour and a half event. Everyone gets a character to play and clues to help solve the murder. There is an emcee that keeps things moving along but this is performance art in its rawest form, everyone is a suspect (or the recently deceased) and it is up to the group to collaborate, negotiate shady agreements, blackmail or otherwise enjoy themselves.

Each murder requires twenty people to play the roles for each murder we commit.  Each murder has a theme; a Circus, Santa's Workshop and an 80's Homecoming murder.  We encourage participants to come in costume and/or fully embrace their character.  We're snarky too so if people need a clue right there on the spot, a clue will be written for them and handed over in a small envelope.  A sample clue would be: "Shave your goatee, with a knife, to get more pussy, in the lounge, you fucking hippie."  It's a silly good time and everyone gets drunk or hydrated, meets new people and whether they crack the case or not they win shit for best actor, best briber, best sleuth, best dressed.

On the days we're not committing foul play we will host a bar and a water hydration station (a giant igloo dispenser available throughout the entire day, filled with Earth20 from Bend, Oregon and chilled with a block of ice).
print_description:
Clue Bar 3:30- 5:30 pm
Tuesday Theme: Murder under the Big Top 
Wednesday Theme:  Highschool Homecoming
Friday Theme:  Santa's Workshop.

title: Second-Ever Last Annual Armageddon Alley Cat
description:
Join our pedal-powered radical ritual! Bring your best wheels, playa art map,  water, moop pick-up bag. Ride hard, have fun, win prizes. After-Party!

Have you got a two-wheeled human powered contraption you think is fit to outrun the devil on a souped-up segway during armageddon? Are you ready for the event of a lifetime? Join Camp Armageddon for the SeCOND ever Last Annual Armageddon Alley Cat Bicycle Race. The race will end at our camp after-party; how long it will last is determined by how fast you ride. Some things that might come in handy along the way are the playa art map, a water bottle, and the capacity to hold any moop you might find along the way. Remember to ride fast, have fun, and be safe; ideally in that order because there will be a prize for the winner!
print_description: Join our pedal-powered radical ritual! Bring your best wheels, playa art map,  water, moop pick-up bag. Ride hard, have fun, win prizes. After-Party!.

It's no coincidence that our humble inn and eatery was formed in 1300s England, the same time and place that Cheddar Cheese first appeared. title: Poly 101
description:
Curious about this new “lovestyle” you’re hearing a lot about called polyamory? Maybe you’ve read all the books but want to talk to folks actually living and loving the poly lifestyle…In this fun, informative and easy-to-understand primer on Polyamory and open relationships, we’ll cover:

Definitions, vocabulary, and different ways to construct non-monogamous relationshipsThe elements that make Polyamory workable (and those that create frustration and regrets!)Open relationships’ most common pitfalls and how YOU can avoid themHow to create safety by figuring out and negotiating your boundaries and agreementsHow to find your Perfect Poly Fit and merge different poly styles to decrease upset and increase your odds that everyone is happier and MORE fulfilled3 tips and tools that will help you survive any poly explorationThe secret reframe that turns jealousy from a death knell into a beacon of hope and healthy relating!Resources, books, and tools to proceed into the world of responsible non-monogamy, at whatever your preferred pace or interest level… Tools that help in monogamy, too! Open to all.
print_description: Curious about this new “lovestyle” you’re hearing about called polyamory? Easy-to-understand primer on Polyamory and open relationships. Open to all.

title: Trans 301/401
description:
"The trans phenomenon. What do you know? What do you wish you knew? What would you like to know, but were afraid to ask? The purpose of this workshop is to educate and enlighten those interested in knowing more about this 3% of the public that few understand. This workshop seeks to help transphobic people in a non-judgmental way. The very basic definition transphobia, is simply being frightened of trans-folks because of misunderstandings or lack of education on all things trans. This is often because the questions you’ve always wanted to ask, are taboo; making it difficult to learn, understand, and honor the transgender path. Women/Trans identified only please.                                                                                     

Trans 301: Dropping the Veil.
We will bare our souls and our bodies for visual inspection and further Q&A.

Trans 401: Shredding the Veil.
For those brave audience members, we will open ourselves to not only visual review, but hands on, or hands in, examination. ".
print_description: Trans 301: Dropping the Veil.  We will bare our souls & our bodies for visual inspection and Q&A. Honor the transgender path. *Women/Trans Only*.

title: Be A Lamplighter
description:
Lamplighting and Sacred Ritual!

The Lamplighters are one of the longest-running moving art projects on the playa, and one of the many longstanding daily rituals of Black Rock City. Drawing from lamplighters of ancient cities, the Lamplighters gather volunteers from the city each night and maintain, light, and hang over 900 kerosene lamps in a procession that goes through the heart of Black Rock City. Come and join us! All are Welcome!
print_description: Come be part of the longest art installation RITUAL on playa! Meet at our Center Camp Workspace, All are Welcome!.

title: Bismuth or Bust
description: Bismuth is a metal with crazy crystalline properties. Apply heat and turn a featureless lump of dull grey metal into elaborate beautiful crystals. The process is fascinating to watch and the results are unique and beautiful. Listen as we babble on about relevant topics in science or just make up facts as we go. We'll show you how and you'll leave with a crystal of your own, supplies permitting. Mon-Fri 2-3pm Dark Wednesday.
print_description: Come make beautiful Bismuth crystals with us and take one back with you.

title: Trans 101/201
description:
"The trans phenomenon. What do you know? What do you wish you knew? What would you like to know, but were afraid to ask? The purpose of this workshop is to educate and enlighten those interested in knowing more about this 3% of the public that few understand. This workshop seeks to help transphobic people in a non-judgmental way. The very basic definition transphobia, is simply being frightened of trans-folks because of misunderstandings or lack of education on all things trans. This is often because the questions you’ve always wanted to ask, are taboo; making it difficult to learn, understand, and honor the transgender path. Open to all. 

Trans 101: The Nuts and Bolts.
A brief PowerPoint discussion of definitions and the basics of gender, gender identity, gender expression, and sexual orientation. How are transgender and cisgender people alike? How are they different?

Trans 201: A Peak Through the Veil.
After learning the basics, we’ll have a Q&A session where any and all questions will be fielded. We all know that there are questions that are deemed inappropriate to ask a transperson. For this brief moment in time, there are no taboos. We will do our best to answer your questions with honesty, transparency, and sincerity.".
print_description: PowerPoint discussion of the basics of transgender, gender, gender identity, gender expression, & sexual orientation, Q&A session.  Open to all.

title: Building resilience in our activist communities
description:
In the default world, we do some fucking amazing work around the year as activists for our communities. Some of us work for big non profits, some for pride or advocacy orgs and some folks are making an impact alone or in small groups.

Let's share what has worked for us at home, talk about things that have made us much more effective and discuss self care, sustainability and how to avoid the burnout that we see far too often. 

Members from all activist communities are welcome.
print_description: A facilitated discussion about our activism. We'll share our experiences, challenges, successes and talk about building strength and avoiding burnout.

title: Reorient with AMPLIFIED YOGA By Donovan McGrath
description:
You will be propelled  through a physical, emotional, and mental journey unlike any other on the playa. Rooted in deep yogic tradition but delivered in a contemporary way, Donovan uses music, breath, vinyasa, kundalini, meditation and free form movement to amplify the best parts of ourselves. You will embark on a sweaty, deeply therapeutic ride that feels like a celebration.
As authentic self expression is a cornerstone of this class, ALL levels are supported and welcomed with love. Come join the movement!

title: Theatre Games
description: Join 2 veteran burner, theatre instructors in playing some classic getting to know you and improvisation games. Learning to say "yes, and..." can make a huge difference in your Black Rock City experience! All games are very accessible and this is a very encouraging atmosphere. The only goal is for everyone to have FUN... and maybe meet some new and interesting people! Just bring your imagination and an open mind.

title: Everywhere Opening Celebration
description: Come one, come all, to a celebration of the year-round global Burning Man community! Burning Man Arts & Civic Engagement, Burning Man’s Global Network, Burners Without Borders, and Black Rock Labs invite you to join us for our annual celebration at our shared pavilion space,  located at 6:15 and Esplanade, as we kick off what promises to be an amazing week on the playa. Why? Because together we are EVERYWHERE, and we have amazing global stories to share! This celebration will end in a procession to the Man Base to celebrate the the official opening of the Man and surrounding pagoda to commemorate the Golden Spike. Bring your own cup and a ritual or offering to share with others, and join us for the whole evening!
print_description: Come one, come all, to a celebration of the year-round global Burning Man community! Followed by a procession to the Man Base.

title: Clay Milifiori Bead Making Class
description: Milifiori clay bead making class - Milifiori literally translated from Italian means "thousands of flowers" and traditionally the bead making technique uses glass. However, we will be using polymer or sculpey baking clay for this project using a traditional rolled cane method for our design. Fun way to learn and take home a new skill as well create a pretty wearable piece of art. All skill levels welcome, subject of the design TBD based on consensus and or skill level of the class :) We plan to then bake the beads after the class. They can be worn on necklaces or crafted into buttons so feel free to bring your own necklace material, twine, or pins to attach to the polymer clay. Plan to spend about 45min to an hour creating your beautiful beads and approximately an additional 20 minutes for bake time in our ovens! All ages and skill levels welcome. Clay will be provided but feel free to bring your own if you brought some by chance to the playa. Due to limited supplies/tools and seating (unless you bring your own supplies and tools), the class will be first come first serve.
print_description: 8/27@1300-1400: Sculpey/Polymer Clay Bead Milifiori Bead Making Class at Feed the Artist's Camp. clay provided!.

title: Paint the Wall!
description:
The Painting Wall of Peace Evolves needs you! Help create an ever changing wall of artistic expression which will bring beauty and inspiration to the people of the playa. 
The wall is a 24 foot long 4 foot high blank canvas which is comprised of 8 interlocking 4' x 3' canvases. It will be primed and ready for you to get your art on! As the week goes by the wall will evolve into a community mural for the citizens by the citizens! 
All individuals, whether master artists or stick figure lovers, are invited to participate. Paint as much as you like or observe from our viewing bench.
We will supply all brushes and paint for the wall. Basic painting instruction will be provided if requested. Music will be playing from behind the wall so you can dance along with the colors as you choose. Lights will be on for evening viewing (or painting if we stay open late). The wall will be open for creativity Monday - Friday 10am and stay open until 6pm (or later).

On Saturday the wall will be dismantled. Each of the 8 individual canvases which comprised the wall will be randomly gifted to citizens of the community. These amazing gifts will hold the work of hundreds of passing artists creating magic memories of BRC 2017!
print_description: Express your inner artist! Come paint on our blank 24 foot canvas wall.  Join us as we create a community masterpiece!  All materials provided.

title: Maria del Camino DRIVING LESSONS
description:
Learn how to safely operate the only true skid-steer tracked mutant vehicle on the playa! You have seen it, now you can drive it! 

Some mutant vehicles are dressed to look like they have tracks, but this is the real deal— 5 tons of fun! 
A Frankenstein'd chimera of a Komatsu excavator and a 1959 El Camino that transforms into a robot—and—can be driven with a smart phone. 

Really!

If that doesn't float your boat— how about flying in slow motion 9 feet up in the air? 

Spin a playa donut in a flying car!

Once you are trained and exhibit the necessary skills and understanding, you will be eligible to receive an official Maria del Camino Operator's Certificate.

Prerequisite: A valid drivers license, as is required by the DMV for driving any mutant vehicle on the playa.
Where: Classes will be held near the Esplanade nearest Liminal Labs.
When: Dawn til 9AM, MWF.
print_description:
Learn how to safely operate a true skid-steer tracked mutant vehicle!
This is the real deal— 5 tons of fun!
Spin a playa donut in a flying car!.

title: Your ASIS is awesome!
description:
The Playa ASIS Project is a photo essay. Born literally from a dream after returning from Burning Man about ten years ago, my vision embraced the core of the human body - the Anterior Superior Iliac Spine and the visible line of the Inguinal Ligament. A dream of dancers, hoopers, fire spinners and burners moving in every manner of human endeavor on the Playa and always the ASIS supporting the human form with such graceful, sensual strength. The Playa ASIS Project will attempt to capture the absolutely unique core of the individual in context of the Burning Man experience. This is not genital photography and we will limit identifying markers to your ASIS. Final artistic discretion will remain with the photographer.
This ASIS project will have a stationary location in our camp's community monkeyhut space on Tues. and Thurs. from 12pm to 2pm, but will also be roaming the playa with a photo wagon Mon., Wed. and Fri. Photos taken will be used for a anonymous encyclopedia of playa ASIS. Subjects will only be photographed if they choose to be part of the project. No records are kept on participants making the photos essentially anonymous.
print_description: Claim your anonymous place in Playa history!! Join us for your Playa ASIS photo session. Each photo will capture the unique core of the individual.

title: The Final Exam - Review Sessions
description: Have you studied for The Final Exam? The faculty of The Institute will be holding Review Sessions each day at 5:00 p.m., in addition to their regularly scheduled Office Hours. Students are advised to attend at least one Review Session or stop by Office Hours during the week to pick up a Study Guide. Exam proctors from Theory, the Division of Humanities, and Phage, the Division of Natural Sciences departments will ensure that all students are sufficiently prepared for The Final Exam through erudition, imagination, and deep introspection. Please come prepared with sharpened wits and a #2 pencil, graphing calculator loaded with Tetris, and crib notes on Jane Eyre. Students who arrive naked will be reminded that they are not dreaming.
print_description: Will this be on The Final Exam? Pick up a Study Guide and prepare for the Ultimate Assessment through erudition, imagination, and deep introspection.

title: Magical Mystical Nighttime Labyrinth
description:
Take a journey to the Center of Your Being! You will not get lost; rather, this quiet walk leads inward.  By walking the labyrinth, discover long-forgotten mystical traditions, which acknowledge joy and sorrows and may lead you to a transformational experience.There are 3 stages to the walk:
1-	The Way In. Shed distractions-clear and quiet the mind.
2-	The Center – A place of reflection on your true self. 
PICK A CARD
3 – The Way Out – Renew your unity with the healing forces of the Divine Creation.
print_description: Discover the long-forgotten mystical tradition and take a journey to the Center of Your Being.  You will find a message and perhaps some peace.

All materials provided, but limited.

title: Dynamics Bike Tour with a Naturalist
description: The playa under our feet seems featureless, but this vast lake bed is a dynamic, complex environment. How has recent flooding reshaped the surface?  How does our temporary city and art affect the environment? See how Burning Man endeavors to Leave No Trace.

title: Glue, Screw, Patch, Repair It! Don’t Replace it!
description: How to fix things that break, are worn or want to be re-purposed. This workshop will show you how to extend the life of an object.  Bring something to fix if you wish.  Hunger (playa name), the workshop leader, has worked as a product designer and artist for over 40 years and enjoys fixing things.

title: More Than Just One Word on Plastics
description: Plastics: we love them and hate them. Rebecca Braslau, organic chemistry professor at UC Santa Cruz, will discuss the history of plastics, what they are made of, health, environmental and societal issues, and exciting developments in emerging biosustainable and biodegradable plastics.
print_description: Rebecca Braslau, organic chemistry prof at UC Santa Cruz, discusses history of plastics, composition & exciting biopolymers.

title: Space Virgins Happy Hour
description: Swing by our Space Dome from 3-5 for some music and drinks served by your lovely neighborhood Space Virgins!
print_description: Swing by our Space Dome from 3-5 for some music and drinks served by your lovely neighborhood Space Virgins!.

title: Behind the Green Curtain Bike Tour
description: An interpretive bike tour of some of Black Rock City's Green camps featuring solar installations, grey water set ups, recycling efforts, plastic-free living, solar cookers and much more, Come see what innovators are doing to make Black Rock City more environmentally friendly.
print_description: Bike tour of green camps featuring solar installs, gray water setups, recycling efforts, plastic-free living, solar cooking & more.

title: Space Virgins Yoga
description:
Long travels have you tight and cranky? Chakras out of line? Come to Camp Space Virgins for a rejuvenating yoga experience specifically designed to get you loose and oscillating wildly. You will be guided through an uplifting practice of vinyasa yoga and meditation that will relax stiffness, uproot negative thought patterns, shed away decades of emotional baggage, and re-ignite your connection to space. Learn how to fold your body into your favorite sacred geometry! We will conclude our yoga practice with a special chakra healing circle shavasana and mindfulness tea ceremony. Come by to prepare your mind, body, and spirit for another week on the Playa!
Open to All Skill Levels.
print_description: Long travels have you tight and cranky? Chakras out of line? Come to Camp Space Virgins for a rejuvenating yoga experience to start your burn!.

title: Behind the Green Curtain Bike Tour
description: An interpretive bike tour of some of Black Rock City's Green camps featuring solar installations, grey water set ups, recycling efforts, plastic-free living, solar cookers and much more, Come see what innovators are doing to make Black Rock City more environmentally friendly.
print_description: Bike tour of green camps featuring solar installs, gray water setups, recycling efforts, plastic-free living, solar cooking & more.

title: Aztec Dance to Honor Mother Earth & 4 Directions
description: Aztec dancers with rare, traditional instrument accompanists will renew our connection to earth, wind, fire and water. Dances will be explained while connecting us to nature; we will end with a friendship community dance circle which all are encouraged to join.
print_description: Aztec dancers in full regalia with traditional instrument accompanists will renew connection to earth, wind, fire & water.

title: Aerial Hoop Performance
description: If you love watching circus and aerial acts, come watch some aerial hoop/lyra!
print_description: If you love watching circus and aerial acts, come watch some aerial hoop/lyra!.

title: Save the Man Sign Making and March
description:
Are you aware that fire is the #1 cause of death of Mans? Our statistics show that if
you are a large wooden effigy in the middle of the desert, you have a 100% chance of being burned. This is a serious issue and we're not going to take it anymore! We'll be making protest signs in preparation for our Save The Man March. Join the movement or make your own super-serious sign to express your concern for your own definitely-legitimate issue that's totally real. Then, with signs in hand, we'll march on the man and make
our voices heard! All sign making materials will be provided, drinks included. Indignant outrage is encouraged.
print_description: Make a super-serious sign to express your concern for your definitely-legitimate (not really) issue. Then march on the man. Save the Man!.

title: Drought & Climate Change Threaten Sierra Insects
description: Come look through microscopes with Dr. David Herbst, Aquatic Scientist, University of California at amazing aquatic insects of Sierra Nevada streams and learn how they are threatened by climate change and drought.
print_description: A talk & hands on look through microscopes with UC prof David Herbst. Science Friday comes to the playa!.

title: The Great Flamingo Flutter-A Flamingo Parade!
description: Stand tall, dahlinks! Calling all drag queens, divas, & pink birds of the wild! Don your pink fluffy finest and join us for the inaugural Flamingo Flutter! Come get flamingo-ed out @ High Chair Stilt Bar @ the Red Nose District from 3:30-5pm, enjoy pink drinks & a cabaret show on our stage from 5-7, & strut your SEXY pink stuff with us in fab-flamingo fashion out to Phoenicopterus Rex, a giant pink flamingo idol in the dust! Strike that one legged pose, divas! No feathers please, dahlinks.
print_description: Come get flamingo-ed out @ High Chair Stilt Bar @ the Red Nose District from 3:30-5pm, enjoy HH 5-7 & a cabaret show! Parade to Giant Flamingo!.

title: Playa Chefs and Playa Kitchens
description: Playa Kitchens are where Playa Chefs do their Art work. It is our art studio. A lot of thought and resources can go into building a kitchen on the playa. Come by and let's talk, brag, laugh at or be jealous of each others art studios. At Feed tHE ARTists you can come and see our food art studio and talk about the good and bad of it and discuss your art studio as well.
print_description: Playa Kitchens are Playa Chefs art studios. Come by and let's talk about where we do our art work.

title: Efforts to Clean Up Historic Mining Waste
description: Bruce Medhurst, Aquatic Scientist at the University of California will talk about a 20 year study to monitor the cleanup of acid mine drainage contaminating a Sierra Nevada stream.
print_description: UC prof Bruce Medhurst discusses a 20 yr project to control acid mine drainage into a stream.

title: From Oy to Joy
description: Joy expert Maya Hampton explains how to liberate yourself from the depressing dichotomy of happy/unhappy and align yourself with abiding joy.
print_description: Joy expert Maya Hampton explains how to liberate yourself from the depressing dichotomy of happy/unhappy and align yourself with abiding joy.

title: Horny Monday
description: It's opening day at the Kkrafting dome and it's time for Horny Monday!! Come get horny with us and place horns on your head, bike, hips or wherever you like!! We will also be working on other head related things such as headgear, sunglasses and goggles. Come and get your head ready with us!  Craft the perfect accessory or garment that complement the costumes you picked from the Kostume tent!!!
print_description: Come get horny with us and place horns on your head, bike, hips or wherever you like! We will also work on other headgear: goggles and sunglasses.

title: The Black Rock Desert: Our Inspiring Desert Home
description: Come learn about the vast Black Rock Desert and what makes it come alive. Dave Cooper, local and former manager of the Black Rock NCA will talk about playa dust, wilderness areas, historic emigrant trails, wildlife, wild horses, & more. Come with questions!
print_description: Dave Cooper, former NCA mgr, talks about designation of NCA, wilderness, emigrant trails, wildlife, wild horses.

title: Earth Guardians Salsa Music Party
description: Salsa Music Party hosted by our own Earth Guardian Aztec Burners.
print_description: Salsa Music Party hosted by our own Earth Guardian Aztec Burners.

title: Burning Man & The Environment
description: Since 1991 on the playa Burning Man has evolved and innovated to protect the Black Rock Desert. Learn the history starting with the installation of the perimeter fence, fire blankets and evapotrons. When was the Leave No Trace protocol brought to the playa? When was the first year for the Burner Express buses? What else is Burning Man doing to protect the Black Rock Desert and the planet?
print_description: Since 1991 BM has evolved & innovated to protect the desert. Learn this history with the fence installation, fire blankets & more.

title: Make a tutu for Tutu Tuesday
description: Tuesday is Tutu Tuesday and don't you fret if you forget! Come make the tutu of your dreams with us! Tutus are the best way to prance around playa!! We are teaching you to make the best no sew tutu. To finish your outfit off, we will also be teaching a harness making workshops. Come make a tutu to complement the costume you pick from the Kostume Tent and strut down our runway!!!
print_description: Tuesday is Tutu Tuesday and don't you fret if you forget! Come make the tutu of your dreams with us! We will also have harness making for your tops!!.

title: Leave Big Pharma in the Dust!
description: Alex Howe, aka Bush Ninja, has studied traditional herbalism in South Africa for the last 5 years and will help you with the BM principles of decommodification and self-reliance in meeting medicinal needs.  He'll demonstrate how to make a natural healing balm for the skin and lips and give other practical herbalism tips. There will be a limited supply giveaway of his finest craft to those who attend the full skill share.
print_description: Skill share of practical herbalism tips from the Bush Ninja, who studied in S. Africa. Demo of a healing balm for skin & lips with samples.

title: World’s Largest Fire Blanket
description: Senior Earth Guardian and Leave No Trace Master Educator Mike Bilbo will discuss the history of burn scars on the playa, Leave No Trace solutions, and Burning Man's stewardship through large scale solutions known as burn platforms. Learn also what is the latest protocol for building a fire when camping in back country areas. Then off we go via bike tour to see the world's largest fire blanket. How big is it, what is it made of? We will investigate!
print_description: Learn history of burn scars on the playa, anatomy of a fire blanket, then off we go via bike tour to see the world’s largest fire blanket.

title: Going Backwards to Go Forward
description: We will explore ideas and items from the past that can be used today to help us live a more sustainable lifestyle by cutting back on waste and energy usage.  “Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.” ~Albert Einstein.
print_description: Explore practical ideas from the past to help us live a sustainable lifestyle.  Learn from yesterday with Mike Bilbo.

title: Brush off the Dust, Brush up for the Night
description: Fight with us against the dust. Our De-Dusting Den and toothbrushing station will have everything you need to restore your pearly whites after a day of playa whiteouts.  We've got the toiletries, tools, and treats you need to gear up and glam up for another night of adventure.
print_description: Gear up, glam up, and get ready for another night of adventure. Everyone knows brushing your teeth is the only real way to feel clean on the playa.

title: The Lorax, a Performance Piece.
description: An impassioned recital of Dr. Seuss' best title, for small and big Burners great pleasure. To gain inspiration for our planet’s salvation come through and partake of this treasure.
print_description: An impassioned recital of Dr. Seuss’ best title to gain inspiration for our planet’s salvation.  For kids and adults alike.

title: Fund with Fondant: Dessert Landscapes
description: Eat your art out! Experiment creating 3-dimensional luscious landscapes from a variety of tasty treats. Prerequisite: must like chocolate--white, milk, and dark! Who knew rocks, dirt, moss and plants could be so sweet? And for the dairy-free and gluten-free, dessert is fun again!
print_description: Create 3-dimensional luscious landscapes! Prerequisite: must like chocolate. Dairy-free/gluten-free welcome!  Walk away with a masterpiece and spoon!.

title: CIA tech declassified, Beginner Remote Viewing
description: So you might have heard about this declassified CIA technology and wondered how or if it works.  Stop by Feed the Artists and try it for yourself.

title: Honest Flirt Game
description:
Flirtation is the art of making oneself attractive or finding others attractive for pleasure without serious intent. 

Honest Flirts are forthright and playful, and they do not tease or seduce.

Honest Flirt is a game that asks you and a partner to tell a story, imagine something interesting, or do an activity together as you practice being attractive and finding your partner attractive too.

Honest Flirts need not have an interest in sex or even a serious relationship. They need only be honest and look for the attractive attributes in the people they play with.

Stop by any time between sunrise and 10 PM.

This game was inspired by an essay by philosopher Alain De Botton called Why, how & when to Flirt

You can find the essay here: https://youtu.be/rZTqF5oYUqo.
print_description: Come play Honest Flirt and you'll feel more attractive, confident, and safe. No teasing; no seduction; just forthright and playful flirtation.

title: Champagne MOOP Train
description: All aboard the MOOP train! Get a ride to the perimeter fence on the Earth Guardian art car while sipping champagne and listening to music, then see what ends up on the fence and put it in your MOOP bag.
print_description: Ride to the perimeter fence while sipping champagne and listening to music in the EG art car.  Then we'll moop.

title: Experience Deep Time on the Playa Bike Tour
description: This is your opportunity to contemplate Deep Time while on the playa. Your journey will be led by geology experts Drs. Elizabeth Miller (Stanford U) and John Dilles (Oregon SU). Bike to the outer playa to contemplate the history of this place we call home, from the deep time geologic framework to the ice ages, first human inhabitants in the region, post-glacial warming and inexorable warming of the Anthropocene era. Burn baby burn! P.S. Deep Time = Geologic Time.
print_description: Deep Time = Geologic Time. Bike field trip led by 2 geologists: Elizabeth Miller (Stanford U) & John Dilles (OSU).

title: Let's HOOKup
description: Are you a Hooker? Does your heart chakra need an adjustment? Or do you just want to try something intense even by Burning Man standards? If so, join us for a group hook pull. Your feet will be grounded, but with 12 gauge hooks in your chest, your mind will be soaring. You can choose your own adventure, either solo pulling or connecting to a group to feel the impact each person can make. We will be piercing for 2 hours but you can pull for as long as you want after that. You can even keep the hooks to show off to anyone who doesn’t believe how tough you are. Supportive people/partners and respectful spectators are welcome, but only consenting sober adults will be pierced.

description:

Then collect the remaining message pieces at other participating camps around the Playa.

(If your your camp wants to participate then either use the contact form on the website or drop by our camp and we'll set you up.).
