title: Socially Appropriate Burp Day
description: What's the big deal? Burping is fun and it's free! Who gets to decide the acceptableness of burping? You do! Just for today, let all burping be considered socially appropriate. Buuuuuuuurp!!!
print_description: What's the big deal? Burping is fun and it's free! Who gets to decide the acceptableness of burping? You do! Buuuuuuuurp!!!.

title: Socially Appropriate Nose Picking Day
description: Who wants to suffer with a bunch of dried up gunk and crust in their nose? Get those irritating playa boogers out of there already! Don't worry if anyone's watching you go deep with that index finger! Why not give that thumb a try! It's time for each of us to get the relief we deserve and to breathe just a little freer. And go ahead, flick it on the ground because that's where that stuff came from. Get that P.O.O.P. (playa out of place) out of your nose!
print_description: Don't suffer with a bunch of dried up gunk and crust in your nose. Go ahead and have the relief you deserve and breathe just a little freer.

title: Socially Appropriate Fart Day
description: It's not like you have to pack it out or anything. You don't even have to go down the block with a spare roll of toilet paper. Just do it right where you are. It's time to celebrate our farts and acknowledge that it's about time we got over that harmless smell. What's the big deal? You're human for christsake! Today you can feel free to fart any old time as loudly and as smellily as you want!
print_description: It's not like you have to pack it out or anything. Today you can feel free to fart any old time as loudly and as smellily as you want!.

title: Socially Appropriate Menstruation Day
description: Hey, menstruation is totally natural—you don't have to be embarrassed just because you have a naturally occurring blood flow. Give yourself permission to go without a tampon or pad for once. Wear white pants with no underwear. Embrace freedom! Let the blood make its artistic mark! Today is the day to feel like a natural Womyn!!!
print_description: Hey, menstruation is totally natural—skip the pad and tampon for once. Wear white pants with no underwear. Let the blood make its artistic mark!.

title: Socially Appropriate Boner Day
description: Today, if you get a boner, you get to keep it--for as long as it wants to be a boner. Grow it naturally, or strap it on. You don't have to suppress it just so someone doesn't judge you for being a pig or get jealous because it's not for her or him. Today it's okay to have just woken up in the morning, okay to be stimulated by your own silky boxers, and okay to be TURNED ON, because you have a right to your feelings and you get to do whatever you want with your body.
print_description: Today, if you get a boner, you get to keep it--for as long as it wants to be a boner. Grow it naturally, or strap it on!.

title: Socially Appropriate Eat-With-Your-Mouth-Open Day
description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon. And that's why our natural inclination is to eat with our mouths open. What's the big deal about what it looks like? You're willing to put it in your mouth and chew but you're not willing to look at it? That's like a carnivore who's unwilling to kill their own cow. So, go ahead and taste what you've been missing—today you can eat with your mouth OPEN!
print_description: Did you know that the more oxygenated your food is, the better you taste it? That's why ice cream tastes better with a fork than with a spoon.

title: Socially Appropriate Yawn Day
description: Hey, it's been a long, fun week. Everyone knows you're tired. We're all tired too. You don't have to suppress that yawn today. That's right—celebrate one of the great mammalian mysteries and let out a big old yawn even when someone is talking right at you. No need to suppress today because today is Socially Appropriate Yawn Day!
print_description: Hey, it's been a long, fun week. Everyone knows you're tired. We're all tired too. You don't have to suppress that yawn today.

title: Hug a Shirtcocker Day
description: They get a lot of attitude from everyone all week. So what if they give you the creeps. Radical Inclusion, people! It’s time to show them it’s all good. Make sure you offer to rub sunscreen on them while you're at it.
print_description: So what if they give you the creeps. As a further gesture of radical inclusion, make sure you offer to rub sunscreen on them while you're at it.

title: Jungle FUR party

title: Coffee on the Man
description: Cowboy Coffee! for Burners at the Man, warming themselves or having breakfast on his hot remains the morning after he burns.  It's Mirror Man and Patti from Earth Guardians providing you with just what you need, or, just what the doctor ordered, as it were.  You can have it black or, until we run out, with some evaporated milk and or Stevia.  We've been doing this for a few years.  We bring burnable paper cups, but if you have your own cup, that's even better.  What's really cool is if you can bring an authentic reproduction tin cup (get them from 19th-Century reenactment vendors, like C & D Jarnagin or James County Mercantile).  We're usually on the west side - Look for a table, red wagon behind a a red Trek mbike, blue enamel-ware coffee pots boiling away, a tallish thin lady and a tall guy with a black slouched hat, kind of looking like a 19th Century 49er or maybe one of the 1st Cav guys who patrolled this region 155 years ago - and who had hot coffee like we'll be serving you...!
print_description: Cowboy Coffee! for Burners at the Man, warming themselves or having breakfast on his remains morning after he burns.  We're usually on the west side.

title: Daruma Intention Setting Ceremony
description:
We'd like for you to meet and interact with the 6’ tall Japanese intention setting Daruma doll we've built for Burning Man 2017. 

Join us at the Daruma for intention setting ceremonies! You are invited to approach the Daruma in groups of two or three, set a personal goal, and demonstrate your commitment to the intention you've set by marking one of the Daruma’s eyes.

From then on, every glimpse of the Daruma as you travel through Black Rock City will remind you of the intention you've set...of your commitment. 

Three years from now, we will return with the Daruma to the playa so you will have a chance to fill in the Daruma’s other eye after you've completed your intention / goal. Together, we'll be granting the Daruma vision 20/20 in the year 2020, and then bringing the Daruma to the Temple to burn.
print_description: Set a personal goal, write it down, & dot in 1 of the Japanese Daruma doll's eyes. Fully commit to your intention. Daruma will help you achieve it!.

title: Consent and Conduct - Caring for our community
description: Consent Culture celebrates enthusiastically opting in as a cornerstone to meaningful and loving interpersonal engagement in our community. This workshop will provide a foundation for discussing and practicing consent, particularly under the umbrella of conduct, as well as identify consent related resources on Playa. Freely given agreements to interpersonal engagements are the keys that allow our community to be the best version of itself. And we endeavor to cultivate an environment where boundaries are not just explored but protected as well, and individuals are held responsible for their own actions.
print_description: This workshop will provide a foundation for discussing and practicing consent, as well as identify consent related resources on Playa.

There'll be Mojitos.

description: We all carry things with us into this desert that we came here to let go. Come be supported and heard in the safety of perfect strangers in a conversation and process about forgiving others, or yourself.

title: Stori Telling - Putting the "i" in your story
description: Storytelling is not only an ancient art form but something everyone still does in their everyday life. Come receive tips on how to take raw memory and form it into a flowing narrative. If you’ve seen the “Ten Principles )’(“ storytelling project performed in DC over the past several of years, you’ll get a taste of the same craft and training those participants received to get stage ready. And whether or not you end up telling your stories for an audience of one or dozens, hopefully this workshop will help the true tales you do share be ever more engaging. Learn some tips on telling a true story well in a short period of time.
print_description: Come receive tips on how to take raw memory and form it into a flowing narrative.

title: Pharmakon Apothecary & Father Jack's Panty Shack
description:
The playa is a harsh mistress and overstimmed nights can lead to painful mornings. Pharmakon, open M-F mornings, 11am-1pm from, is the yourt "Oh, gawd!" hangover recovery station, replete with a full menu of tried and true playa picker uppers. 

This year we have broadened Pharmakon’s offerings to include simple first aid items for (hapless) virgin burners who find themselves unprepared. We have found even seasoned burners can be surprised by the fragility of their bodies in our dusty wonderland. By offering various OTC remedies we hope to mitigate trivial demands on Rampart medical services and provide a gentle lesson in self-sufficiency along with the bandaid and a hug. (Unfortunately we will no longer be offering ameliorative trepanning or exorcisms as we broke the skull drill and drank all the holy water). 

FATHER JACK'S PANTY SHACK offers solace for souls experiencing that ‘not so fresh’ feeling. Eager participants in need of a little freshening up can score a dainty thong, beefy briefs or a naughty hybrid that tap dances on the line between decency and profane. You never know what you’ll find when you put your hand inside the box of mystery but we can promise you’ll get rousing applause, catcalls and possibly even a consensual reacharound as you model your new underoos for our staff of helpful shackmasters.
print_description: Find relief w/ OTC remedies and elixirs to cleanse the body and mind. Refresh with dainty thongs/beefy briefs to purify your precious naughty parts.

title: Kafka 9.0 Vandalizing
description:
Vandalizing is a creative tool, the act through which the painting is given a new meaning, a more detailed and profound identity. It provides additional information able to transfer a specific emotion, to convey the rhythm of the soul in that particular moment.
"Disfiguring" a painting is necessary to create the correspondence between the artwork’s identity and feelings that moulded its form and content.
print_description: Vandalizing is a creative tool, the act through which the painting is given a new meaning, a more detailed and profound identity.

title: Cory Doctorow at Liminal Speaks
description:
Liminal Labs Lustration Station is pleased to present Liminal Speaks!, an annual artful conversation about whatever our featured guest wants to illuminate. This year, Join us for a conversation with with author and burner COREY DOCTOROW (Little Brother, Homeland). Imagine a gift-economy society built on the fringes of a hyper-capitalist, hyper-unequal world in decline. A wasteland where bohemian makers build an automated luxury communist utopia out of the waste-stream of industrial civilization. Sound familiar? 
"We’re making a world where greed is a perversion. Where grabbing everything for yourself instead of sharing is like smearing yourself with shit: gross. Wrong.".
print_description: Doctorow discusses WALKAWAY, a future where bohemian makers build a luxury communist utopia from a hyper-capitalized waste-stream (burnerish scifi).

title: Hug Meditation Workshop
description:
Looking to deepen your meditation practice? It turns out that embracing someone in a mindful hug might help you do just that. Hugging meditation, made famous by Zen Master Thich Nhat Hanh, is rooted in the belief that a good hug can have transformative effects.

"When we hug, our hearts connect and we know that we are not separate beings," Hanh writes. "Hugging with mindfulness and concentration can bring reconciliation, healing, understanding, and much happiness.".
print_description: "Hugging with mindfulness and concentration can bring reconciliation, healing, understanding, and much happiness.".

title: guided creative visualization meditation
description:
Join Camp Feel Good for a guided creative visualization meditation. Dr. Feelgood will help you picture your perfect day 10 years in your future. The process works by subconsciously shifting your decision making over the next 10 years eventually making your vision a reality. You don't know what that day looks like? Don't worry, most people don't, but your subconscious already knows what is important to get there. The more amazing and compelling the vision that you let emerge, the more you will be drawn to it. How? Most people make between 80 to 400 decisions a day. A rich, compelling visualization with a lot of sensory "hooks" can shift those decisions towards your perfect future because the right choices will feel "good.” We will start with a mindfulness of breath meditation, a gratitude exercise and then wake up the morning of your perfect day and explore it through a guided process. After, we will ask a few of those interested to share their visualization with the group. We look forward to sharing your future day together. Dr. Feelgood.


The 45 Minute Meditation Session is 2PM M-F and followed up with creative cocktails, step up and have a feel good drink at our Camp Feel Good Compliment Bar/Sherpa Foot washing station!

For those in need of a deep dive in what you want out of life, we offer an Advice Booth Open every day!
print_description: Dr. Feelgood will help you picture your perfect day 10 years in your future.

title: BlackSKYwhite Show
description:
BlackSKYwhite's performances are magical sights - incorporating organic actor's bodily movements, music reaching from electronics to cabaret and ethnic style as well as stunning lighting effects which create a surreal world of great illusion, yet at the same time, a world that is very close and true.
blackSKYwhite have created, and continue to create a special technique of placing actors on the edge between reality and illusion - where performances are more of a dream than anything resembling real life. It is difficult to identify the genre of this theatre's stagings (as the word "genre" in itself implies some kind of traditionalism) and perhaps the company's style is closest to modern choreography in its most nonconformist form. The shows tell no story, reveal no plot, have no dimensions, or narrative. Rather, they mirror reality through dreams, bordering on that thin line between the outer and the inner worlds that interacts with the spectator through their own intuition or unconsciousness. As in the 'absolute mirror', every single person should see in each their work, an inner world and their own particular destiny. 
blackSKYwhite has received important awards for innovation in theater at FringeFirst - the international performing arts festival in Edinburgh, Scotland and have headlined performances at Glastronbury Festival. They have performed at Burning Man 2010 also.
print_description: Organic actor's bodily movements, music from electronics to cabaret and ethnic style and lighting effects  create a surreal world of great illusion.

title: Burlesque Extravaganza
description: Dark Sparkle is the potent mix of the mysterious and the dangerous that makes something irresistibly attractive. It's what pushes people to the point of insanity; that unexplainable quality that pulls people to the dark side. Some days, Dark Sparkle is your alter-ego; other days it is your most natural feeling form. Dark Sparkle is Mona Lisa's smile, biscuits and gravy, the Fonz, the apocalypse. It is an adventurous way of life--physically, emotionally and mentally that citizens of BRC embrace. Our shows are an opportunity for Dark Sparklers and other BRC citizens to explore and showcase their Dark Sparkle through performance, storytelling, and tease. Featuring your favorite DS performers as well as guests from the BRC community. We'll also turn the tables with ample opportunity for participation.

title: Trumpism Knocks us Back with Corey Doctorow
description:
Tech steps forward, Trumpism knocks us back: how can we tell if
we're winning?

Is Net Neutrality on the up or down? Is DRM rising or falling? Is crypto
being banned, or will it win, and if it does, will its major application
be ransomware or revolution? Is the arc of history bending toward
justice, or snapping abruptly and plummeting toward barbarism?

It's complicated.
print_description:
Is Net Neutrality on the up? Is DRM rising or falling? Is crypto being banned? will its application be ransomware or revolution?
It's complicated.

title: Are you searching for inner peace?
description:
Are you searching for inner peace?

If so, come visit the Department of Peace World Headquarters. We believe peace is a principle that can be learned through direct interaction and creative thinking.

We are mystics, creative problem solvers, ingenious puzzlers and well-oriented conversationalists on a pilgrimage to promote the 10 principles of Burning Man.
 
Our camp promotes radical inclusion through welcoming anyone and everyone who wishes to find peace including all race and gender identifications; encourages gifting by giving peace tokens to our visitors as a reminder to pass along their own peace to other BRC residents; honors decommodification by understanding that peace is not found through objects, but through human to human connections; teaches radical self-reliance by sharing tools and strategies to become your own SOURCE; celebrates radical self-expression because everyone should feel free to find their own path; commits to communal effort by understanding that our camp cannot function without the support of ourselves, the participation of our visitors, and having a home in BRC; observes civic responsibility through being a grounding source of peaceful energy for our neighbors and beyond; respects leaving no trace because we want BRC to exist long into the future and we also recognize humans greater impact on the world; practices participation each and every day we’re on the playa through offering our peace services to the residents of BRC; thrives on immediacy by facilitating a safe space for vulnerability between ourselves and our visitors.
print_description: If so, come visit the Dept. of Peace World HQ. We believe peace is a principle that can be learned through direct interaction and creative thinking.

title: Downward Wolf Yoga
description: Yoga for all of those who are able to drag their tired, sweaty, dusty, sunburned bodies to our dome. Expect breath, guided visual mediation, some yang asanas matched with some yin restoration, and most likely some sweaty burner-balls in your face. So don't miss out!
print_description: Yoga for those who are able to drag their tired, sweaty, dusty bodies over. Expect breath, guided visual mediation, yang asanas and yin restoration.

title: Cannabis Scientific Renaissance
description: After half a century of research restrictions, we are seeing a cannabis scientific renaissance around the world. Dr. Jeff Chen MD/MBA, Director of the UCLA Cannabinoid Affinity Group, will take us on a journey through the 10,000+ year history of human cannabis use.  He will then show us the intriguing inter-workings of the human endocannabinoid system, our body's system of natural "cannabis-like" molecules.  He will fascinate us with the latest research and science on the health effects of this unique plant.  And he will end with a vision for how cannabis users can help accelerate cannabis research by becoming citizen scientists and donating their data to researchers.
print_description: Join Dr Jeff Chen for a journey through 10,000+ year history of human cannabis use & for a talk about the cannabis scientific renaissance world-wide.

title: DragonCampArmory- Bikini Armor Workshop
description:
Learn traditional metal shaping skills to make an amazing custom fitted aluminum bikini.  (Think Game of Thrones or amazon women).  Decorate with our baubles and bangles for an amazing costume. or feel free to bring your own broken or worn bits of jewelry or other decorations.  
This is an empowering activity primarily for women, but male partners welcome to provide encouragement. Patterns are provided in various sizes and you will cut and hand-hammer a thin piece of aluminum into a precise shapes to fit your curves.  Decorate by gluing trinkets and jewelry onto the armor, then secure in place with leather thong strips. 
A costume takes 2-3 hours to complete a top and bottom so please allow time.  A typical costume like this costs $$$, but this is yours to keep, wear, and be admired on the Playa! All sizes welcome.

When finished be sure to take a Photo-op on our Dungeon set with the Big Green animatronic Dragon!
print_description: Ladies- Come join us to make yourself a kick-ass sexy cool Bikini Armor Costume to wear and share on the Playa.

title: Palanque Norte Speaker Series
description:
The Palenque Norte journey began with the legendary Entheobotany Conferences held at the Chan Kah hotel near the ancient Mayan ruins just outside of Palenque, Mexico. There, Terence McKenna, Jonathan Ott, Ann & Sasha Shulgin, and a host of other psychedelic luminaries passed along many insights, discoveries, and wild tales to the fortunate Tribe members who were there. And it was at the end of the pool where Terence McKenna gave some of his last talks at the Chan Kah.

Years later, then in 2003, a few alumni from those conferences decided to have a "Palenque reunion" at the Burning Man Festival, and so they organized a lecture series to continue the Palenque tradition.
print_description: Join Palanque Norte in panels and discussions on psychedelics, shamanism, futurism, art, technology, and spirituality. Come by for a speaker schedule!.
other_location: Palanque Norte Tent at Camp Soft Landing

title: Tech Ethics as Psychedelic Parenting
description:
As above, so below: maps of the Internet look like maps of the inter-species symbiosis in a forest, which look like maps of the functional connections in an LSD-inspired brain. And evidence is stacking up that psychoactive plants have played a major role in the development of language, art, and culture – not just for human beings, but across the biosphere.  

And as within, so without: the dragons on the edge of our maps are turning into Pokémon in AR gaming; our science fiction narratives of de-extincted dinosaurs are looking likelier each day with radical advances in genetic engineering.  

Thanks to the psychedelic ("mind manifesting") power of our Promethean technologies, our dreams and fears have never been so fast to manifest as they are now.  It is time for us to take a long, hard look at what might be, if ANYTHING is possible. 

What did the psychedelic revolution of the 1960s teach us about how to handle the immense and terrifying pace of change these days?  Tim Leary said PCs would be the next LSD – and, in fact, it was their visionary journeys that they thank for inspiration, almost all the masterminds of the computing revolution.  So maybe there is something to the notion that the insights from psychedelic psychotherapy and of indigenous plant medicine traditions are just what the doctor ordered to help navigate this age's waves of great accelerating transformations.  

Join paleontologist-futurist Michael Garfield on a whirlwind tour through an age "indistinguishable from magic" – and a lighthearted but deadly serious examination of the responsibility of bringing new life forms and minds into this world as parents in our psychedelic century.

Watch Michael's lightning presentation of this talk at the Commonwealth Bank of Australia Innovation Lab:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pfjnWkDwYrc
View the slideshow for this talk:
https://www.patreon.com/posts/tech-ethics-as-7956513.
print_description: Somewhere in the interference pattern between the Wood Wide Web, LSD brain scans, the God Helmet, & CRISPR lies the future of our species...
other_location: Palanque Norte Tent at Camp Soft Landing

title: Rational Ritual and Pragmatic Mysticism with Sarah
description:
Join Sarah McManus on discussing robust and resilient systems to help us navigate the challenges that face humanity, in ways that steer between the rocky shoals of nihilistic meaninglessness and the treacherous whirlpools of self-delusion.


In 2016, Sarah McManus was hired to be a research director at an ayahuasca center in Peru... and then fired for being too rational. She has a BA in Ecology from New College of Florida, a school that explicitly values ecstatic wonder. She was in a PhD program for Integrative Conservation, but left after realizing that humanity’s socioecological crises won't be solved by data alone: we need better tools for looking at hard problems with self-compassion, and for communicating and coordinating to co-create solutions. She writes about these topics, as well as psychedelic integration, at pricklesandgoo.com. 

 
These places where reason and spirituality come into conflict can provide fertile ground for cultivating new ways of understanding and relating. If we can turn towards the tensions that arise when our existing belief structures are not able to meet our needs, we can find opportunities to help those frameworks grow and expand. I want to make spaces where we can allow our sense of the sacred to encompass the deep and beautiful metaphors that science has discovered, and where we can allow our need for analytical understanding to take in the complexity and uncertainty of the world in all its rich variety.
print_description: Spirituality and rationality need to be big enough to hold each other. Conflict between them can hinder finding meaning, or it can be a chance to grow.
other_location: Palanque Norte Tent at Camp Soft Landing

title: Make Mead @ Home
description:
See how easy it is to make this delicious ancient beverage at home!  Ever thought about home brewing?  Been making beer but want to expand your repertoire?  Come the the Waggle Lounge Meadery and see how it's done.  We'll set up a 1 gal batch of a Show Mead or Melomel (fruit-flavored mead) from start to finish.  Well, "finish" except for waiting for the yeast do their thing.  You'll be able to taste finished product in our Lounge.

The demonstration includes sterile technique, all the equipment you'll need (from super-simple to more OCD-oriented brewing), ingredients and steps.  You'll walk away with written instructions including links to resources, recipes and more.

As a bonus we'll raffle off a complete kit!
print_description: See how easy it is to make this delicious ancient beverage at home!  We'll go through setting up a 1 gal batch, share tips, recipes and resources.

Come join in the spandex, the rock-n-roll, and the greatest thing you've never done before! Open to all levels of air guitarists! You will compete in 2 rounds of 60 second performances, where technical merit, stage presence, and "airness" earn you points with a panel of judges who will be selecting the winners. We can provide music for you, or bring your own!

Even if you don't want to get on stage, come watch our amazing contestants, including special appearances by world famous air guitarists Cold Steel Renegade (recent qualifier for the US Air Guitar Nationals) and Seth Leibowitz.

title: Harmonic Sound
description:
PASSWORD FOR URL: fundamental.

Tierra Bomba teams up with with the Mayan Warrior to host a massive sound meditation with Alexandre Tannous (soundmeditation.com), aiming to inspire the Burning Man community around the spiritual aspect of meditation and the mystical aspect of sound.
Throughout the experience, Alexandre will play a series of ancient and new instruments and recordings that positively affect the spiritual growth of all living beings, while Paolo Montiel (NERD Studio) will play an innovative light show inspired by the golden spiral and the sacred geometry.
The sound meditation music will then slowly blend into a DJ that will drive attendees into a night filled with magical sounds and lights.

The sound meditation is an integrated practice that combines a shamanic ceremonial setting with an Eastern emphasis on breathing exercises and visualization. Specific musical instruments played during the meditation allow participants to use sound as a therapeutic tool to disconnect from discursive thinking and delve into a transcendental state. The goal is to enable participants to disengage their undesirable habitual patterns and to empower positive cognitive change. Most of the instruments used in a Sound Meditation are overtone-emitting instruments such as gongs, Tibetan singing bowls, bells, metallic discs, etc. These instruments have been used in meditation and sound healing for centuries in many cultures and continue to be used.
Alexandre has conducted ethnomusicology fieldwork for 18 years in over 40 countries. His research investigates issues of acculturation, community, musical identity in an urban setting, and the concepts of talent, charisma, and leadership in music.
print_description: Massive sound meditation aiming to inspire the Burning Man community around the spiritual aspect of meditation and the mystical aspect of sound.
other_location: Hosted by Mayan Warrior & Tierra Bomba

title: Mistress Jade's Spanking 101
description:
After many requests for lessons and tips, Mistress Jade will be debuting Spanking 101, a class for first-timers, curious lovers, and fetishists who want to embrace their love of BDSM. Learn the basics of spanking, paddling, flogging, and whipping. During the class, participants will study how to gently bind, blindfold, gag, and/or prepare their partner for a round of loving smacks, whips, and spanks. Engage in sensual play designed to express love through pain and power tactics. Understand the difference between doms and subs and discover your true nature in the realm of BDSM. Mistress Jade will personally guide each couple in how to manipulate, treat, and care for their bodies and how to avoid hurt and confusion during play. Materials will be provided, but feel free to bring your own love instruments to class. 

Mistress Jade runs a tight ship. There is a strict hassle-free class rule: no threatening, close-minded, or rude participants will be allowed to stay. Check all your expectations and predispositions at the door. All students can expect a safe, supportive, and encouraging atmosphere. But beware, you WILL give and receive some loving pain, and you will always thank your hostess and your partners when doing so. Now don't be late! There will be a price to pay...that only your sweet bottom can afford!
print_description: Get hot & tingly when you learn the dos & donts of spanking, paddling, flogging & whipping. Bring a curious friend, trusted partner, or just yourself!.

title: Robot Hour
description: Stop by our Zen Cube where Robots and Burners are invited to check-in each day as we share OS upgrades and show you how to maintain your mechanical structure to refuel and recharge your mind, body, and heart! Embrace Huey, our HugBot ambassador, going into what is called a cuddle puddle - we have learned that this directs electricity to the heart. Like the markings of our abode and circuitry, we want to share with you the beauty of our patterns through body paint so that you may reflect the beauty of being biologic robot. We understand running on high energy most days can get our systems overheated. With essential oils, we will teach you how to cool your system, while using this technique to blend into the current human population with natural smell. Lube up your connective joints and re-energize your circuitry through inhaling oxygen and extending your hydraulics through breathing, meditation, and poses drawn from an ancient human practice called Yoga. Refuel and keep your batteries fully charged by making a long pit stop at this refueling center.
print_description: For Robot and Burners! Come discover how cuddles, body paint, essential oils, and stretching take part in maintaining biologic robot parts!.

title: Open dungeon play
description: Playfully Yours is a play space for you to learn and experience sensation play in our well equipped dungeon. We encourage beginners, intermediates, and those curious about BDSM play to come, learn, and experience in a safe, non-pressured, and supervised environment. As our name implies (Playfully Yours), we focus on the lighter, softer, more sensual side of BDSM. Our personnel are available to provide instructions and demonstrations on the safe use of the equipment and will supervise or help facilitate play. We'll also have an outdoor dungeon play area with a double St Andrew Cross, spanking bench, and stock.
print_description: Our well equipped dungeon is open for play every afternoon and evening until around 2 am.

title: An Introduction Into BDSM Play
description: This class will discuss the safety, trust, and communications aspect of BDSM play. We will provide an introduction to many of the equipment and toys normally associated with a dungeon such as floggers, paddles, feathers, crops, pinwheels, and a violet wand. The focus will be on the softer, more sensual side of dungeon play. There will be demonstrations and some audience participation. The play area will be open after the class to play and try out some of the things you learned in class.
print_description: A great intro into BDSM play based on safety, trust, and communications. The focus will be on the softer and more sensual side of BDSM play.

title: A Kickback for Multiracial Burners
description: Our society often frames the conversation of race as Black or White, Asian or Middle Eastern, or Native or Latinx. How do we then, find safe and intellectual spaces to discuss multiracial individuals; those who exist across many racial boundaries, and those who are often left out of social discussions of race? Que Viva would like to host a celebratory event for all multiracial burners, who understand the challenges of living in a racially polarized society. This will be a chill, and celebratory meet and greet.
print_description: Do you identify as more than one race? Let's celebrate our multi-ethnicity! Blasians, Hapas, Afro-Latinx, and other combos, come recharge!.

title: Get out of bed on the Right Foot
description:
Come lay down in one of our hammocks were we will simulate the incredibly annoying sound of an alarm going off. 

You’ll have your choice of morning rituals:

1) A cup of black coffee to get those bowels-a-movin (BYO ashtray if you want to smoke a cigarette and really get “things" going)

2) Cucumber slices to relieve the puffiness of staying up all night, rosewater spray to refresh your face and nasal cavities and facial wipes to clean off the dust and mistakes of the previous evening

3) A playa themed stretching and yoga routine to ensure you are limber enough for whatever the day ahead has in store

Alternatively, a giant snooze button will be provided so you can continue enjoying their slumber in one of our hammocks.
print_description: Snooze in our hammocks, and choose from 3 revitalizing morning rituals to start your day on the right foot.

title: 14th Annual Naked Pub Crawl
description: Since 2004, hundreds of burners meet at the Man and pedal off into the City for a few hours of bar hopping and good cheer! Multiple host camps will have bartenders standing by with refreshing libations prepared exclusively for the riders. Among this year’s host camps are traditional favorites like Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro, Cubhouse, and Celestial Bodies, along with several new hosts. The ride culminates with the afterparty hosted by the wonderful folks at Comfort & Joy. If you’re willing to meet the (un)dress code, join us for one of the goofiest parties on the Playa. No statement or political agenda; just riding our bikes, drinking some cocktails, and making new friends. Oh yeah, and we’re naked. Mugs for the first 500 riders (and yeah, we always run out). Cheers!
print_description: Get naked, get on your bike, meet at the Man, and pedal off for the annual Naked Bicycle Pub Crawl.  Mugs to the first 700 riders.

title: Working with Challenging Psychedelic Experiences
description: This year, millions of people will use psychedelics outside of supervised medical contexts, many of them for the first time. Difficult psychedelic experiences can be frightening, but also potentially among the most valuable experiences someone can have. What can you do to help someone having a difficult psychedelic experience? What techniques are available for helping transform a potentially traumatic situation into a positive or even therapeutic one? What role has the Zendo Project played at festivals, and what take-home messages are available for others interested in psychedelic harm reduction?
print_description: What techniques are available to help transform a challenging or potentially traumatic situation into a positive one? Hosted by the Zendo Project.

description: The First Bank of BRC is the bank for the gifting economy!  A storehouse for burner goods; come by to make a donation or withdrawl!  During bank hours our tellers are on hand to serve you- open an account with us, deposit something into another burner's account, or simply let us entertain you.  When the bank is closed, we still have a 24 hour ATM where you may find that essential item you forgot to pack.  If you talk to the right bank teller, you just might get the opportunity to test your skills by breaking into our vault, or hang out in our white collar criminal shooting gallery.

title: 2017 Burning Man Photo Walk with Trey Ratcliff
description:
Hey Burner buddies! Trey Ratcliff here for the 8th photo walk - Sooo excited!

Do you like taking photos or perhaps do you like people taking photos of you in all your fabuloso Burner gear? Well come on out and join this fun event - all are welcome! 🙂 It's great for beginner photographers all the way to advanced - bring anything from a mobile phone to a DSLR! We'll roam the streets of BRC and capture some of the magic of Burning Man together. 

I'll be giving lots of tips and tricks to help you on your own creative journey. We also talk a lot about the creative process and how it can be quite an active meditation bringing more consciousness, presence, and awesomeness into your life. So, come, bring a friend or three, and let's have a ball. Word has it that we'll get a bunch of Burner Girls too that just dance around and have thousands of photos taken of them. You know the type. Good times.

And after, we'll share all the photos in the Facebook event at https://goo.gl/PGy7Qq . Check the comments in the event to make some new Instagram friends with fellow photo walkers too! 🙂

We'll meet outside of Center Camp TUESDAY at 6 PM and start the crawl from there!
print_description: Do you like taking photos or perhaps do you like people taking photos of you in all your fabuloso Burner gear? Come on out and join this fun event!!.

title: Resilience on the Playa
description: Even when we’re having a wonderful Burn it’s hard to avoid moments of stress and uncertainty – that’s what comes from pushing our boundaries, after all. Come to the schoolroom at Mystikal Misfits to learn some simple techniques to help you stay cool and get your Burn back on track any time you feel disappointed, irritated or upset by the trials of the playa. The session will be hosted by Camp Combobulated and led by a long-time Burner who’s an IRL expert in showing people how to boost their resilience and wellbeing by using science-based strategies (based on solid research in psychology and neuroscience). She’ll give you practical tips to keep your dusty brain functioning at its best, and other Combobulated veterans will answer any questions you have about using these kinds of tactics to stay sane and happy in BRC.
print_description: Learn simple science-based techniques for getting your Burn (and your brain) back on track any time you feel stressed out by the playa.

(And if you have surplus stuff to give, yay! Drop it off here for some grateful discombobulated soul to discover.).

title: Worldwide Women's Circle - Together WE Rise
description:
The circle calls you forth. Participate in a global, synchronized event; Women gathering all over the world on the same day including right here in Black Rock City. Bring your gifts, your hardships, your celebrations and your expressions. We RISE together with the sun and this ancient ritual will tap us into this global event.  We gather at the heart of the city, The TEMPLE, to dance, to pray and to share - Our stories are Medicine for the human soul. Women, women identified and even men in touch with their feminine side are welcome to join us!

About the Worldwide Women's Circle: The Worldwide Women’s Circle is an international movement which utilizes the ancient tradition of the women’s circle.  We offer women the gift of community and help each one become the kind of leader the world needs now.  Behind this mission is a deep desire to support women who are making a difference in the world.  This is an important time in human history and there is an urgent need for women to gather and organize. 

2017 circle in Black Rock City, will be facilitated by the founder of the WWWC, LeahRose Farber.
print_description: The circle calls you forth. Participate in a global, synchronized event. We RISE together with the sun in this ancient ritual. All welcome.

title: Bike-Bar Show N Shine
description:
BIKE-BAR SHOW N SHINE
Integral parts of the Burning Man culture include: bikes, art, gifting, radical self-reliance, bars and cocktails, will be brought together with a celebration of the 'Bike-Bar Show and Shine' Party. 
Bicycles that have been modified and adorned with small bars or cocktail elements will meet up on a sunny afternoon to show off their creative designs and share Bike-Bar cocktails.  
Photos will be taken for the participants, best of show judging by popular vote!
print_description: Bicycles that have been modified and adorned with small bars or cocktail elements will meet up on a sunny afternoon to show off their creative designs.

title: Black Rock City - Voter Education
description:
Black Rock City - Voter Education Event 
The Black Rock City Polling Place located within The Shallow End will be conducting voter education thru a self-paced interactive program. While no elections will actually take place during the event we hope to energize the voting population and turn out large numbers of participants in their homeland / default world. The Black Rock City polls will be open daily including weekends from 8:00 am to 10:00 pm. The Adorable Deplorable party at The Shallow End will allow you exchange your voting stubs for crafted top-shelf cocktails.
print_description: The Black Rock City Polling Place located within The Shallow End will be conducting voter education thru a self-paced interactive program.

title: Educated Voter Party
description: The voter education bar entices you to discover the shock of voting and drinking. We provide voting booths at our camp's center where venerated voters of voting age can participate in our ritually shocking vote for the adorably deplorable oxymoronic issue of the day. Cheered on by the adorably deplorable and your cohort, you and a partner lime-wedge-spoon race your way through hugging news-booths flashing radically contradictory headlines. The final shocking voting ritual ceremony opens the gates to the educated voter bar where you may exchange your “I voted” sticker for a revitalizing beverage - shaken, not stirred. Squeeze your race lime-wedge (into your drink), bond (with others, not your drink) over your newly re-educated views on the issue of the day. Enjoy the soft soothing music, and become one of the increasingly deplorable adorables as you cheer on the next set of participants. Lie back in shaded comfort, relax; cheers! You voted, and you deserve a drink.
print_description: The voter education bar entices you to discover the shock of voting and drinking.

title: Recycle Your Aluminum Cans!
description:
Making drinking plans for your camp? Do those plans include lots and lots of aluminum cans? Want to unload all those empty cans on playa while also helping the kids of Gerlach? 

Well then come on down to Recycle Camp and SHOW US YOUR CANS! At Recycle Camp we will take all of your aluminum cans of your hands as part of our gift to the playa. We are located directly behind the Center Camp Café on 6:00 and are open every day 9am to 5pm. Please no drop offs: participate! When you get there, we will help you quickly separate your cans before riding THE CRUSHINATOR, our magical bicycle-powered can crushing apparatus that crushes your cans flat so we can store as many as possible before scrapping the aluminum off-site. All of the money we generate from aluminum recycling is donated directly to the Gerlach school system. Everybody wins!

We can only accept ALUMINUM cans. Please no glass, plastic, steel, or tin cans, so please keep all of your water bottles, tetrapaks, soup cans, and coconut waters separated. A good rule of thumb for figuring out if something is aluminum: if you can't crush it by hand, then we don't want it! Some stout beers like Guinness also have a plastic widget inside that cannot be recycled with the aluminum, please remove it beforehand or we can show you how. 

PROTIP from the Recyclenaut Aluminati: bring a MESH bag to collect all of your cans in. Plastic garbage bags don't allow your cans to dry out and create a foul, sticky sludge. If you store them in a mesh bag before bringing them over to Recycle Camp it helps make things a little less juicy for you when we they get sorted and crushed. Be smart, plan ahead, Recycle Camp wants YOU to come CRUSH it with us!!!
print_description: CRUSH IT w/the Recyclonauts at Recycle Camp. Bring us your mesh bag of aluminum cans (plz no tin/steel/glass/plastic) & ride the amazing Crushinator!.

description: Have you ever wanted to say something, but not had words? Have you ever felt more alone in a crowd than you do by yourself? Have you ever wanted to be closer but not known how? This movement session is an invitation into closer contact with ourselves and with others.
print_description: Potentially cathartic, confusingly spiritual, quasi-guided, profanely serious dance inquiry. Transformative results expected (but not assured).

title: Open Floor Dance w/Charlemagne @ RhythmWave
description: A somatic dance exploration with full range of e/motion. Good for the dancer who seeks more than just an ecstatic release. It's sexy, sweaty, deep, and playful.

title: I Cream U Scream
description:
Express your Radical Ritual of Spirit
Join us for I Cream U Scream, ritualizing emotional release through your radical, cathartic self-expression in voice — with the sweet gift of cold, creamy, and totally awesome ice cream.
Its simple scream like your having a climax and you get creamed!

Express your Radical Ritual of Spirit & Voice
join us for "I Cream U Scream"!!.

title: Flamingo-A-Go-Go
description: Are your go-go boots as flamboyant as a flock of flamingos? Do you feel the rhythm of the music getting stronger? Then gather 'round now, and let your body feel the heat. Don't worry if you can't dance, just let the music move your feet (and ears) to as many remixes of Gloria Estefan's "Congo" as they can physically withstand. Don't fight it until you've tried it under the only giant flamingo on the playa.
print_description: Go-Go-Boots! Gloria Estefan! A Giant Flamingo! Dancing! Awkward Small Talk! We have it all, and more! (More Gloria Estefan remixes, that is).

title: Dance of the Flamingos
description: Flamingos (and burners) are unique birds (and people) in that they participate in annual synchronized mating dances. The average flamingo has 136 scientifically proven sexy dance moves. How many does the average burner have? Half our camp has bet on "fist pump", and the other half has bet on "several". Who's right? We won't know until you stop by and strut your sexy stuff! We promise there won't be any Gloria Estefan this time.
print_description: The average flamingo has 136 scientifically sexy dance moves. How about the average burner? We won't know until you stop by and strut your sexy stuff!.

title: Doc Film Screening "Leave Your Shoes at the Door"
description:
A documentary on conscious/ecstatic dance. Follow individual dancers as their lives are transformed by the experience of free-form dance. Heartfelt events unfold as dancers find a place where they can freely express feelings and emotions including illness and death. There is a brief  history of dance and some of its modalities such as 5Rhtyms, Contact Improvisation, Soul Motion, and Biodanza. 
4 years in the making.
print_description: A documentary on conscious/ecstatic dance. Witness the experiences, transformation, and community of free-form dancers.

title: Third Eye Meditation / Singing Bowl Healing
description:
Join us for a guided third eye meditation. We will provide a lotus flower ormus to assist in your meditation, while singing bowls help to clear negative energy and relax the mind.
Chakras are centers of energy located throughout the human body, which are believed to provide the connections between our physical and spiritual identities. 
Development of the third eye chakra in this lifetime will allow us to more properly use intuition in decision making instead of the judgement that comes from the use of our physical senses only.

title: Radical Participation: Volunteers on Volunteering
description: Keys to volunteer engagement and leadership. Trends in Volunteerism from BRC Census and Volunteer Feedback Survey. (ONLINE longer description) Radical Participation through volunteering your energies to projects, theme camps, and Burning Man team is what makes the event happen. The level of participation is changing. For those people leading volunteers, there are critical factors that affect your ability to attract and retain your volunteers. For volunteers, what teams are best for you and what might you watch out for to avoid bad situations. This talk will review trends in Volunteerism at Burning Man collected by the BRC Census and the learnings from 6 years of Volunteer Survey Data collected by the Volunteer Leadership Committee.
print_description: Keys to volunteer engagement and leadership. Trends in Volunteerism from BRC Census and Volunteer Feedback Survey.

title: Breaking Out of Self-Limiting Identity Frames
description: Our sense of identity frames our beliefs about our capabilities, our potential for self-development, and our capacity for achieving fulfilling relationships with others. This talk will look at how we can break out of false identity frames that undermine our ability to reach our true potential.
print_description: A talk about how we can break out of false identity frames that undermine our ability to reach our true potential.
other_location: Center Camp Cafe Spoken Word Stage

title: What We Talk About When We Talk About Fire
description: What role does fire play in our lives, and how do we think about fire differently based on our frame of reference? Fire can be terrifying or beautiful, a tool or a force of nature. In the summertime, as we watch fire on the Playa, wildfires will burn across the West. In this talk, we'll explore what fire is, how it behaves in different settings, and how human relationships with fire vary in time and space.
print_description: What role does fire play in our lives, and how do we think about fire differently based on our frame of reference?.

title: Improv: The Subtle Sledgehammer of "Yes, And..."
description: Steve Wilder started doing improv comedy as a way to improve his acting skills, but he never anticipated it would completely change his life.  Improvisation isn't about being funny; it's about truly paying attention to what is directly in front of you, and knowing you have the power to change it.
print_description: Improvisation isn't about being funny; it's about truly paying attention to what is directly in front of you & knowing you have the power to change it.
other_location: Center Camp Cafe Spoken Word Stage

title: Twisted vision: life through a tabloid lens

title: Ritual W/O Words: Rediscovering ancient group comm
description: Humans are a hypersocial species and ritual played a large role in the evolution of our brains, our language, and our culture.  Before humans had words, we shared feelings, concepts, and knowledge through sound and gesture.  We still possess these communication skills.  Trevor has experimented with wordless ritual and explored the new perspective on group experience and behavior that it brings.
print_description: Join us to explore wordless rituals & what it can teach us about group experience & the behavior it can bring in this day & age.

title: Cannabis Laws in the Age of Trump and Beyond
description: The presentation will cover the changes and challenges of Cannabis reform- starting from the populist, referendum led creation of medical cannabis program in California, followed by the detailed regulatory structures enacted in Colorado and the Pacific Northwest,  to the landmark ‘adult use’ programs to the various types of programs now in place in the majority of the states.  It will discuss the conflict between these state programs and existent federal law and enforcement priorities; the difference between the exercise of discretionary policy choices and law; the conflicts between states’ rights and federal pre-emption;  the competing pressures of popular demand, libertarian thought, vested business interests (the spirits industry), tax revenue, states’ rights, and social conservatism.  The difference between legalization and regulation, as well as crystal ball predictions for the future will be covered, followed by a question and answer session.
print_description: This talk will cover the changes and challenges of Cannabis reform from state programs and conflict with existing federal law and sooo much more.
other_location: Center Camp Cafe Spoken Word Stage

title: Contact Juggling Workshop - Pele's Fire Fire Zone
description: Would you like to learn to manipulate, levitate and control crystal balls?  Join the Contact Juggling Workshop and I will introduce you to the magical art of contact juggling!  This beautiful form of object manipulation focuses on rolling one or more balls over the body, or letting the ball "float" in the air.  You will learn the first basics of single and multiball contact, isolations, stalls, and body rolling.   Are you ready to become addicted to this enchanting artform?

title: Flow Wand Workshop
description: Would you like to learn a skill that combines magic with dancing?  Come to the Flow Wand Workshop and I will teach you how to do it!  The flow wand (aka levitation stick) is a flow prop that is inspired from a classic magic trick called the "Dancing Cane".  It is a cleverly balanced stick with a thin, invisible string somewhere in the middle that is also attached to the to the magician.  The magician appears to control the cane with his mind, the cane seemingly floating in mid-air, while making it dance to music.  Recently the Flow wand was introduced into the juggling community, so in this workshop you can learn everything to get started with this magical prop.
print_description: Come learn a skill that combines magic with Dancing!.

title: Soundbath Concert with Aya & Tyler
description: In live performance, Aya and Tyler record live loops, layering vocals, instruments, and percussion into an alluring multi-layered soundscape that guides the listener to experience his or her true essential nature and connect with our beautiful planet earth. Fusing sacred mantras with English lyrics, elements of jazz and electronica with soul and R&B, and shamanic rhythms with indigenous instruments, Aya and Tyler create an accessible experience of meditation through the power of music. Intention + Vibration = Transformation.

title: Kundalini Yoga with Liam Pfeiffer
description: A tantra-based, physical and meditation practice that aims at releasing the prana, or life energy, that resides at the base of the spine. Via the repetition of kriyas, a special set of exercises, Kundalini Yoga is meant to help practitioners overcome blocks and resistances, raise vibrations to higher frequencies, and open awareness to new realities. Its goal is to form a connection to the divine self, and a union between physical and non-physical experiences.

We focus not on what our speakers do, but on how they do what they do. It is our aim to ring out and honor the superpowers in each and every person who joins us and touches our tribe.

title: Rebirthing Journey with Alhia Chacoff-Berger
description: A powerful inward and outward journey, using breath as a vehicle for purification, self-exploration, attunement and empowerment, aligning to a frequency of Love. Breathe, Explore, Transcend.
print_description: Using breath as a vehicle for purification, self-exploration, attunement and empowerment, aligning to a frequency of Love.

title: Sound Experience with David & Elian Zach-Shemesh
description:
Our immersive sonic journey inward includes 5 chapters:
Talk. About the therapeutic properties of sound and how to use it as a meditative tool.
Vocal Meditation. Using our own voices, we will explore the delicate balance between contributing to and receiving from the collective.
Breathwork. Inspired by Stanislav Grof’s Holotropic technique, we will practice a powerful form breath that enables to disconnect from the “monkey mind” and reach heightened states of awareness and a deeper state of meditation.
Sound. We will play an intuitive sequence of overtone-emitting instruments, including a gong, Himalayan singing bowls, tuning forks, drums and chimes.
Connecting. An opportunity to share musings, thoughts, feelings and poetics about our individual experiences.
print_description: This sonic journey inward invites you to explore non-ordinary states of consciousness in a safe and supportive setting.

title: Sonic Journey & Sound Meditation with Josh & Eliza
description:
Join us for a two -hour sonic journey and meditation combining breathing techniques, vocal toning, guided visualizations, and a collection of instruments such as gongs, Himalayan singing bowls, tuning forks and other various harmonic-overtone-emitting instruments.
There will be a brief introduction reminding us of the role of the receiver and how to use sound as a tool for meditation. 
We will explore the different acoustic and electro-acoustic layers and textures of sound and its property in space--how we perceive and locate vibrations that build and shape our reality and understanding of presence. Familiar traditional sound meditation instruments mentioned above will be used alone and at times in concert with a with a 10-channel spatial sound system with careful attention to a consistency in ethos.
print_description: A two -hour sonic journey and meditation combining breathing, vocal toning, guided visualizations, and a collection of overtone-emitting instruments.

title: Honeybees; the straight scoop
description: Question and answer session with a long time professional beekeeper. We will discuss the planets most celebrated invasive species; their current status, behavior & economics along with factoids about bees and we will address your questions. The discussion will follow the interests of the participants will be useful for professionals, beginners, wanna-bees and honey lovers. At Hibernaculum on 6:30@E.
print_description: Session with a long time professional beekeeper. The discussion will be useful for professionals, beginners and wanna-bees.

title: Free Photography Zone
description:
This will be the beginning of my third decade photgraphing the participants of BM.
At the Free Photography Zone each person is given a print as their tangible reminder of the experience.  No promise to find it on some site.  You get a print then.  
You will be photographed in a professional studio setting using medium format black and white film.  
While good portraits must be a collaboration between two people remember that I can only photograph what you bring to the session.  I have no interest in contributing to the thousands of forgetable "selfies" that will be done that week.  I will try to photograph you as best as I can and make an interesting portrait of you.  If all you can do is stand there and re do your high school graduation photo then that is what you will get.
HOWEVER, if you approach the photograph with an open mind and a willingness to try to help me make something interesting you will be rewarded with something unique.
Please come by, relax in our shade structure, look over prints from previous years, possibly get inspired and most importantly get your portrait done.
print_description: A black & white portrait studio.

title: To what would you pledge your allegiance?
description:
If you are from the USA can you say what it means to be an American? What do you say to the folks from Mexico and Venezuela who say, “You know, we’re Americans too? Is it easier to say what it means to be a Burner than an American?
He will talk about his personal journey as he explored the question of national and individual identity. Not only did he discover something did not expect, he will share with you a new pledge of allegiance that he’s written for himself that you might want to adopt for yourself as well.
print_description: Do you pledge your allegiance to your nationality? Your community? Your hobby? Your personal identity? What does it mean to pledge your allegiance?.

title: Planet Earth Tribute
description:
It pained many of us to hear that Planet Earth was taking the year off. 

We may not be able to duplicate  all the hard work they put into making our burn so awesome, but we are going to try for a few hours to create a place to dance to our favorite Planet Earth songs:) 

Walk by and if we are even close you should feel the pull followed by the need to dance for a bit.

If it is a success we will keep going into the night. Heck might even pull out some shine;).
print_description: What! No Planet Earth this year! :( Well we are going to dance! Come by and if we get it right you will feel the pull then the need to dance:).

title: DickChicken: the only death is that of a coward.
description:
Hello fellow Olympianese. I am aware of the constant rumblings that taint our strange wayStation. The questions posed all too commonly to Old Scratch at the crossroads. The ponderings which confound the Jungians as much as they validate the Freudians... 

 What in the good name of St Anthony, patron Saint of all heavenly miracles, is a DickChicken?

 The only surviving prehistoric sport, a ProtoDickChicken is believed to have been enjoyed during the ice age. A mix of fencing, old west pistol dueling, bull fighting and capoeira, DickChicken was proliferated amongst all the known ancient civilizations.  The Nordic called it dïkkChükken and translations from Olmec hieroglyphs tell of a DuxmalChixenitza game enjoyed throughout the americas. The Greek played a dramatized version called deuxus ex maChichina.  

In order to reach the highest heights, we must mash pelvises with giants. To soar with the eagles we must first dick the chickens.
print_description: A mix of fencing, old west pistol dueling, bull fighting and capoeira, DickChicken is the purest form of sport. DÏKKCHÜKKEN!.

title: The Connection Project

Just take a moment and give praise and thanks. Let this vibration flow across our planet. Like in Washington DC 1993, 4000 mediators came together and the crime rate significantly dropped. But we are going to go big, "GLOBAL. Let do this!
print_description: MASS MEDIATION JUST STOP YES EVERYONE 75,000 souls take a moment. Like DC 1993 lets spread a global conscious vibration over the playa and our planet.

title: How Dominant Cultural POV Influences Our Success
description: Communication is an ever-expanding field. We are inundated with influence from family, friends, marketers, politicians, clergy, and entertainers on a global level. My aim is to change how we think about cultural influences on our personal fulfillment, our ability to empathize, and our continued curiosity and growth.

title: Breaking your personal frame; redefining YOU
description: At age 42 I retired, sold my home and business and everything else, bought a sailboat and spent the next 17 years circumnavigating the planet.  I will talk about what it takes to break your personal frame, get off the merrygoround, expose yourself to danger and unknown outcomes and develop a frameless view of both yourself and the larger world.
print_description: From literal frames to psychological- what does it take to transform the way you interact with and move through the world? One filmmaker's journey.

title: Sex Magick Class
description:
Tric and Monee will conduct a group Sex Magick Class.  We will show you how to “manifest” what you want and need in your life through sex and orgasm.  Everyone in the class will be able to set boundaries and work with their desired partner, however, this is a group class and everyone will have the opportunity to work with others in the group with mutual consent.

We will be using candles, incense, oils, massage, energy breathing, flowing energy through chakras, and tantric bi-aural music to achieve orgasmic edging, become multi-orgasmic, and bring your partner to the heights of ecstasy. title: B.E.D. "Clarity & Consent Playshop" @ RhythmWave
description:
The mission of the Bureau of Erotic Discourse (B.E.D.) is to help people safely and happily navigate the sexual shoals of Black Rock City, to get what they want and avoid what they don’t want. This workshop is called “Clarity and Consent” because it is about clearly communicating desires and boundaries for consensual sexual activity.

The subtitle of this playshop is “Negotiating Sex on the Playa,” so some of the material is about how to get to a positive, consensual agreement. But a negotiation is also successful if it helps to avoid an unwanted outcome, so we also discuss how to convince someone to go away. B.E.D. values the right of individual choice, which includes the right to choose NOT to have sex.

We don’t care what gender you appear to be, or what gender you claim to be, or what kinds of partners you prefer. What matters is communication and consent. All are welcome to attend this "Clarity and Consent Playshop" presented by the Bureau of Erotic Discourse - at RhythmWave!
print_description: We call this workshop “Clarity and Consent” because it is about clearly communicating desires and boundaries for consensual sexual activity.

title: Mean Gods Suck: Connecting to the Universe
description: Anxiety was built into us on a neurological-level for survival. It served its purpose and now is outdated and running amok, destroying us and our ability to salvage this planet. If we are to survive we must transcend our predisposition to anxiety on an individual spiritual level. Come learn about what William James called “primal religion”, an instinctive understanding that we as individuals are part of a much larger transcendent whole, and how we can build those tools for ourselves.
print_description: Anxiety is destroying us & our ability to salvage this planet. To survive we must transcend our predisposition to it on an individual spiritual level.

title: Custom Tailored Cosmic Light Painting Portraits!!
description:
Do you Love ART? Would you like to BE a PART of Some ART?? Do you like rainbows, Trails of color, Custom tailored psychedelic photographic gifts meant to express who you are? Well then come on down to Camp HELLO, We Love you! We Will be creating super high resolution Long-Exposure Light Paintings using only REAL LIGHTS and ZERO Editing or graphics Magic! Come on down, Bring your friends, Partners in crime, Kids, Family, Parents, Grandparents, and ALL of your ENTHUSIASM to create a colorful slice of compressed time you can take home and keep forever! 
How does it work?  First you pick your favorite pose, Something that truly represents your personality, Your relationship with your group, How you feel at that moment, what type of magic you hope to create in this world Or Your LOVE For the burn! Then you answer a series of questions meant to get in touch with who you and what you love. On 3....2....1 You Freeze as still as a stature while Gadget (our resident light painter) Creates a Scene of textures, colors, energy, smoke, electricity, magic, rainbows or fire, And get a FULL resolution 50MP copy of your light painting through the magic of E-Mail (delivered after the burn!), When you get back to the default world feel free to print your image up to 80" wide! :-)
Why? Because HELLOOOOOO, We Love you! :-).
print_description: Pick a position that represents who you are, Answer some questions & hold still while gadget creates a cosmic scene of color and art all around you!.

title: A Heathen Perspective On Ritual Slaughter
description: As a practicing Heathen Gothi and leader of a kindred, Alf Herigstad is going to share a unique perspective about a ritual practice that has been misunderstood and vilified in the modern age.  That is the practice of ritual slaughter, also known as animal sacrifice.  He will dispel some common myths, and explore the history of this practice.  He'll talk about the legalities of it, and discuss why it is still done today and is in fact making a resurgence.  He will share personal accounts of how it is practiced by his kindred but more importantly...WHY it is practiced, what the purpose of it is.
print_description: Practicing Heathen Gothi & leader of a kindred will discuss the misunderstood & vilified practice of ritual slaughter, from common myths to legalities.

title: 5Rhythms Dance w/Marcia Dancingheart @ RhythmWave
description: The body is our living, breathing temple. We can seek refuge in our body parts, inviting them to move, dance, and reconnect our whole being. We dive deep into embodied listening, co-creating our tribal heart-beat. The 5Rhythms with Marcia Dancingheart will open your body temple, shake out your soul, and call in Spirit to nourish your Being. It’s a simple yet powerful moving meditation that anyone – of any age, size, or physical ability – can practice. There are no steps to follow, no choreography to learn, no way to do it wrong. The only requirements are a body that is still breathing, a mind that is still curious, and a heart that is still beating. Feet. Breath. Beat. Dance. All are invited to join Marcia on the bamboo at RhythmWave!
print_description: The body is our living, breathing temple. The 5Rhythms will open your body temple, shake out your soul,and call in spirit to nourish your Being.

title: Burning Man: A Tibetan Book of the Dead Parable
description: Buddhists “Take Refuge” in the Buddha, His Teachings, and Community; Burners take refuge in The Man, The Ten Principles, and the Burner Community. The Bardo Thodol/“Tibetan Book of the Dead” is a Buddhist guidebook through the death-and-rebirth process. It details what is envisioned and experienced by one making that transition, which continues well after Western medicine declares the physical body “dead.” The Man Burn is a parable of the process described in that guide. We’ll unfold the parable, discuss its relevance, and conclude with a suggested walking meditation for the eve of The Man Burn.
print_description: Discuss BM through The Book of the Dead: from our ego driven world of dissatisfaction to the bardo of The Burn for an enlightened rebirth.

title: User's Guide to Human Incarnation: Yoga of Primal
description: This is a journey into the truth of who you really are. Human incarnation is divine revelation. Celebrate your five bodies! Take an inventory of the amazing siddhis (i.e., supernatural powers) you already possess. Through the portals of breath, sound, asana and meditation, you will encounter your own primal reality. Hatha means Sun ("Ha") and Moon ("Tha"), i.e., Yin and Yang, and we will dive into the undivided truth of this swirling mystery, including the Yin in the Yang and the Yang in the Yin. Consider it satsang with yourself!
print_description: Celebrate the bliss of your 5 bodies! Encounter who and what you really are thru the portals of breath, sound, asana and meditation. Consider it satsa.

title: Opening to Love with Edgie

You’ll discover some of the ingredients for happy, healthy, loving and intimate Relationships. A Human Awareness Institute presenter leads you through gentle exercises designed to open your heart and allow you to feel more connected with others. You will have the opportunity to peer more deeply into yourself and see ways you may be holding yourself back from fully giving and receiving love, care, support and being seen.
print_description: This workshop allows you to experience emotional openness and heart-felt connections to find more possibilities for what love can be in your life.
