title: AI and man's quest to invent God
description: In our evolutionary march through time this is a story about human inventions are an encapsulation of our goals. Nature has progressively given birth to new life forms but in short time humans quest to automate and digitize may be giving birth to a new life form. Will this new being, be our collective vision of God.
print_description: This is a story about human inventions are an encapsulation of our goals. Our digital exhaust is the food for a new life form; What are we feeding it?.

title: Hockey Skills Clinic
description: Come “check” us out!! No ReGretzky’s is hosting hockey themed shenanigans: hockey shoot-outs, skills clinics, and hockey twister! Come play with our balls and sticks… we will even teach you how to use them! Not into slipping one past our goalie? Come hang out with our sexy referees in our shaded area.  Don’t sit on the bench, drop your gloves and come and get it!
print_description: Come “check” us out!! Come play with our balls & sticks in our hockey skills clinic! Don’t sit on the bench! Drop your gloves & come get it!!.

title: Stories from DC, not Washington
description: After four years of telling true tales of dust & glory in the Capital, DC area Burners are taking the stage in Black Rock City. Come hear autobiographical stories about how people who live, work, and play in DC bring a bit of that Playa magic and the Ten Principles into their lives and communities, because there's a completely different city from the Washington you might know.
print_description: After four years of telling true tales of dust & glory in the Capital, DC area Burners are taking the stage in Black Rock City.

title: Playawear 911: Reparo Fabulosa
description: Need help with your radical self-expression? Did your latest dust-up result in a rip, tear, or busted seam?  Are your britches bothersome or your camelback chaffing?  Do you just want to be creative in the shade for a while? Come on down to camp Yes Please at 8:00 & Eulogy,  sip something cool, and get craftsy with us. Whether you are simply in need of a needle and thread for radical self-repairs or everything is falling apart beyond your skill set, we're here to help. Our Big Box o' Dreams (Fabric Division) is stocked with the supplies you need to repair your playawear or finish that not-quite-playa-ready outfit. We're open anytime for self-fixes. If your gear is good, stop in and rummage through our treasure chest of trinkets to create your own playa-inspired jewelry.  Ask for Stitch or Mariposa for advice and assistance.
print_description: Too late for print.

title: Gnomish Elixir Mixer
description: Bring your mischievous enthusiasm for an all-new celebratory ritual uniting our species. Newly adopted gnomes encouraged!
print_description: Bring your mischievous enthusiasm for an all-new celebratory ritual uniting our species. Newly adopted gnomes encouraged!.

title: Gnome Adoptions (Kid Friendly!)
description: Do you have a gnome-sized hole in your family? Our adoption ceremony will determine the most qualified homes for orphaned Gnomes.
print_description: Do you have a gnome-sized hole in your family? Our adoption ceremony will determine the most qualified homes for orphaned Gnomes.

title: Terrible Tarot
description: De-mystify your future with our guru psychic, Jessica Talbot, as she inaccurately and inexpertly reads tarot cards passed down from generation to generation. She welcomes all individuals, couples and random BRC citizens that may be standing too close to each other. Wild tales of divinity and awe will be told, to make even the most simple question a series of mystical bullshit, and inspire even the most hardened road warrior or ripper lover. See your dystopian future before it arrives!!!
print_description: Guru psychic Jessica Talbot is here to inaccurately and inexpertly read tarot cards. See your dystopian future before it arrives! All are welcome.

title: Hookah Hour at an authentic Bedouin tent.
description:
Relax, pull up a cushion and settle in for a spell in an authentic Desert to Desert Bedouin tent. 

Fill the air with the sweet smells of hookah and conversation. Let the scents of rosewater, cardamom, burning rosewood and frankincense mixed with softly playing Arabian music carry you from one desert to another. Hot and cold chai are served daily along with Arabic sweets and dried fruits.
print_description:
Relax, pull up a cushion and settle in for a spell.
Fill the air with the sweet smells of hookah and
conversation. Hot and cold chai served daily.

title: Water Calligraphy
description:
Ephemeral- lasting a very short time; shortlived;
transitory. Join us for a workshop where
the project lasts but minute, yet the experience
will leave an indelible mark on your soul.
Enjoy authentic iced or hot Chai served in a Bedouin café afterwards.
print_description:
Join us for a workshop where
the project lasts but minute, yet the experience
will leave an indelible mark on your soul.
Iced or hot Chai served.

title: Hugging Workshop
description: Explore 25 different ways to hug. Get ready for pats, taps, squeezes and bear hug grunts. Hugging is an extremely positive form of communication. It expresses the values of love, approval, gratitude, and forgiveness. Hugging is a great form of emotional satisfaction, but with some surprising health benefits. Enjoy authentic iced or hot Chai served in a Bedouin café afterwards.
print_description: Explore 25 different ways to hug. Get ready for pats, taps, squeezes and bear hug grunts. Hugging is an extremely positive form of communication.

title: Poi & Flow Arts Playshop
description:
Flow Art encompasses an array of circus performance
arts such as juggling, poi, staff, hoop,
levi wand and more! Come by the workshop and
work on your desired prop or just come by and
flow with us! BYOP (Bring Your Own Prop). Enjoy authentic iced or hot Chai served in a Bedouin café afterwards.
print_description:
Flow Art encompasses an array of circus performance
arts such as juggling, poi, staff, hoop,
levi wand and more!  Bring Your Own Prop.

title: Playa Seals Art Tour
description:
Fact: Playa Seals love ART ART ART! Meet
at camp Spice N Vice for the seals signature
cocktail- Kiss From a Rose. Come in your best
seal disguise. We will ride together to various
art pieces to sunbathe and frolic.
print_description:
Fact: Playa Seals love ART ART ART. Come in your best
seal disguise. We will ride together to various
art pieces to sunbathe and frolic.

title: Arabic Calligraphy & Tattoo Art
description:
Give us a word, statement, name or anything with spiritual significance.... we’ll translate it
and shape it into Arabic Calligraphy for you and draw it on your body. Rumi would be proud! Enjoy authentic iced or hot Chai served in a Bedouin café afterwards.
print_description: Give us a word or anything with spiritual significance.... we’ll translate it and shape it into Arabic Calligraphy for you and draw it on your body.

title: Hooping 101 Playshop
description:
Do you wanna go the party? Come show us your party moves! Oh wait, what party are you going to? We here at Spice and Vice want to spice up your party moves so
you can shake those hips all the way to the party and beyond. Come let us help you hoop your way to the party you want to go to. Virgin with a hoop or experienced
with years, our hooping class we’ll show you how to move that hoop on body and off body and will ensure you get your vice from the party. BYOH (Bring Your Own Hoop). Enjoy authentic iced or hot Chai served in a Bedouin café afterwards.
print_description: We’ll show you how to move that hoop on body and off body and will ensure you get your vice from the party. BYOH (Bring Your Own Hoop).

title: Storytelling
description:
One day, while walking along a well-trodden path, you
came across a tent in the desert. Intrigued by its glimmering
exterior and needing to escape the brutal sun,
you entered. You, weary traveler, were served chai and
while you drank you were captivated by the stories that
were told by fellow travelers. The myth and misadventures
they had seen. You, moved by their stories, told a
tale that left the whole tent in awe. You were glad that
you had wandered into Spice and Vice for this story slam.
print_description:
You, weary traveler, will be served chai and
while you drink, you will be captivated by stories told by fellow travelers in Bedouin Chill-out  tent.

title: Regional Community Building Workshop
description:
Shanghai Regional Coordinator and Dragon Burn organizers
will present images and stories from Asia’s regional, Dragon
Burn. They will provide insight into the regional network,
the challenges and joys of starting a regional burn, comparisons
to the big burn in BRC, and lead a discussion of on how
to grow your regional community.
print_description:
Shanghai Regional Coordinator and Dragon Burn organizers will provide insight into the regional network,
the challenges and joys of a regional burn.

title: Release Your Inner Arab
description:
We are traders, merchants and travelers from across the
Arabian Peninsula- settling on the tiny desert island of Bahrain.
We’ve come to share our gifts and stories with you....
and teach you a bit about our eclectic culture. Join us for
some rosewater vodka shots, belly dancin’ booty shakin’ to
some tribal tunes and Arabic language course 101!
print_description:
We are travelers from Bahrain.
 Join us for some rosewater vodka shots, belly dancin’ booty shakin’ to
some tribal tunes and Arabic language 101.

title: Radical inclusion VR workshop/meetup
description:
VR first-timer? Or seasoned pro? Wanna jump in and help us build a global network of content from regional burns and carry the impact beyond the playa?

Camp VRC, part of Martini Village, is all about capturing and sharing the Burning Man experience. Radical inclusion, virtual reality (VR) style. Lose yourself in an experience from last year's Burn. Play with us as we imagine and capture experiences from this year's Burn to take back to the default world!

Tuesday & Thursday, 5-6pm. Meet up in the shade of the martini bar. Yup: on the corner with the giant flaming martini glass.  =].
print_description: Lose yourself in a VR experience, or jump in and help us build a global network of content from regional burns. Carry the impact beyond!.

title: Ask a drunk scientist!
description: Stop by and ask your most nagging questions about the Universe, the Earth, the Playa, the brain, the body, your mental state, and whatever else you may be curious about... While the answers might not be as simple as you would wish, we'll definitely enjoy discussing and drinking together! We promise that if you don’t leave our camp smarter at least you’ll be drunker.
print_description: Bring your most nagging science questions or share your own scientific knowledge, and if you don’t leave the camp smarter at least you’ll be drunker.

title: Heavenly Yoga
description: Sleep off that hangover and enjoy a yoga class at a suitable time after coffee and bacon and dancing in the morning sun. We will promise that you will depart from tightness and arrive in a state of bliss! The sensitivity we develop on our yoga mats effects everybody around us. Slowly yogi by yogini we can shift the direction the world is taking.
print_description: We will promise that you will depart from tightness and arrive in a state of bliss!.

title: Handjobs
description: Back by popular demand, Enchanted Handjobs. Hand massage and tête-à-tête with camp ShangriLa are scheduled Monday & Wednesday from 2-3pm. Discover the delights and deep relaxation of a hand massage. Coconut oil is used to lubricate and soften the hands while our mystic healers work away your troubles and cares using a combination of techniques along with the right amount of pressure. Last year over 100 attended and we had people literally purring in our hands. Stop by and explore this amazing treat for yourself at ShangriLa! You will receive and give a Handjob! The best free gift for you and your playa friends is a hand massage. Our hands do a lot of work from the minute we wake up until we go to bed. When was the last time you gave a loved one a gentle hand massage? It always surprises people when they discover the delights and deep relaxation of a hand massage. Come and explore this amazing treat for yourself and others @ ShangriLa!
print_description: The best free gift for you and your playa friends is a hand massage.

title: Wine Tasting @ Weinkeller ShangriLaLa
description: Our established ShangriLaLa Weinkeller will have wine tastings every evening for your enjoyment @ 5:30pm. On Tuesday night camp members (known as LaLas) are asked to dress in formal attire. If you like to contribute, bring on Tuesday night a bottle of your favorite wine and wine glass as well. On Wednesday night, Shangri-Naughty will return...We will throw in a little flogging with a cat-o-nine tails and it will be a night to remember. In Vino Veritas - in Wine lies the truth. There are four (4) recognized stages to wine tastings: Appearance, The Aroma of the Wine, Sensations of the Mouth and The Finish (aftertaste). Please make sure you have your ID ready - you have to be twenty-one (21) years old to drink @ ShangriLaLa. We will check your ID - Namaste.
print_description: Our established ShangriLaLa Weinkeller will have wine tastings every evening for your enjoyment @ 5:30pm.

title: Consult the Pythia at the Oracle of Blackrock
description: In ancient times, pilgrims endured great challenges to seek an audience with the Pythia, the Oracle of Delphi.  Now YOU, Burning pilgrim,  having overcome GREAT OBSTACLES, may consult the Pythia at Blackrock!  She performs rites and rituals to obtain wisdom & clarity, exorcism & liberation and forgiveness & integration.  One-on-one individualized attention...first come, first served!  But be prepared...you may only ask once!
print_description: Personalized rituals performed on individuals seeking wisdom & clarity, exorcism & liberation or forgiveness & integration. First come, first served.

title: The Legal Strategy to Defend Standing Rock
description: Chase and Danny will explain the legal strategy to defend water protectors at Standing Rock. They will address the importance of divestment from the Dakota Access Pipeline, the spiritual basis of the environmental crisis, and the role of politics and organizing and securing justice for Native communities. These two internationally-known lawyers will announce a call to action: petitioning the North Dakota Attorney General to drop charges against all water protectors and instead file charges against Tiger Swan, the private security company operating without a permit at Standing Rock, identifying water protectors as similar to "jihadist terrorists", and colluding with state and federal law enforcement to violate the civil rights of peaceful protestors.
print_description: Chase Iron Eyes and Danny Sheehan will explain the current legal strategy to defend water protectors at Standing Rock in North Dakota.

title: Ecovillage Living &Movement Towards Tribal Society
description: Community living and transformational experiences - via plant medicine, gatherings, and meditation - are two ways that humans are resurrecting ancestral traditions.  David will share an overview of his work in building a regenerative culture. Through technology, love, and resurrecting tribal systems, he is helping to build a global community of transformational living centers connected together by modern nomadic tribes.

title: Standing Rock at BRC: Justice for Water Protectors
description: Lakota People’s Law Project attorneys Chase Iron Eyes and and Daniel Sheehan will discuss the current strategy to win justice for Standing Rock water protectors falsely charged with crimes. They will also lay out strategies for divesting from the Dakota Access pipeline and organizing to heal the Earth and secure justice for Native communities.

title: Spousal Obligations
description: Sometimes supporting your partners dreams sucks. Let's all get out there and give these poor souls some love. Dancing alone to your partners DJ set all by yourself is as much fun as it looks. Put your ear plugs in and give some hugs, drinks, something, anything. They are fucking troopers.

title: The Art of Anal: 6 Steps to a Hole New World
description: I talk to couples all of the time about their failed attempts at anal sex. Even gay guys don’t have it all figured out - some think they’ll never enjoy bottoming! And shockingly, getting drunk, sticking it in, and hoping things will just work out is *not* a successful strategy. Regardless if you’re a straight, gay, bi, trans, or any other type of couple - there are probably tips and tricks you can share and learn with others that want to perfect the art of anal. Come solo or bring your partner, questions, and stories for a backdoor discussion of the 6 steps to succeeding at anal.
print_description: Anal sex is hard; some people even think they’ll never enjoy receiving! Join our backdoor discussion, share tips, and finally prefect the art of anal.

title: Overlanding; vehicle living tips
description:
Overlanding (travelling by van, truck or small RV) is gaining popularity once again as it offers flexibility, simplicity and security. Living in a vehicle has it's challenges but are a great way to practice radical self-reliance, radical self-expression and leaving no trace. Meet Kerri and Cadillac as they share their experiences living in a van.
30-min talk + Q&A. Hibernaculum Camp, 6:30nearE.
print_description: Meet Kerri and Cadillac as they share their experiences living in a van. 30-min talk + Q&A.

description: How Mary Magdalene's archetype is being born again through women all over the world today, and an exploration of Josie's personal transformation.

title: 5Rhythms Dance w/Chloe Goodwin @ RhythmWave
description: The 5Rhythms is a body based awareness practice rooted in the notion that if you put the psyche in motion, it will heal itself. The 5Rhythms are: Flowing, Staccato, Chaos, Lyrical, and Stillness. Together these rhythms form a cycle of energy, patterned after the way all things move and change. When we sync up with this cycle, we integrate the wild, wide-ranging scope of who we are and how life moves through us. Movement is the medicine, the metaphor, and the meditation. Our dance becomes the ritual that calls all the pieces of us back into one unified being loving knowing seeing healing whole. All are invited to join Chloe Goodwin for this 5Rhythms dance medicine movement ritual at RhythmWave!
print_description: Our dance becomes the ritual that calls all the pieces of us back into one unified being loving knowing seeing healing whole.

title: Basics Of Keto & Keto Happy Hour
description:
Want to drop 50 lbs? Want a six pack abs? Want to lower your blood pressure? It's all not only possible, but very easily done, once you master the basics of the ketogenic diet. Kamp Keto is  the one stop on the playa for burners seeking the next level of body efficiency.

In our comfortable shaded tent, we'll be hosting a series of lectures by world renowned medical biohacker Toni Bark, MD,  from basics of Keto to The Big Food Smackdown; How Big Food is killing you and what you can do about it.

Following each lecture, we'll be hosting our Happy Hour (21+ only), serving our signature Kito-ritas (Margaritas).  Did you know that the average Margarita using a pre-made mix is 510 calories, 400 of that from sugar? That's ½ cup of sugar in just one drink. Come listen, ask questions, and have a cocktail!
print_description: Join us for a provocative interactive lecture by medical bio-hacker Toni Bark MD, followed by happy hour serving delicious low carb Keto-ritas.

title: Cheng Style Baguazhang: Intro to Turning Palms
description:
Condensed beginner-introduction into fundamental palm changes for Cheng Style Baguazhang. Baguazhang serves as one of the primary traditional internal martial arts, sharing with Tai Chi and Xing Yi. Alongside some bagua basics and distinctions of Cheng style over other styles of bagua, this session will focus on the Old 8 Turning Palms, based on the core Mother Palms in the Cheng style. Any levels of experience and skill in the martial arts are welcome, including those who haven’t had any!
Hibernaculum Camp on 6:30@E.
print_description: Condensed beginner-introduction into fundamental palm changes Bagua is one of the primary internal martial arts, including Tai Chi & Xing I.

title: Cheng Style Baguazhang: Intro to Mother Palms
description:
Condensed beginner-introduction into the Mother Palms of Cheng Style Baguazhang. The Mother Palms are considered core and foundational practices for dynamically conditioning the body and mind for not only for martial development, but as importantly, wellness and awareness. Our session together will include bagua basics (specific to the Cheng style) to get us walking the circle and techniques that go into the practice of the Mother Palms. Any levels of martial arts experience, including none at all, are welcome and encouraged!
Hibernaculum Camp on 6:30@E.
print_description: Condensed beginner-introduction into the core practices of Bagua, which is one of the primary internal martial arts, including Tai Chi & Xing I.

title: Playa Hug Team Hug Shirt Give Away!
description:
Come give your best hugs and join the Playa Hug Team! We're a mobile group of huggers that roam BRC offering love, safety & connection through physical embrace!

Each year we give away 24 bright yellow Playa Hug Team sleeveless t-shirts. Along with it you get a permanent marker. When you get a shirt, put it on and go out and start giving some hugs (with permission)! When you've given 10 hugs, sign your shirt with the permanent marker and pass both your shirt and the marker to another amazing hugger. The group keeps changing, the love keeps flowing, and who knows, maybe you'll see your jersey again later on in the burn? How many names will be on it? How many hugs have been shared with it? 

"We hug to experience one another without words, to share a momentary physical connection that says, 'I love you, you’re safe, you’re good, you’re worthy.'" -Playa Hug Team Motto.
print_description: Come give your best hugs and join the Playa Hug Team! We're a mobile group of huggers that roam BRC offering love, safety & connection through embrace.

title: Flowga
description:
Flow out of repetition...
How often when we dance do we stick with the same repetitive patterns? Perhaps we are simply bouncing to the beat. What is that saying for the pattern and repetition of our lives? How can we use movement expansion not only as this metaphor but also as a way to open neurological pathways allowing us to expand our cognition? 
Perhaps we can incorporate a greater variety of moves into our own unique dance movement flow to playfully explore what more our bodies can do and what else we can create in our reality for our lives and for the world.

title: Getting Unstuck: Immediacy and Emotional Flow
description:
Emotional (or motivational) flow is what happens when you're present in your immediate circumstances and connected to what you really want in this moment. It is a foundation for fulfilling, connected, and self-expressed action.  

In this experiential workshop we explore how we can use immediacy and to guide us back into a state of emotional and motivational flow. The goal here is to unhitch ourselves from three patterns that block us from flow: rehearsing thoughts, reacting from emotions, and re-referencing emotions. We'll use interactive physical exercises to explore the felt sense "stuck" that these three patterns of being create. Then we'll expand that felt understanding through a guided emotional flow meditation.

The goal of this workshop is not to offer a tool to practice emotional flow in the future, but to create an experiential understanding of how we can meet emotions to return to emotional and motivational flow.
print_description: Emotional (or motivational) flow is what happens when you're present in your immediate circumstances and connected to what you really want in this mom.

description:
If EntheoGenesis is awakening to the Divine within, what do we do with IT then? Is the peak experience of divinity a seed to be integrated and/or a relationship to be nurtured? Is the current surge in interest in 5-MeO-DMT from synthetic and natural sources like the Bufo Alvarius toad just the latest stage of an entheogenic relationship flowering in human consciousness? What are the other steps in anchoring this God consciousness? Beyond the toad, can we entrain our endogenous capacity to anchor Sources, and what would this mean?  

Rak Razam.

title: The Beauty of Math for Artists
description:
Math - as taught in school - is tedious and boring. But mathematicians who study math create sound and impenetrable structures of logic from concepts they invented out of the blue. Like an artist creating something never seen before - it is often spectacular and beautiful.  

In this workshop I'll tell some stories about mathematical concepts directed to artists with no knowledge and try the present some of the beauty you can stumble upon when studying math. 

NO MATH SKILLS REQUIRED.

title: The Gloaming
description:
When our world is closer to the Otherworld, the spirits often traverse the thin spaces, and it is at dusk when the aes sidhe welcome the coming of the night. In a ritual that stretches back before the coming of humankind – and that also anticipates a future when humans no longer exist – the aes sidhe revel in the endless cycle of light and darkness. In a hint of what is to come, those who find themselves in the path of the sidhe court first smell and taste the dusty grit of death and rebirth. Then they hear a pounding beat that heralds the bursting of the court from the Otherworld. Bystanders soon see a dark figure with pulsing veins of red light, curling horns, and a silver face that reflects a person’s soul back at them, followed by cavorting figures who tap rhythms on a variety of drums. 

In a twisted caricature of the Pied Piper leading children astray, some of the aes sidhe beat a march for the procession, while other figures dart amongst onlookers, drawing bystanders into the procession as the group strides toward ritual stations of drums and light. The court – and its newly found attendants – pound a rhythm as the sun sinks below the horizon towards the inevitable transition, and transformation, from light to dark. The dark sidhe and its new court howl in joy as the glowing orb disappears beyond the skyline, welcoming the blessed cool of night.
 
The aes sidhe are looking for you to join our procession. Every dusk we will travel from our home at the ¡Bang! Tower to esplanade as we greet the dark in an expression of drumming, primal howling, and whatever else you can think up. The Gloaming procession will draw Black Rock City’s citizens to our 32 stations of drum and light placed around Esplanade. Join us as a spirit of the dark in a drumming celebration of sundown. 

If you want to join us, link up with our Facebook group [https://www.facebook.com/BANGtribe/], email us, or swing by the 30-foot tall ¡Bang! Tower at the Baconeers Camp at 4:15 and Dance.
print_description: Meet the sidhe of the Otherworld every dusk on esplanade as they welcome the dark. Join these spirits in a drumming celebration of sundown.

title: Personality Detectives- Discover the twisted you!
description:
If you're a inner personality sleuth then join us as we explore the convoluted recesses of your mind, delve into the inner most shadows of the psyche and find out who you really are.  Whether we go with psycho analysis, aversion therapy or a colonoscopy, we have  everything it takes to dissect your inner most being and discover the person you really are. 
In addition to discovering your unknown, you get to make your own Rorschach Test, try on a straight jacket and take home some awesome tips on how to be a super successful Sociopath.
print_description: Discover who you really are, make your own Rorschach Test, try on a straight jacket and more.

title: Tools For Navigating Altered States
description: Upgrade your psychonaut tool kit and empower your inner shaman!  Psychotherapist and Medicine Retreats organizer Meriana Dinkova will introduce some important factors to consider when navigating altered states of consciousness. You will learn some useful tools that can maximize our experience, as well as what we can learn in those inner voyages. Non- ordinary states of consciousness can come with their own sets of 'superpowers', operating principles and potential pitfalls. Knowing how to use those forces for expansion and alignment can not only occasionally save you from 'the inner gates of hell', but also bring accelerated growth, ecstatic experiences and a deep feeling of connectedness with yourself, others and the world.

In this talk and workshop, we will explore the future of psychedelic futurism as the Singularity nears and the weirdness deepens.

title: Rick Doblin PhD of M.A.P.S.
description:
FDA-Approved Phase 3 MDMA/PTSD Research: A $25 million experiment 

Description:  MAPS' 31 year struggle to begin Phase 3 research into MDMA-assisted psychotherapy for posttraumatic stress disorder (PTSD), and will review the agreement reached with FDA in July 2017 on the methodological design of our Phase 3 studies.  I'll discuss the implementation of Phase 3 and the timeline  and steps required to legalize the prescription use of MDMA-assisted psychotherapy, the establishment of psychedelic psychotherapy clinics, and the overall mainstreaming of the legal use of psychedelics into global culture.

title: The Struggle for the Sacred
description:
Cultural appropriation is a topic that brings heated debate nearly every time it’s mentioned. Quite often, ignorant westerners who were raised to purchase meaning on a shelf or through a TV set can trigger sensitivities within traditional or sacred cultures, while at the same time individuals that seek in earnest to experience authentic meaning by transcending that very same commercial culture are easily stereotyped as insensitive or as frauds. The word “shamanism,” for example, is taken for granted and thrown around casually in festival culture, and yet who can agree on what it truly means in our context or who it legitimately offends?

We’ll uncover the complex history of this term while exploring a vision for planetary culture that integrates the profane and materialistic west with the sacred magic of the indigenous and the archaic. The story of the west is surprisingly rich with culture heroes (including the Cacophony Society and Suicide Club groups that Burning Man emerged from) that point the way towards a rich and meaningful cultural future, despite the overwhelming totality of capitalism. In fact, in the development of a global psychedelic culture, the world market has actually paved the way for a diverse confluence of neo-tribal adaptation and integration much the same way as the Romans built the roads that ultimately spread Christianity. Authentic cultural appropriation is the way forward and superficial cultural appropriation is a natural evolutionary byproduct.
print_description:
Mitch Mignano 
Sham-anism: Cultural Appropriation & The Struggle for the Sacred within A World Market.

title: Daft Punk At The Trash Fence
description:
"Are you going to see Daft Punk at the trash fence?"

It started as a joke that longtime Burners would play on virgins or weekend warriors. This is no laughing matter as Daft Punk has not played since 2007. Join us in setting the stage as we attempt to get them out of retirement. If they do not show then someone else will throw on some Daft Punk helmets and do the best Daft Punk show since 2007. We will have drinks on site, shuttles to the bathroom, and dozens of art cars linked up and ready to make this a night that we will never forget. 
Schedule
11pm Special Guest
12am Special Guest
1am Special Guest
2am Daft Punk (Or two people in Daft Punk helmets if the real robots don't show)

Location: 12 and Trash Fence 
(Ride straight back from the Temple until you hit the trash fence).

title: Celebrate your 20+ years of burn with us!
description: Celebrating 20+ year of Burning Man with you! Howdy fellow burners! I'm Whee-zel, and as a founding member of (Camp) Yes Please, I am honored to have playa-mates celebrating my 20 Year Anniversary of attending Burning Man. Of course, there’s no “status” in how many times a person attends this amazing experience, but it sure is a great reason to party with y’all, and why keep all this fun to ourselves? So if you are a 20+ year Burner (or know someone who is), you’re invited (and your friends, really… who’s gonna keep track?) to be honored and celebrated at Yes Please. Please come by, have a drink, tell a story or two and be acknowledged for your amazing Burn-ification however many years you’ve attended! Yes Please!

title: Midnight Ridazz: Friday Night Ride
description:
When someone says "Midnight Ridazz!!" 
You say "RIDE ON!!"

The Midnight Ridazz is formally described as a group of bicycle enthusiasts who have been riding together on the second Friday of every month since February of 2004. Originally conceived and founded by SKULL and lovingly cared for by MABELL, MUFF and a small group of planners and care takers, the rides quickly grew from the original 8 "Mammas and Papas" to current ride counts of 1300+ Ridazz.

Skeptics may scoff at the irreverence of this alleged "Party on Wheels." But the party atmosphere just might be what has made this simple bicycle ride so popular in a city like Los Angeles where people barely get their mail without hopping in a car. Some attribute the movement to the high assed gas prices, or the frustration of LA traffic. Still others simply write off the Midnight Ridazz as a bunch of bored art school students. It's all of these things and more! 

Consider: Riding a bicycle is a sensual alternative to the "boy in the bubble" car voyages that hide everything good that a city has to offer. It is an experience in sights, sounds, thrills, physical activity, and local economy that could never be replicated by a night out at (Sh)City Walk. Midnight Ridazz is about riding bicyles, hanging out, acting silly, being whimsical, speaking up, and having a good heart. Come out and enjoy a relaxed pace bicycle ride at the end of a week of computers, dispatchers, rude customers, corporate politics and all the other crap that comes with living in a world of sad clowns. Banish the clowns! Send in the Ridazz.


JOIN US.
Moving forward we're inviting everybody to join in the fun. The Ridazz that be have created this site to help empower YOU to create your own rides, routes and good timezz. Start yourself a recurring ride, have a bar crawl or even throw a one timer in the daylight... It's your ride.
print_description: Ride, Drink, Ride, Drink, Ride, Get lost, Ride. Done. Starts at the Gigsville Bar, hosted by Ridazz Camp. Ends at VBC.

title: Cyberacoustic Guitar by Michael Garfield
description: Come listen to the music used in recent FDA-approved clinical trials for MDMA as a treatment for post-traumatic stress...Michael has spent the last decade touring festivals across the US, Europe, and Australia with his unique approach to both acoustic-electronic live performance.  Tender and apocalyptic, chill and energetic, intensely technical yet vulnerable music that updates the archetype of "solo artist with guitar" to suit our age of planetary renaissance.  Ecstatic instrumentals pointing past the genre into transcendental spaces – lush and atmospheric, driving and emotional work, spanning folk tradition and the avant-garde.

title: Shamanic Visioneering: Crafting Your Life Mission
description: A guided dream discerning your Manifesto for the World. Why is civilization so often out of touch with our intentions, needs and values? How do we find and create the tribe and society we want and need? This workshop dives into these questions by dreaming into our relationship to each other and the world. Within the world of shadows and the infinite, we will open to where our spirit calls us and discover our mission as well as opportunities to create harmony in our Tribes and the World.

title: Meet the Artists Tour Broadcast on BMIR 94.5 FM
description: Coming at you directly from the Playa on BMIR - Burning Man Information Radio! An "unholy" alliance between the ARTery and BMIR, the Meet the Artist Broadcast will be hosted by Diablo, Dazzle! & G-Spot. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ~There is a ton of AMAZING Art this year and we're gonna tell you about SOME of it, while interviewing a FEW of the incredible artists who dreamed it all up and created these fantastic works. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ You can turn in to BMIR 94.5 FM while on the Playa, stream on-line worldwide at http://www.BMIR.org/ or (best of all) come follow the tour on your bike! Which Art Car to follow? None other than The Queen of BRC: "Christina" and Captain Flipper. Just look on the Esplanade near the ARTery/BMIR for a gorgeous 58' yacht with blue "waves" on her hull. http://bit.ly/ChristinaArtCar ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Have you ever stopped and wondered about some of the art out on the playa, and thought: "What the Fuck were they thinking!?!" Now you might just find out . . . All YOU have to do now on Thursday September 1st, 2016 just before 11:00 a.m. is remember to: TURN ON! ~Your radio TUNE IN! ~To 94.5 FM on the Playa (or stream on-line @ http://www.BMIR.org/) or DROP EVERYTHING ~You Dusty Burner & come follow us out into the desert on your bicycle . . . Thanks! Diablo.
print_description: Meet the Artists Tour Broadcast on BMIR 94.5 FM.
other_location: BMIR 94.5 FM or follow the Christina Art Car Departing from Burning Man Information Radio on the Espalnade @ 11am

title: Sacred Form Photography
description:
Sacred Form Photography - creating artistic nude images on the playa, In this workshop we will give participants the opportunity to create artistic nude photography.  Through out history artists have created art around the shape of the human body.  This workshop will teach you how to do that with photography.

Instructor: Kyer Wiltshire – Kyer is a professional photographer from Santa Cruz, CA.  Kyer  is a destination photographer traveling the world to shoot weddings and events.  Kyer has published two books on Burning Man. (http://kyerwiltshire.com/).

title: Basic Camera Settings - Take better pics OFF auto
description:
Basic Camera Settings - F stop does not mean F__k stop.   This class will teach you how to take your camera off of “Auto” and use the full range of settings on today’s digital cameras.

Instructor: Chris Oggerino – Chris is a semi-pro (working on being pro) sports photographer and videographer in Reno, NV.  He has been a documentarian at Burning Man and has created images for magazines, a museum, and web sites over the last 10 years.
print_description: This class teaches you how to take your camera off of “Auto” and use all the settings. Workshop format.

title: Field Trip - Natural and Ambient Light Photography
description:

title: Photographing Fire Performers, flame as light
description:
“Photographing Fire Performers using the flame as your light” –  Most performers are one with the flame that they dance with.  Come learn how to capture that in a hands-on workshop by one of the best fire photogs out there!

Instructor:  Espresso Buzz I've been photographing events and playing with cameras since I "borrowed" my first camera from my parents when I went to college. My photos have been featured in national & international publications and have been in a few galleries.  I've been photographing the art, people and performances of burning man since the year 2000.   You can find me on Instagram as Espressobuzz, and also at http://www.espressobuzz.net/browse.
I hope to see you on playa!

title: Re-Weaving the Human Dream w/LeeAnn @ RhythmWave
description: Dancing Freedom is an ecstatic, shamanic, somatic and expressive movement practice – a radical and grounded movement ritual. Our prayer for tonight’s ceremony: please help us truly walk on this earth in a good way. The invitation: start with yourself and your own sacred body. We will engage the energies of earth, water, fire, air, and ether to open new possibilities for ourselves and for the world. All are welcome to join LeeAnn Mallorie at RhythmWave for body activation, personal awakening and transpersonal healing from this 5-element dance wave. The only rule in Dancing Freedom? There’s no way to do it wrong.

title: Royal Game of Ur
description: Learn to play the Royal Game of Ur, a board game more than 4500 years old! It was played across the world in ancient times, including in Egypt, Mesopotamia and Babylonia. Historians believe it may be the inspiration for modern games like backgammon. The game itself is a competitive game played with two players. Though the game relies on special dice, you will need more than simple luck to win the Royal Game of Ur!
print_description: Learn to play the Royal Game of Ur, an ancient board game more than 4500 years old that inspired other games like Backgammon!.

title: Clarity & Consent Playshop provided by BED
description:
The Bureau of Erotic Discourse (BED) is helping to make consent the 11th principle!  You'll learn fun, interactive information about sex on playa,  negotiating consent, how to get what we desire in bed and other fun,  adult topics. 
We'll discuss need to know knowledge gathered through years of experience in BED  :
*Recognizing potentially bad situations  
*Resolving them with tact and humor  
*Supporting survivors of assault  
*Helping them access available services.
print_description: You'll learn fun, interactive information about sex on playa,  negotiating consent, how to get what we desire in bed and other fun,  adult topics.

title: Dance Therapy Workshop
description:
What's Dance/Movement Therapy?! Come and find out! In these workshops, we will work toward integrating our bodies, minds and psyches by connecting to ourselves and others around us through movement. No dance experience necessary, just a willingness to move. 

There will be two 45 minute workshops over the 2 hours. 
Capacity for approximately 20 participants/workshop.
print_description: In these workshops, we will work toward integrating our bodies, minds and psyches by connecting to ourselves and others around us through movement.

title: Slow waltzing and mimosas
description: Slow waltzing to live music or recordings.   Mellow and appropriate for the heat of the day.  No experience necessary nor do you need to arrive with a partner.  Arrive early for some simple instruction.  At our slow pace the footwork doesn't have to click for you for the dancing to be pleasant (and awkwardness is just one of life's phases anyway).  It is worth practicing until that day when it does click and then you have a talent which can be used anywhere in the world, and is especially appreciated by romantic partners.
print_description: Slow waltzing to live music or recordings.   Mellow and appropriate for the heat of the day.  No experience necessary. Bring a partner or arrive solo.

title: Square/barn dancing to live music
description: Square and barn dancing to live music (traditional/ oldtime /bluegrass /American).   Fast-paced and exciting yet easy to learn.  No experience necessary nor do you need to arrive with a partner.  A caller walks the dancers through each dance before the music starts (with the dances lasting about 15 minutes).  Each dance is a (different) repeating sequence of relatively simple moves.  Hooting and stomping and a tribal vibe, where the Zen is playfulness, flow, synchrony, and bonding (not footwork, not competition).  If you are smiling, you are doing it right.  Kid friendly.  Possible for many disabled.   Everyone who shows up should have a good time.  Videos at the website.  You can  square dance all over the US  (and a smattering of other countries) in dance halls with up to a thousand people.  But the Playa makes it special so you should try it with us first!
print_description: Square and barn dancing to live music (traditional/ oldtime /bluegrass /American).   Fast-paced and exciting yet easy to learn. No experience needed.

title: contradancing to live music (beginners welcome)
description: Experience the tribal, hypnotic magic of contra, driven by everything from traditional celtic, to exotic electronic mixing of recordings and live instruments.  Contra is fast-paced and exciting, yet easy to learn. A "caller" instructs, but there is room for dancers to improvise and embellish. There is no need to arrive with a partner – most dancers swap after each dance. Lines of couples flow through each other creating a bonding, playful, noncompetitive, all-ages community dance. There is no required footwork and contra is possible for many with disabilities. If you are smiling, you are doing it right. Everyone who shows up will have fun, and will probably find they can't stop from joining in on the hooting and stomping.   Videos at the website.  You can contradance all over the US  (and a smattering of other countries) in dance halls with up to a thousand people.  But the Playa makes it special so you should try it with us first!
print_description: Experience the tribal, hypnotic magic of contra, driven by everything from traditional celtic to an electronic mix.

title: GLAMCOCKS: QueerTalks & Workshops
description:
Are you ready to challenge your worldview, step outside your comfort zone, and provide a little TLC for your body and brain at Burning Man? Join the GlamCocks and friends for QueerTalks and Workshops: a series of moderated audience discussions and wellness activities on topics important to our queer communities. Join in on a real-talk discussion or push your body and mind with yoga, meditation, and vulnerability. Our thought provoking discussions may not always be comfortable, but are intended to be a safe space where we can learn and grow together.

QueerTalks and Workshops schedule:

MONDAY

1:00 - 2:00 pm, Deepen Your Burn with Mindfulness and Vulnerability
Facilitated by Pretzel (Michael Donofrio, GlamCocks)
Located in GlamCocks' Morecockin Tent (7:30 & D)

2:00 - 3:00 pm, Walk Out With Your Cock Out
Facilitated by Thunder (Chris Turner, GlamCocks) 
Meet outside GlamCocks' Morecockin Tent (7:30 & D) and walk to the temple

TUESDAY

1:00 - 2:00 pm, Radical Consent 
Facilitated by Nexus (I AM U)
Located in GlamCocks' Morecockin’ Tent (7:30 & D)

2:00 - 3:00 pm, Let’s Talk About Sex: Barebacking in the Age of PrEP and Undetectable 
Facilitated by Treat (Christopher Ruiz) & Michael Marcel (GlamCocks). 
Located in GlamCocks' Morecockin Tent (7:30 & D)

WEDNESDAY

1:00 - 2:00 pm, Radical Gender F*ckery, A Journey Outside the Binary 
Facilitated by Ronnie Appleseed (Gender Blender)
Located in GlamCocks' Morecockin Tent (7:30 & D)

2:00 - 3:00 pm, Masterfully Navigating the Pitfalls of Polyamory 
Facilitated by Stallion (Kamela, Camp Beaverton/ATTOL)
Located in GlamCocks' Morecockin Tent (7:30 & D)

THURSDAY

1:00 - 2:00 pm, Radical Spirit Yoga 
Facilitated by National Treasure (Paradise Motel)
Located in GlamCocks' Morecockin Tent (7:30 & D)

2:00 - 3:00 pm, Tantric Breathing Meditation 
Facilitated by Joshua Farahnik (GlamCocks)
Located in GlamCocks' Morecockin Tent (7:30 & D).
print_description: Re you ready to challenge your worldview, step outside your comfort zone, and provide a little TLC for your body and brain at Burning Man?.

title: Sound Meditation with Alexandre Tannous
description: The experience starts by sharing important elements about sound and its therapeutic effects. This would allow to maximize the benefits by becoming active participants, and to learn how to efficiently work with sound. The material shared is based on years of training in music, fieldwork in many countries, research and scientific studies. Following the talk, Alexandre will guide everyone through diaphragmatic breathing exercises, visualizations, toning and vocalizations. The longest segment will follow; playing of instruments that emit harmonic overtones, such as gongs of various diameters, antique Himalayan singing bowls, tuning forks with varying frequencies, etc.
print_description: A talk about sound and its therapeutic effects, followed by a guided experience by the ethnomusicologist, researcher and master-practitioner.

title: Women's Sound Circle with Casey Karr
description:
Gathering intentionally with other women offers an opportunity to give and receive our feminine nourishment, where we support, empower, and celebrate one another, free of judgment or critique.

We will spend the first hour sitting together in a sharing circle. The next two hours involve a meditative sound practice, using sound, breath, and voice, combined with our imagination and intention, to create a warm and nurturing sonic space that enables us to quiet our minds and venture within. From there, we can explore deeper states of consciousness.

The sounds of gongs, singing bowls, chimes, drums, and other instruments are not just heard through our ears, but are also felt by our bodies: our skin, bones, cells, and the fluids within us resonate with the sound’s vibrations. Sound can also trigger memories and emotions. Therefore, with focused listening and presence—by meditating on sound—we can work through underlying stress, release blocks, and bring ourselves into states of relaxation and well-being.
print_description: An an opportunity to give and receive our feminine nourishment, where we support, empower, and celebrate one another, free of judgment.

Come sip hot dashi with Camp DASHI! On cool desert evenings, hot dashi is just the thing to warm you up!

We will offer vegan and fish based dashi.

description: The contemporary meaning of Shibari describes an ancient Japanese artistic form of erotic rope bondage. In this beginner class we'll teach you several decorative ties that would look great as playa attire. Come solo or with a partner. We'll have rope for the first 30 participants.
print_description: Shibari, an ancient Japanese artistic form of erotic rope bondage: learn decorative ties, great as playa attire. Come solo or with a partner.

title: Applied Tantra with Liam Pfeiffer
description:
We’re in this Together - Applied Tantra w/ Liam Pfeiffer 

The challenges of these times can bring us closer instead of dividing us further. It’s up to us to find ways to become stronger instead of weaker. This class will focus on partner exercises and Venus Kriyas from Kundalini Yoga that can help us see the best in each other. Sweat, laugh, meditate deeply, and relax. Let’s affirm our solidarity in spirit for peace, uplifting all, and helping each other now.
print_description: Partner exercises and Venus Kriyas from Kundalini Yoga that can help us see the best in each other. Sweat, laugh, meditate deeply and relax.

title: Unicornasana Yoga with AnneSophie Leary
description: AnneSophie aka Wisemonki is a yoga teacher based in San francisco. Born in Los Angeles and raised both in LA and south of France she has found San Francisco to be her home. A yogi for ten years she has been teaching for five. Recently she has started leading deep house yoga events in both LA and SF. Her lineage is in Vinyasa and Forest yoga ( Ana Forest ). Her classes are strong , they are sweaty yet this one may be a bit dusty ;).
print_description: A strong, sweaty, and a little dusty vinyasa-Forest influenced flow, set to deep house beats.

title: Live Music Kundalini Yoga with Yeva Don & LUM
description:
Kundalini yoga is one of the fastest and most powerful ways for growth and awareness.  It promotes a compassionate, more loving and patient relationship to the self and others.  The practice enables a wide and truthful view of reality, and an ability to tune into the natural flow of life. 

The lessons are easy to follow, understand, and turn into a personal daily practice, which centers, connects, and raises vibration, both individual and collective. 

Radiate, glow and magnify your intuition, as you become a magnet for better things in life, receive clarity and peace of mind, and grow confident in following your own way in with this elevating practice set to live beats.
print_description: Magnify your intuition, become a magnet for better things, and receive clarity with this elevating and powerful practice set to live beats.

We’re bringing back the glory days of the Mansion lifestyle circa 1969, giving life to the nightlife empire that has made fantasies into reality, and given us more sex symbols than we can handle. But this time….it’s the Bunnies who are running the show.

Come party at our Mansion. Decadance. Fanciness. Opulence. Sexiness. Service. Way too much fun.

title: Clarity and Consent B.E.D. Playshop
description:
The B.E.D. Bureau of Erotic Discourse will host a sex positive and fun playshop at Hotel California on how to playa sex, how to talk about what you want, negotiating consent, talking with playa hotties and more! Interactive, immersive, thought provoking and wildly useful, this is the ultimate playa centric sex ed for adults!  

Make consent the 11th principle! The burn can't exist unless everyone has the freedom to express themselves without fear of assault. That’s a simple fact. 
Our camp knows this and we are stepping into a leadership role to make it happen. So we are taking the Bureau of Erotic Discourse’s Safe Camp Challenge!
print_description: Sex positive and fun playshop on how to playa sex, how to talk about what you want, negotiating consent, talking with playa hotties and more!.

title: Wretched Scum & Villainy Intergalactic Happy Hour
description:
// Hotel California is located at 7 & E //

Space travelers, smugglers, and wayward creatures from all corners of the Galaxy: our intergalactic bar is open in your system for one night only. 

Despite the recent Emperial occupation, our spaceport is still the first and last resort of dusty conspirators from The Outer Rim to Center Camp. Stop by for some Bantha Tonic, Death Sticks, and live music. 

Droid-free environment. We don't serve their kind here.
print_description: Space travelers, smugglers, and wayward creatures from all corners of the Galaxy: our intergalactic bar is open in your system for one night only.

title: Dance with the Dead
description:
Mexican art projects; Pyramid of the Dead, Shogyo Mujo, Xochipill, Mayan Warrior, Axolotl - Earth Guardian with Maxa Camp & Dusty Cantina unite to bring you Dance with the Dead, a Playa tribute to Dia de Los Muertos (Day of the Dead). A long standing tradition in Mexico, Day of the Dead celebrates life by adorning Catrina (sugar skull) face paint and dancing alongside our departed ancestors.

We invite you to come join this united parade. We will be offering face painting on our art car the Axolotl at 9pm at The Temple. From there we will dance and sway as the dead alongside the Mayan Warrior marching towards the Pyramid of the Dead. At the Pyramid we will host a short speaker series, DeadTalks - Reflections on Life & Death and give an offering to the Pyramid and our loved ones residing there, culminating in a dance party hosted by the 20,000 watt sound system of the Axolotl and DJ's from all over Mexico and more. Come celebrate life with us by dancing with our dead!
print_description: Mexican art projects unite for Dance with the Dead, a Playa tribute to Dia de Los Muertos The Dead dance from Temple to the Pyramid to celebrate life!.

title: Butt-Cheeky Run
description: Come get your burn started – with the sun’s soft caresses on your butt cheeks! The Ancient Greeks always trained and competed naked – in fact the ’gym’ comes from the word ‘gymnos’, meaning ‘naked’ in Greek. Come experience the freedom of running together in the altogether! Or at least come and see what a great spectator sport it is:) We’ll do a warm-up at the camp and then run wild in the ‘hood and all the way to the Man!
print_description: Come get your burn started – with the sun’s soft caresses on your butt cheeks! Experience the freedom of running together in the altogether!.

title: Naked Oil Wrestling
description: Wrestling is one of the most fun sports you can ever try. It’s also one of humanity’s oldest and was among the major events of the original Olympics. Long before we were kicking balls around we were rolling around in the dirt, putting each other in headlocks! It doesn’t matter if you’re a complete novice who’s never tried it in your life or an experienced fighter, come along and experience this amazing bonding experience in Gymnasium, Black Rock City’s Ancient Greek wrestling school!
print_description: Wrestling is one of the most fun sports you can ever try. It’s also one of humanity’s oldest and was among the major events of the original Olympics.

title: Discus-ish Throw in the dark… and in the buff
description: Discus (well, LED-lit frisbee) throw competition followed by ultimate frisbee game (or regular frisbee, depending on the mood). Bare your body, but wear lights! The Ancient Greeks always trained and competed naked – in fact the ’gym’ comes from the word ‘gymnos’, meaning ‘naked’ in Greek. Come experience the amazing freedom of running and jumping and exercising free of clothing! Or at least come and see what a great spectator sport it is:) This is our only night event, but don’t worry about cold – movement will keep you warm!
print_description: Discus (well, LED-lit frisbee) throw competition followed by ultimate frisbee game (or regular frisbee, depending on the mood).

title: Naked Piggy-Back and Wheelbarrow Run Race
description: Are with us for this fun athletic event! Bring your friends, but choose wisely, as you’ll have to bear them on your back, bareback… or vice versa. Great bonding experience guaranteed! The Ancient Greeks always trained and competed naked – in fact the ’gym’ comes from the word ‘gymnos’, meaning ‘naked’ in Greek. Come experience the amazing freedom of running and jumping and exercising free of clothing! Or at least come and see what a great spectator sport it is:) PS In ancient Olympics this would have been an equestrian event, but BMORG wouldn’t let us bring horses….

title: Forró Dance Class
description: Come experience Brazil's most popular partner dance and learn the basic step and the first movements. Lose yourself in the music and in a sensual embrace with somebody you might have just met. No need to come with a partner, we will swap. Forró originated from Brazil’s poor Northeastern countryside hence its informal, playful tradition.
print_description: Brazil's most popular partner dance.

title: Naked Philosophy
description: Nudity has the power to surprise and shock, yet why, on reflection, can something as mundane as the naked body inspire simultaneously so much passion and revulsion? To be naked in 21st century western society demands intense self-examination, the questioning and reappraisal of conventional conventions and morality. In this sense, naturism, as the cultural and political movement of nudism is often known, is an inherently philosophical practice. And what better way to do philosophy than naked? We’re sure your college seminars would have been much more fun nude. Come and join us for lively discussions, debates and story-telling. We’ll be discussing naturism, body image, sharing experiences, debating body modification, if and how laws should be changed – really everything related to the human body.
print_description: We’re sure your college seminars would have been much more fun nude. Come and join us for lively discussions, debates and story-telling.

print_description: Come by and listen to the sultry sounds of Worth!.

title: Femaling Our Future
description:
Urgent action is needed because our planet is in peril. To alter its unsustainable trajectory, women, grateful for men’s guidance, thus far, NOW must take over!  

I am spearheading the feminine power revolution, changing the paradigm.  With 45 yearsʻ experience as a political activist in the progressive, womenʻs rights, environmental and health arenas; 40 yearsʻ studying and teaching meditation and martial arts; and successful careers in performing and travel (world-wide), fashion (Paris), food (Hong Kong), and education (New York and Maui), I am seeding the awareness required to extract our society from servitude (to banks, corporations and demagogues) and to redirect it toward service, and a radiant horizon of planetary well-being and conscious decision-making.

Our testosterone-driven “leadership by domination” has resulted in: irreversible climate change, international policies of conquest, unprecedented concentration of wealth (a caste society), corporate contamination of our food supply and idolization of conspicuous consumption.  We are on the verge of the next planetary extinction event.  Meanwhile, the 99%, glued to government-manipulated media, wallows in wanton complacency.  

Now, women are rising up and re-taking the reins. Because of our biochemical makeup, we are scientifically proven to be more compassionate and less aggressive (the vast majority of all past and current peaceful societies are “matriarchal”).  
I propose an end to complacency, and offer a passionate call to action.  Women, break free from the patriarchal bondage of gender stereotyping and join our sisters, altering the planetʻs future!  Otherwise, there may not be one.
print_description: Restoring women's voice is required to restore a sustainable trajectory of peace and prosperity, echoing successes of past civilizations.

title: Rock Divination
description: Shamanic culture - not just in Africa but everywhere - have always used divination in  highly practical ways.  The answers to the secrets of the universe are inherent in all things - even a rock.  Nature will reveal them in an infinite number of ways if we only look there for answers. Limit: first 10 people please.

title: Burn the WORD
description: On Friday morning, as the sun is rising, we will burn the WORD.  Burning scripture is widely considered an act of sacrilege and the intention here is to deeply honor the underlying message of scripture while challenging the observer to consider the common essence behind all spiritual identity.  Out of respect for the religious traditions represented in the scripture, the layer of scripture will be removed from the letters before burning.  It will be packaged and respectfully buried outside of Burning Man.  The naked word itself will be burned as we aspire to come to a deeper sense of being and spiritual identity that cannot be conveyed with words.
print_description: On Friday morning, as the sun is rising, we will burn the WORD as we aspire to come to a deeper sense of being that cannot be conveyed with words.

title: Slow Dance
description: Imagine the soft, slow swaying last dance at a high school prom. Soft, quiet, romantic DJ music from the 30's and 40's. We will have a dance after a quick 10 minute introduction class. Exchange favorite playa stories, and meet 30 to 40 new burners. A great way to end (or start) the evening on the playa.

title: Build Your Own Make and Take Mini Effigy
description:
Come get your effigy on! Make & Take your own mini effigy to burn Sunday morning at the man site. Radically create your ritual effigy with our burnable baubles! Make art with old friends and new and burn it! We will have 7" palm plates as a foundation and you can build your effigy using popsicle sticks, spools, matches, clothespins, letters, buttons and more! Bring something of your own that is burnable and follows the guidelines to incorporate into your mini effigy. 

As Larry Says: "This year we invite participants to create their own burning woman or man. Our theme is Radical Ritual, and what could be more appropriate than to reenact the ritual that founded Burning Man? These figures may be constructed prior to the event, but perhaps an even better option is to craft one in your camp."

You may not have what it takes to craft one in your camp, so come get crafty in ours and make your best effigy ever!
print_description: Come get your effigy on! Make & Take your own effigy to burn Sunday morning at the man. Radically create your ritual effigy with our burnable baubles!.

title: James Joyce - Finnegan Wakes on the Playa 2017
description:
Help us re-awaken mythical giant Tim Finnegan, the archetypal Everyman from James Joyce's epic novel Finnegans Wake.  We are asking Burners to radically participate on the Playa in 2017 by reading a single page from Chapter 6 of Joyce's masterpiece on camera.

This will be our second year filming a chapter of Wake at Burning Man. In 2016, we filmed 121 Burners perform chapter 7 (Shem the Penman) of Wake. Here are a few short clips from last year's episode:

https://youtu.be/50hbiUY87W0

Please choose the page you'd like to perform this year from chapter 6 of FW at this link:

http://www.finwake.com/1024chapter6/1024finn6.htm

You can also bring along your favorite piece of music on your phone to accompany your reading if you like, and we will run the audio for your performance thru our mixer.

The final goal of our Finnegan Wakes project is to provide the world with the first ever complete edition of Finnegans Wake on film, performed by Burners from around the world.

We'll be posting updates at the FB group in this posting regarding when and where we'll be filming performances around BRC so please join the FB group for updates. This year, Finnegans Wake on the Playa will be based in the Dream-Land of Camp Fuego at 6:15 and H.

The complete episode (chapter 7) from 2016 can be viewed here:
https://youtu.be/yReE0yoVTSE.
print_description: See the online description below.

title: Pink Floyd Ecstatic Dance
description:
Through the gates of dawn to the endless river, take a journey through time and space as we immerse ourselves in a flow of instrumental excerpts from over 40 years of the Pink Floyd discography.  Be inspired to dance and meditate, release your inner animal and break through your walls. From the dark side of the moon to the heart of the sun, the tiniest atom to the great interstellar expanse, the pulse of life to the great beyond, let us leave behind our divisions.  The eclipse brings darkness, yet the light ever returns.  We will always shine on, my bright ambassadors!  When the time comes, my only thought will be, I wish you were here.  ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ 
A note from the arranger:  This has been a project long in the making.  I have often felt the call of the dance from Pink Floyd’s music, momentary spans from so many different songs that called out to be joined together in one great epic track.  What you will hear has been carefully selected, shaped and spliced together to create a seamless experience, from a meditative beginning, ever amplified with a gentle rise in intensity, until we reach a riotous celebration of life and energy at the peak.   Like life itself, we release completely, winding down to a great finality.  What is at the end of our journey?  Have we lived our lives as completely and fully as we ever desired, as we look back from that long road?  We can only answer these questions for ourselves.  I invite you to take this opportunity to reflect on these things, and be yourself, as completely and fully as possible.   Let us live in a world we call can share.  With Love, Blue Jay.
print_description: Be inspired to dance and meditate through the gates of dawn to the endless river, from the dark side of the moon to the heart of the sun.

title: Psychedelics - Past, Present and Future
description: Join Rick Doblin (Visionary Founder and Executive Director of the Multidisciplinary Association for Psychedelic Studies), Mitchell Gomez (the Executive Director of DanceSafe), Casey William Hardison (A tireless Cognitive Liberty advocate and combat veteran of the 'war on drugs') and The Teafaerie (Psychedelic Superhero and author of the blog Teatime on Erowid) for a conversation and Q&A. It's everything you've always wanted to know about psychedelics but didn't know who to ask!

title: Harm Reduction 101 W/ Mitchell from DanceSafe!
description: 'Harm Reduction 101' Harm reduction is a set of strategies and ideas aimed at reducing negative consequences associated with admittedly risky behavior, including illicit drug use. Harm Reduction is also a movement for social justice built on a belief in the fundamental civil rights of people who use drugs. Mitchell Gomez will host this 'introduction to harm reduction' talk, with an open Q&A at the end. Today, electronic music is the fastest growing youth culture, and the community DanceSafe serves stretches far and wide. Current programs and initiatives aim to provide safe spaces to engage in conversations about health, drug use, and personal safety; provide free water, electrolytes, safe sex tools, and ear plugs at EDM events; provide honest, fact-based, unbiased information on drug effects and potential harms; offer nonjudgmental first-point of contact to risky or challenging situations; offer drug checking services to prevent overdoses and death; and work with promoters and local stakeholders to advocate for safety first approaches. Come hear Mitchell from DanceSafe talk about harm reduction in general, and it's application to Burn Culture (as well as unique challenges of the Playa).
print_description: Want to stay safe while you party on Playa? Come get lots of helpful tips from the Executive Director of DanceSafe!.

title: Mandala Workshop
description: A Mandala is a spiritual and ritual symbol in Hinduism and Buddhism, representing the Universe. In various spiritual traditions, mandalas may be employed for establishing a sacred space, and as an aid to meditation and trance induction. Mandalas are also created to focus attention and create positive vibrations around it to achieve a goal, release positive energy, or for attracting good luck.

title: Kerameikos (Ancient Greek pottery)
description: Ever wondered how those ancient vases were produced and decorated? Find out at our pottery school at Gymnasium, and you’ll be able to make some ceramics (kerameikos) of your own! It’s a three step process: first, we'll make the vases of different shapes using coil building techniques; then, we will let the clay dry to apply the slip and carve designs. (You can use the break for lunch or try some of our big toys, such as aerial rig or gymnastics wheel). At the last stage, the pots have to be fired after Burning Man, but we could ship your masterpiece to you, if you’d like! Otherwise, we’ll use it to decorate our camp and use the most appealing ones to award the winners of our athletic events next year.
print_description: Ever wondered how those ancient vases were produced and decorated? Find out at our pottery school at Gymnasium.

title: Pink Tantra Puja: Celebrate the Divine Within
description: Come join us for an interactive Tantric celebration of ecstatic games and rituals to deepen your connection to others, increase your energy, and improve your love life. You will be amazed at how quickly and intimately you can connect with strangers. We all have the the power of creation within us; let's express it with each other through energy, connection and open hearts.
