title: Slow Jam
description: Slow Jam is a gentle and heart-felt practice of connecting with the self and with others through slow, improvised couples' dance. Slow Jam is a strongly held container creating a safe space for exploration of intimacy and connection. There is no expectation of touch or contact, and each participant is given tools for finding and holding their own personal boundaries. This is an opportunity to let go of the busyness in our lives and in our heads, and really sink deeply into our body wisdom and experience our authentic selves.
print_description: Slow Jam is a gentle and heart-felt practice of connecting with the self and with others through slow, improvised couples' dance.

title: Intimacy through Japanese rope bondage
description: An exciting, hands-on introductory workshop on the historical and artistic world of Shibari. Explore reasons for wanting to tie or be tied up, the safety factors involved, how to choose the right ropes and lengths. We teach foundational ties, and some intriguing variations, as well as explore a dynamic use of bondage from the sensual to the artistic. No previous rope experience is necessary.
print_description: Experience the deep connection that arises when the ancient Japanese art is used to create a space of embodied listening and surrender ~.

title: SolDance
description: Dance is the next yoga. It is a path of embodiment, an invitation to come fully home to the reality and magic of your very human life. It's accessible, affordable, safe and effective. We all dance, ever time we take a breath. It's something men, women, children and elders can all do. IT FEELS GOOD. It feels like FREEDOM. It's waiting for you - right around the corner at your neighborhood dance or yoga studio - to inhabit your beautiful body and choose your amazing human life.
print_description: Dance your true, vulnerable, authentic self into deeper connection within and without. A juicy, powerful shamanic movement ceremony ∞.

title: Tribal Tantra - Heart Opening Puja
description: This is a "station" puja, with an inner and outer circle. One circle rotates and with each rotation you have a new partner to dive into presence with. Each partnering is truly an opportunity to fall in love with ourselves through the eyes of another. The stations are subtle, elegantly simple and this is their potency. Open to the possibility of adoration, forgiveness, healing, deep unconditional love and experiencing your higher self in the span of a couple short hours.
print_description: A Puja is a devotional offering. This Tantric Ceremony invites us to fall in love with ourselves through the eyes of another.

title: Heart Opening Concert with FIA
description: Come and receive the gift of original heart opening and empowering music. A unique, crystal clear voice sharing divine wisdom in a powerful way that hits you straight in the core of your being. Songs guiding us back to ourselves and each other.
print_description: A unique, crystal clear voice. Original music. Divine wisdom shared in a powerful way that hits you straight in the core of your being.

title: Pink Floyd Ecstatic Dance
description: Start your day with a spiritual journey through music and dance. Awaken the body and spirit and express your innermost self in a fully accepting community of love. Have some time to pause and reflect on this amazing adventure called life.
print_description: Start your day with a spiritual journey through music and dance.

title: Drum Talk: Rhythm Workshop & Ceremony
description: If you can say it you can play it! DRUM TALK is a school for students who want to discover and develop their voice on the West African djembe. Learn the Language of the Drum with Dan Bailey who teaches traditional West African polyrhythms, chants and djembe techniques specializing in Baba Olatunji's world renowned drum language. Using this method of vocalizing rhythms, drumming becomes accessible to everyone. By seeing, hearing, saying and playing the rhythms this approach appeals to all learning styles. Get clear tones while protecting your hands and taking care of your drum.
print_description: Learn the language of the drum with a moving meditation of West African polyrhythms & chants. Bring a drum or your voice. Dancers welcome!.

title: Mermaid Spa Day
description: Welcome to the first ever Playa Mermaid Meetup! For experienced merfolk or anyone who's ever dreamed of becoming a mermaid or merman, join Mermaid Soluna at the Steam Bath for a full mermaid makeover! Bring your camera for a photo op in your new tail. Bring bubbles, spa goodies and sparkly thing-a-ma-bobs to share! Learn tips and tricks from a pro mermaid, discuss how we can de-moop our oceans, and just relish in the amazing wetness of the steam bath! After we've gathered all the mers, we jump on the nearest art-boat for a cruise around the playa.
print_description: After a cleansing steam bath, you will be magically transformed into a real mermaid (or merman) by Miss Mermaid USA at this Mermaid Meetup!.

title: Axis Syllabus Influenced Dance
description: Practice harnessing the forces of the world around us while simultaneously diving into the discovery of our unique shape and expression. This fun dance class will be strongly influenced by Axis Syllabus - a deep inquiry into the experience of movement that draws from biomechanics, anatomy, physics, western medical sciences, physiology, anthropology and an expansive collection of empirical knowledge. The syllabus is supported by a matrix of masterful movers that continuously bring fresh research and exchange ideas internationally.
print_description: Climb into your internal world while dancing through space allowing your body to be the guide. Find grace, ease, and elegance.

title: Experiments in Group Connection
description: Playing with welcoming everything, including each other, the present moment, and our own bodies.
print_description: Connection games using the practices of Matrix, TGroup + Circling.

title: Have fun with Acroyoga
description:
"An innovative blend of partner yoga, acrobatics and thai massage, acroyoga is a great way to practice trust, communication and connection, while discovering all sorts of fun ways two bodies can interact. Get ready to have fun, play with others, and get a great workout too!
".
print_description: Acroyoga is a fun blend of thai massage, partner acrobatics and yoga, come out and have some fun.

title: Intimate Thai Massage
description:
"Tired of being all by yourself on a lone yoga mat? Then come to this challenging and playful galactivated partner yoga session! Experienced acroyogi Zach Beach will blend together their experience in partner flow, acrobatics, thai massage, dance and fitness to bring you one supercharged partner yoga session. Get ready to have fun, meet a new friend, deepen your yoga practice and send your yogi heart into the stars! 
".
print_description: Get extra squishy with a partner or friend through fun partner stretches and massage skills.

title: Ecstatic Sound Oasis
description:
Ecstatic Sound Oasis is a co-creative sonic art movement where the participants immerse themselves in a non-ordinary state of mind, synchronizing their heartbeats into one harmonious pulse of deep connection with mother earth. 

This subtle meditation weaves heart activating cacao elixirs with sacred ritual practices of self-loving embodiment.

Shamanic breathwork is utilized in order to merge with the orgasmic chant of each individual, aiding in the journey, and creating dialogues between ancient beats and the singing bowls.

The vibrations will guide the life-force energies to embrace and expand love and compassion towards the heart of the BRC.
print_description: ESO is a sound art immersion created by a constellation of magic weavers that synchronize their heartbeats with the pulse of mother earth.

title: Goddess Breast Massage
description: Breast massage is an ancient technique that works on the female body in an extremely effective, holistic way. Boost your energy levels, circulate lymph, and get some emotional healing with these simple techniques. Women only.
print_description: Workshop on goddess breast massage - an instant health and energy upgrade! (for women only).

title: Body Art Flow
description:
BAF is a wave of movement that merges blind folded contact dance with body painting. As we create gentle movements into one another, the naked bodies (optional) become the paint brush and the canvas. The intention is to imagine the body as water drops melting into the desert while honoring our inner child.
Ecstatic music guides us to create a radiant color mandala on a canvas placed on the ground. Closing in savasana to integrate the energies soaked in and recognize the vulnerability and love of the collective held together to become a brand new artwork of light.
print_description: A contact body-art movement that combines the spirit of water with the flux of a subtle dance to merge the colors of paint on our skin.

title: Heart Field Alchemy 101
description: The intention of this workshop is to offer insights and techniques for healing, empowerment and manifestation, all drawing from a combination of topics that range from neuroscience, meridian based self healing modalities, intuitive frequency focal points, and prayer technology. Attendees will leave with an augmented and upgraded capacity for emotional and energetic self regulation, as well as a keen awareness of how their newly harmonized moment-to-moment vibrational state is creating the reality that they step through.
print_description: Learn powerful energetic techniques and practical applications geared towards vibrationally affecting positive change in your reality.

title: Compersive Platantra: alchemical playshop
description: Through the inner alchemy of sensation and feeling, we can find the wisdom of oneness and connection as well as the experience of exquisite and holy individuation. We will be playing games to connect with one another and ourselves, as well as going deeper into the waves of sensation that we experience as disconnection or pain. All is welcome in this space. This is where we come to experiment with humanness and the mysteries of love.
print_description: We are all woven by golden threads. How can we experiment with the experience of interconnection and radical intimacy?.

title: DJ Set
description: A dj set of electronica music.
print_description: A dj set of electronica music.

title: Therapeutic lap dancing
description: The lap is the most powerful bodywork anywhere that we have with us everywhere... 💜.
print_description: We really love to stack functions and body's in super dynamic wayz... 💜.

title: Pipe Ceremony
description: Come make a Good Prayer for yourself.  The sacred pipe is an instrument of prayer gifted from White Buffalo Calf Woman for all people.  Come gather in a Circle, as Rainbow Tribe.  Give your prayers.  Send them up in smoke.
print_description: Come to the sacred circle to make a good prayer for yourself.

title: Therapeutic Biting
description: Biting heals body, mind, and deep social wounds on many levels. In this workshop, you'll learn where, when, and how hard to bite to deliver this transformative (and enjoyable) experience.
print_description: Harness your insticts to experience the primal power of biting.

title: Learn Ancient Secrets of Tantra
description: Discover how Tantra can increase your energy and stamina, heal one physically mentally and emotionally, connect more deeply with others, combine your spirituality and sexuality, and dramatically improve your love life in ways that you may not even realize are possible.
print_description: Discover how Tantra can increase your energy and stamina, heal one physically mentally and emotionally, connect more deeply with others, and more.

title: Discover How You can be Multi-Orgasmic
description: Join this lively discussion on Orgasms. Did you know that both men and women can be orgasmic? Did you know that orgasms can last not just seconds or minutes, but can actually last continuously for hours? Discover ancient secrets of breath, sound, and movement to take your orgasm into whole new worlds.
print_description: Discover ancient secrets of breath, sound, and movement to take your orgasm into whole new worlds.

title: Make Your Own Tutu
description: It's Tutu Tuesday, but you didn't bring a tutu? No stress! Come along and make your own no-sew tutu. We provide the materials and your colourful tutu is yours to keep.
print_description: It's Tutu Tuesday, but you didn't bring a tutu? No stress! Come along and make your own tutu. We provide the materials, your tutu is yours to keep.

title: Taste the Rainbow, Lick the Whore 3: Forever Queer
description:
Maybe you attended the inaugural ball in 2015? Maybe you danced on the speakers in 2016?
Well now it's 2017 and it's time to rise up and proclaim we are FOREVER QUEER! Let's stand together, celebrate, and dance!
This is a party for everyone and everybody. Bring your friends and a great attitude. Park across the Esplanade by the Pegacorn and bike racks!
print_description: Year 3 of the wildest Esplanade party of the week! Bring your friends and an accepting attitude.

title: Playa Virgin Sacrifices
description: Bring us your playa virgins to sacrifice to the volcano god, Tectonic!  Virgins with IDs get consentually disoriented and tequila'd.
print_description: Bring us your playa virgins to sacrifice to the volcano god, Tectonic!  Virgins with IDs get consentually disoriented and tequila'd.

title: Hip Hop Happy Hour
description: How ya livin Biggie Smalls? The playa's first hip hop happy hour is BACK with facepainting, grown-folks vodka lemonade & photos on Sesame Street!
print_description: How ya livin Biggie Smalls? The playa's first hip hop happy hour is BACK with facepainting, grown-folks vodka lemonade & photos on Sesame Street!.

title: Black Rock City Airport Social Party
description:
Black Rock City Airport is a happening place!   
The Black Rock Travel Agency Social Party & Meet n' Greet is the place to be!
Hosted at the Star Port Lounge, the very tall and amazing shade structure with crow's nest look-out on top, in the center of the Airport Village.
Live music, refreshing chilled beverages, and possibly yummy sustenance to help keep your body powered-up to party-on!
Bring your live act.... music, dance, poetry, magic, special drinks & culinary wonders.....or what ever you have and share it with others!
Be there after you've been in the air!  
Black Rock City Airport.... 
Where we "Fly the Playa"
Lovingly brought to you by Black Rock Travel Agency, with hugs & kisses!!
print_description:
The Black Rock Travel Agency Social Party & Meet & Greet is the place 2B!
Hosted at the Star Port Lounge.
Live music, refreshing chilled beverages.
other_location: Black Rock City Airport,  Out the 5:00 Road to the perimeter fence.

title: Protest No-thing!
description:
Do you have nothing you feel strongly about? No convictions that keep you awake at night? Are you outraged by the lack of affairs at this time in this place? If so, join us in fighting against NO-THING we stand for! Stand up for the NO-THING we do stand for! Together, We will Unite for Collective action as we PROTEST NO-THING!

What you will need:

Outrage! We must stand united to rally against NO-THING.
 
Thick Skin! Literally. It gets f-ing hot in the desert and playa dust can hurt your eyes and throat. Dress accordingly. Stay hydrated. 
 
The Ability to Rhyme! To have a lasting impact on passersby and to CLEARLY COMMUNICATE our message, so our fellow civilly disobedient can JOIN US in fighting for our cause, we will need you to yell a rhyming chant (because they're easier to remember). 
 
The Willingness to Not Get Arrested! Who are we kidding, Black Rock rangers are cool.
 
Strong Sign Holding Skills! This is where we need YOU to shine. Grab a sign. Declare (or don’t) your opposition to NO-THING!

Also, punch and pie.

#protestnothing

* We will meet at the Last Resort Country Club (10 & Kundalini) at Sunrise Saturday, 0630-0700, and will proceed to march out into the open playa to make our voices heard! Together! United! In solidarity against NO-THING!
print_description: Do you have nothing you feel strongly about? Join us! We will Unite for Collective action as we PROTEST NO-THING! Signs provided also, punch & pie.

title: Black Rock City Airport Pancake Breakfast
description:
Hot Pancakes with airplanes on the side....  
That's the Black Rock City Airport - Black Rock Travel Agency Thursday morning Pancake Breakfast!
We've got cakes on the griddle and flying machines in the air!  
All to be gifted to your little dusty self.... see how much we love you!
You better come early, cause the Cakes Run Out and the pilots stop gifting rides.....all in time!
Hosted at the Star Port Lounge, the amazing shade structure with the crow's nest look-out on top, in the center of the Airport Village.
Be there... or be pancake-less on the ground!
print_description: What's beats a pancake breakfast, a Pancake Breakfast with Airplanes on the side!  Come get'm while they're hot, and then go for a scenic flight!.
other_location: Black Rock City Airport Village.....  Out the 5:00 road to the perimeter fence.

title: Black Rock Travel Agency, Airport Cocktail Party
description:
Black Rock Travel Agency, Airport Cocktail Party is the place to be Saturday afternoon!   Refreshingly cool beverages, Classic Sargent Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club tunes & Yummy things to snack on....like Pilots!
There's no better place to settle-down, drink-up & chill-out .....  so you'll be ready to Fire-up and Power-on..... to the Man Burn and into the night!
Oh, and did I say....  there's Pilots!
Lovingly brought to you by Black Rock Travel Agency..... with kisses!
print_description:
Come get your tail cocked and ready for the Man to Burn!
The BRTA-Airport Cocktail Party is a legendary, like no other Airport Party!
Don't miss it!.
other_location: Black Rock City Airport Village,  out the 5:00 road the the perimeter fence

title: The Burner Dating Game
description: Looking for love? Come on dowwwwn! Each round three lucky contestants will vie for a playa date with a hidden bachelor(ette) by answering awkward, bizarre, and intimate questions in front of a living studious audience.  Hilarity! Prizes!  Stick around afterward for our 80's Homecoming Dance!
print_description: Each round three lucky contestants will vie for a playa date with a hidden bachelor(ette) by answering awkward, bizarre, and intimate questions.

title: Radical Communion at the Temple
description: Experience a Eucharist (communion) at the Temple - just like the early church did in the deserts of the Middle East.   No religious affiliation required - just an interest in this ceremony commemorating the Last Supper that has been shared by Christians for over 2000 years.  Will be celebrated by the Reverends Brian Baker and Amelie Wilmer, two Episcopal priest. Blessings will be offered after the service.
print_description: Experience a Eucharist and Blessings at the Temple - just like the early church in the deserts of the Middle East.  No religious affiliation required.

title: Art Yoga with Sharon DeMattia
description:
What if you could feel totally uninhibited and completely free being yourself in the world? What would that look like?

Visualize yourself on canvas where you are the Magician, the Artist and the Art.  Your soul finds a safe space from which to speak as you create an anonymous inner-self portrait.  You unify your external life with your internal, build a bridge from head to heart, and create the alignment necessary to do your work in the world. You portrait becomes your compass with which to navigate through chaos.

Afterwards, you can offer your portrait at the temple during your own radical ritual.
print_description: You are the Magician, the Artist and the Art.  Your soul finds a safe space from which to speak as you create an an anonymous inner-self portrait.

title: WORDLESS: The Art of Sound, Deep Playa Art Piece
description: Join us for a sacred sound gathering at the WORD structure. Bring your singing bowls as we collectively tune into the playa vibration with our positive intentions. We will begin gathering by the structure THURSDAY around 5 pm until after sunset.  Location will be at 11:11 half way between the Man and the Fence.
print_description: A sacred sound gathering at the WORD structure. Bring your singing bowls as we collectively tune into the playa vibration with our positive intentions.

title: WORD Burning Ceremony
description: Friday morning, as the sun is rising, we will burn the WORD.  Burning scripture is widely considered an act of sacrilege and the intention here is to deeply honor the underlying message of scripture while challenging the observer to consider the common essence behind all spiritual identity.  Out of respect for the religious traditions represented in the scripture, the layer of scripture will be removed from the letters before burning.  It will be packaged and respectfully buried outside of Burning Man.  The naked word itself will be burned as we aspire to come to a deeper sense of being and spiritual identity that cannot be conveyed with words.
print_description: Location 11:11 half way between the man and the fence.

description: Merkabah invited all burners to join our Shabbat ritual and feast.
print_description: Merkabah invited all burners to join our Shabbat ritual and feast.

title: Pee-Cone Pie
description:
Pee-Cone Pie Stand distributing individually wrapped pink flexible lady Pee-Cones complete with a slice of Homemade Pecan Pie. This little doodad is a survival tool that'll give gals a bottle full of relief in deep playa. 

Hurry while supplies last! First come, first served, one per vagina or similar!

Come for the Pecan Pie, stay for the David Bowie Dance Party: Deep Cuts, B-Sides, and Rarities. BYOB

**Located near the BLACKSTAR Vinyl Sanctuary behind the Palenque Norte Lecture Tent & Full Circle Tea House.
print_description: Distributing individually wrapped pink flexible lady Pee-Cones complete with a slice of Homemade Pecan Pie. Come for the Pie, stay for the Dance Party.

title: B.R.C. BLACKSTAR Bowie Sanctuary Inculcation Rite
description: Discover the Mysteries of David Bowie's Final Work, BLACKSTAR in Analogue Sound & Grasp the Key to Ever-Lasting Life ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ Auspices to commence upon confirmed visual of first of star light  ~  9pm  ~  Nightly Rite Services:  *Order of the B(owl)ie Brotherhood Inductions     *Administration of the B’eucharist     *Revelation of the Key to the Mysteries      *Listening Meditation on THE VINYL RECORD +3     *Nightly Awarding of BLACKSTAR Iron-on Patches  *Nightly Bike Journey 'Beyond The Man' in search of LAZARUS (Optional)   *****    Wednesday Night: Join Later-Day Dudeist, Abbot of the ILDic Order, and Scribe of the B(owl)ie Brotherhood, Playa-Name-Pending in ‘his-&-hers’ 2nd Consecration of the Hallowed BlackStar Vinyl Sanctuary, following the Pee-Cone Pie Stand Bowie Dance Party (3-5pm) and Bowie Live Series (5-9pm), BYO Bike, Light, Buzz & Back-Support.
print_description: Discover the Mysteries of David Bowie's Final Work BLACKSTAR in analogue sound Services beginning @ light of First Star.
other_location: The Bowie Yurt on the Ass of Camp Soft Landing

title: Come be a Postal Worker for an hour or a day!
description: The 3:00 Post Office loves volunteers to serve our many customers and also deliver mail around the Playa.  However, we have very high customer service standards and invite you to participate in training on how to best elicit creative performances from our customers in return for postcards and stamps and tips on leveraging food/drinks/favors in return for delivering mail on the Playa.

description: You're privileged and you've chosen the desert. If love deals you a bad hand, find a new deck. Enjoy an untraditional love tarot reading from a cardist inspired by his heartbreak sustained at Arcosanti. The value of our interaction is based on your investment. Your vulnerability will be met with security.

title: Stage Combat Workshop
description:
Have you ever wanted to get in a fight, but not actually hurt anyone? Here's your chance!

This workshop will teach you some of the hidden techniques in stage fight choreography. In this hour class, we'll focus on the proper stance, sound effects, reactions, and basic physical maneuvers - slaps, jabs, and kicks. By the end of the workshop, you'll have a short routine memorized - and if you bring your phone, we'll help you record a short video clip!

Bringing a partner is encouraged but not required.
print_description: Have you ever wanted to get in a fight, but not actually hurt anyone? Here's your chance!.

description: Come pay your respects to the memory of the thousands of bikes abandoned on the playa.  The Tomb of the Abandoned Bicycle is a place of solemn reflection on the moopy horror of bikicide and reminds all Black Rock City citizens of our duty to live up to the Leave No Trace principle.

title: Hypnotic Ritual At Astro Cats
description:
A demonstration of classic hypnosis (volunteers welcome), followed by the chance to experience hypnotic trance states yourself with an expert hypnotist. Session is followed by (or may include) demos of how to enter deep self-hypnosis trance states yourself. If you have particular things that you want to experience chat to *The Hypnotist* before or after the event - almost anything is possible!
(Note - you must be on-time or slightly early if you want to attend this event. You will not be made to do things which are undignified for entertainment or to do things against your will. If you have BPD, schizophrenia, or psychosis hypnosis is contra-indicated).

title: Poly Talk with Eugene Hedlund
description: Eugene Hedlund, a globe traveling Tantra teacher who is widely practiced in the non-monogamous lifestyle will share some highlights, low lights, what he has learned along the way and what he wishes they had not! Come learn some pro tips and bring your questions. This is about sharing and listening to each other. We are all figuring this out and doing the best we can. Eugene is as eager to talk about the challenges as to share in the joys.. This will be a thoughtful, provocative and fun gathering. Let us learn from each other and in the end open to the possibility of more love, however it looks for us individually.
print_description: Eugene Hedlund, a globe traveling Tantra teacher widely practiced in the non-monogamous lifestyle will share some highlights & low lights.

title: Flow With Grace
description: 75 min of dynamic practice will leave you feeling strong and energized!  A slightly elevated pace combined with Pranayama or breathwork will lift the heart rate and increase the flow of prana.  Take time to wind down with savasana, providing nourishment to the mind, body and spirit.  While arm balances, inversions and backbends have a place in this class, modifications/variations are always offered.
print_description: 75 min of dynamic practice will leave you feeling strong and energized!  A slightly elevated pace combined with Pranayama or breathwork.

title: Taste Your Roots Workshop @ The Kazbah
description:
Kayla Wexelberg will start the Taste Your Roots workshop with a quick guided meditation to help us ground into the event followed by teaching about the differnt chakra energy centers of the body and how certain foods feed each chakra and why. We will entjoy tasting a different kind of food that feeds every chakra and eat them as we learn. 

After the workshop is complete, we invite you to join us for a 45 minute stretching yoga session with music played by U-Mee Dee and yoga insturcted by Sarah Steinback.
print_description: Kayla Wexelberg will guide us in eating different foods that feed different chakras/energy centers of the body as an interactive way to learn!.

title: Cacao & Dance Ceremony with Wild Sirenda
description: Join Guinevere and Lizz, in front of the Kazbah pyramid, in a potent journey to activate and awaken the heart through the union of cacao and dance. Experience the magic of this ancient Mayan medicine as we come together in sacred ceremony to drink an elixir of heart opening cacao, make our intentions and dance wildly into the night. Wild Sirenda will be hosting the ceremony and taking us on a journey with music and live vocals as we go deep into the sunset.
print_description: Join Guinevere and Lizz, in front of the Kazbah pyramid, in a potent journey to activate and awaken the heart through the union of cacao and dance.
other_location: In Front of the Kazbah Pyramid

title: Conversation with Universe, Mystery Workshop
description:
Do you have any questions in your life that you have trouble answering yourself? During our workshop you can relate your questions to the Universe and learn how to hear the answers.  

The main communication instrument is not the language, but the body. I mean not only non-verbal communication, but our fine feelings. There are impulses which we receive from Universe. How we can hear it, and how to understand what we are hearing? We can explore it during this mystery workshop, have pleasure when we do it, and touch the infinity wisdom of our body. You will receive and decipher the answer from the Universe and the Nature through your own actions.  

Conducted by Olga Podolska, MA: 
 - Life and Leadership Coach (USA), 
Member of Alternative Therapy Association (USA), 
Clinical psychologist (Russia),  
Full Member of the PPL (Moscow, Russia), 
Certified Life&Leadership Coach DDI (Portland, USA), 
Certified Process-Oriented Therapist PWI (Zurich, Switzerland), 
Columnist in of weekly psychological advisory “Secrets of Happiness” in West-East newspaper (USA).
print_description: Do you have questions in your life that you have trouble answering? During our workshop you can ask the Universe and hear and understand the answers.

Volunteer adventurers will fly away from the Earth's gravity to explore other galaxies! Live performances followed by all starships heading out to the universe. All Earthlings are welcome!

You could be a pilot, inquire within!

We're looking for:
RECRUITERS to find adventurers throughout the week
SAFETY PERIMETER VOLUNTEERS (7PM to 10PM Friday Night)
CLEAN UP CREW for the site on Saturday afternoon at 11AM (we will clean up at least double the MOOP we generate)

your starship is waiting for liftoff

title: Flamingo Parade, Show, & Extravaganza
description:
Stand tall, dahlinks! Calling all drag queens, divas, & pink birds of the wild! This is a radically participatory and self-expressive event of epic proportions!

Don your pink fluffy finest and join us for the inaugural Flamingo Parade! Come get flamingo-ed out @ High Chair Stilt Bar @ the Red Nose District from 3:30-5pm, enjoy pink drinks & a cabaret show on our stage from 5-7, & strut your SEXY pink stuff with us in fab-flamingo fashion out to Phoenicopterus Rex (https://www.facebook.com/phoenicopterusrex/), a giant pink flamingo idol in the dust! Strike that one legged pose, divas!

Musical Entertainment:

3:30-4:30pm - Joaquin Montoya (DJ Set)
4:30-5:30pm - Sara Nicole Glass (Live Music)
5:30-6:30pm - Meghan Rutigliano (Live Music)
6:30-7:30pm - Exxxplosivo
7:30-8:30pm - Ersinhan Ersin
8:30-9:30pm - DJ Ragbar






A dream is going to become a reality! A Flamingo Parade of epic proportions will take Black Rock City by fabulous pink FLOCK! 
and we want YOU. 

WE ARE SEEKING PERFORMERS FOR OUR CABARET SHOW! We'd love to hear about your act! 
https://goo.gl/forms/uM9YwcQWT01toQwx2



More details and a lineup to be announced! For now, dream up your flamingo personality and get ready to strut it! 

You BETTA work!

NOTE:
We encourage ALTERNATIVES to feathers. Feathers are moopy and are not welcome unless they are single feathers (not boas) sturdily attached to a headdress or something similar. See this blog post for some Leave no Trace do's and don'ts. https://journal.burningman.org/2014/06/black-rock-city/leaving-no-trace/feathers-are-moop-right-well-that-depends-on-you/.

title: Dont search your purpose - just LIVE it!
description:
Tired of chasing in ‘the big quest for your purpose’? No idea where to even start looking? Confused, overwhelmed, just disenchanted? 

Many have been there. But it is not supposed to be a drag to uncover your purpose at all. Even better -  you can start living your purpose even if you don’t know it! Join this heart centered conversation where we will explore how to take the complexity out of one of life’s biggest questions, and, most importantly….bring the excitement back! 

Use the insights and tools you gather for your playa adventures ahead, as well as on your journey in life when you get back home.

title: Conscious Erotic Touch
description:
In this experiential workshop you will learn how to give electrifying
erotic touch with delicious, embodied intention. You will be guided through
playful exercises that will give you a somatic understanding of what it
means to be an active receiver, and an even better giver. Learn how to make
your hands an extension of your heart while sending love through circular
Tantric breath. Perfect the art of setting loving boundaries as a means to
give and receive your heart’s desires. Leave feeling deeply connected,
vibrantly alive, and (hopefully) a little bit turned-on!
print_description: Conscious Erotic Touch.

title: Eye Gazing
description: We may often avoid eye contact with “strangers” in society. However, sharing unbroken eye contact may increase your mindfulness and deepen your connections with people. Like meditation, eye gazing may leave you feeling more spiritually open, connected and relaxed. The difference with eye gazing is that you share these experiences with another person. People who have eye gazed have made long life connections, and even found love! Will you find love looking into the eyes of a stranger? Although we cannot guarantee this, but we can however facilitate a place for those willing to share an unbroken gaze into the eyes of a stranger. The space will be available for 30 minutes. Gazing partners will be limited to the number of consenting gazers in the space. Importantly there is not a time limit you can gaze for as long as or a little as you feel comfortable. We will not force gazing time and if any gazer decides to end a gaze we respect their decision. To get started we suggest you try eye gazing with someone you know for a minute. If you are not immediately ready to dive into a gaze feel free to watch other eye gazers. You may find mediating a few minutes before a gaze may ease you into it.
print_description: Eye Gazing.

title: Divine Sex: Tantra for the 21st Century
description:
Ecstasy. Bliss. Transcendence. Curious about introducing Tantra into your
erotic landscape? Join Sex Educator and Tantra Facilitator, Amy Baldwin, in
this fusion of Sacred Sexuality for modern-day people. Topics include:
Tantric principles and keys to experience Nirvana here and now; Delicious
Tantric breathing, eye gazing and sensual meditation; Conscious erotic
touch; How to bring ritual and celebration into intimate connection;
Transcendence to new heights through oneness with your partner/s, and how
to have more powerful erotic experiences! This class is open to individuals and couples of all orientations and genders. Be prepared to be led through a few sensual exercises where clothes will remain on and boundaries are respected.

title: Re-birthing style Breathwork
description:
Re-birthing style Breathwork - where your own breath is the medicine, and helps you access non-ordinary states of consciousness while working to heal and stimulate your mind, body and spirit.  We utilize music, intention, ritual, energy work and guidance to help you access Source, your inner Divinity, your true essence of being.  This transcendental breathwork guides you to awaken, to remember, to transform.  

By breathing in a conscious, connected, circular manner, you are actively breathing  life force energy into your Being; and, in doing so, you are inviting the intelligence that lives within the breath to dissolve, melt, release any blockages,  suppressed and/ or repressed emotions and experiences from our past.  In releasing the old, the stagnant, the unconscious patterning using your breath as your healing modality, you also then are open to receiving the “new” — new information, clarity, confirmation, creative expansion, and a whole host of possibilities based on your soul’s desires.

While some people use plant medicines to access these non-ordinary states of consciousness, we will only be using our breath in our session — nothing will be ingested other than deeply connecting with our breath.  It is important that you are not under the influence of any substances during our time together.
Please bring an eye mask or bandana, yoga mat (or something to lie on), blanket(s) and a pillow.  Please arrive on time as we will journey as a group.
print_description: Re-birthing style Breathwork.

description:
Join us at Bao Chicka Wow Wow (3:15 & A) for some steamy bao and a steamy dance floor. Dust off your buns and and warm up with ours every night from 11:00 - 2:00am. This years flavors are BBQ pork, egg custard, and red bean.

MUSIC BY RŌNIN
Introducing Rōnin a DJ collective including Founding Father (Brad Weiger), Yaz (Yasir Sadeque) and Bobby Lyte. Founding Father has been spinning for many years in many regions and many countries. Bobby Lyte and Yaz started spinning a couple of years ago after attending their first burn together as part of DeMentha (where Founding Father has been a resident DJ for quite some time). After numerous spinning sessions together, they formed the DJ collective Rōnin in early 2016, and have been collaborating regularly ever since.
print_description: Join us at Bao Chicka Wow Wow for some steamy bao and a steamy dance floor. Dust off your buns and and warm up with ours every night from 11p-2am.

title: Stargazer VI - Bao Edition
description:
After a 2 year hiatus the Stargazer crew is back for one night only. We can't wait to reunite with all of you ravers at Burning Man this year.  

AJX, Bass Cadet and Edison Fields will be playing some deep beats through the night while Bao Chicka Wow Wow serves up the most tasty treat on the Playa: Their legendary steamed pork buns. There's also egg custard and red bean for those with a sweeter tooth. :-)

Friends and strangers are welcome.
print_description: After a 2 year hiatus the Stargazer crew is back for one night only. We can't wait to reunite with all of you ravers at Burning Man this year.

Come learn and listen to the evocative sounds of Christen's looping viola and hear the Greek mythological stories and psychological learnings that explore the dark side of hope.
